1.content:
"Phil, Phil, time to get up." came the voice of his mother breaking through the morning haze that fills his head.

Phil opened his eyes. his mothers face loomed huge before him.

"Come on no time to snooze today's your first day of school."

He stretched a big stretch. he was a handsome boy of thirteen just under three inches tall with soft blond hair that hung down over his deep blue eyes.

"Aww mom do I really have to go to a girl school?" Phil said scrunching up his nose as he sat up in bed.

"Now sweetie we talked about this before." His mom softly reminded him. "Your father and I think you would be safer with girls, you don't know how mean boys can be."
"Now get dressed and no more complaints."

Phil swung his feet over the side of his matchbox bead and crossed the room to his clothes tree which was actually a strait-pin stuck into a small block of wood. He put on the clothes his mother had put there for him, a white shirt and blue pants. The shirt was a little over-sized and the pants bunched up at his feet as he put on his tiny shoes.

Glancing briefly at his mirror he brushed his hair with his hand and a little bit stuck up again.

Later Phil rode in his mothers hand through the huge front door of Heather Valley Girls School and down the hallway to room #122. An attractive women at the front of the room greeted them. She had been writing something on the chalkboard.

"Ms. Prittey?" Phil’s mother questioned.

"Yes! You must be Mrs. Bemine" The women replied. Then noticed the tiny boy in her hand.

"And you must be Phil." Ms. Prittey said coming over and leaning closer. She reached out and petted Phil on the head with her gigantic fingers.

"Ooh, he's adorable. I just love him" Ms. Prittey gushed. Her eyes sparkled with wonder and glee as she received the boy from his mother’s hand.

"Now he's very shy, and very fragile." Phil’s mother began.

"He doesn’t eat much but this is the lunch I packed for him. I would appreciate if you would mark off a little corner of the room preferably on a table for him so he's safe from getting stepped on. Ok?"

Ms. Prittey didn't respond, she was distracted with teasing the boy in her hand.

"Ms. Prittey?" Phil’s mother repeated.

"Oh? Oh yes we'll take special care of our li'l Philley-willy." She cooed nuzzling him with her nose pressed into her hand.

"Ok, I know he'll be in good hands." Said Phil’s mother as she picked up her purse to go.

"Bye sweetie have fun at school make some friends."

Phil waved good-bye to his mother as she left. His eyes pleading don't leave me with this strange women.

But she was gone. And strange girls now started to file into the room soon filling the empty desks.

"Good morning class." Ms. Prittey addressed her class as she clasped her hands in front of her short pink skirt and continuing.

"Of course you've heard we were getting a new student today."

A murmur went around the room, "A boy" "A boy?" "Yea That’s what I heard." "Eew a boy".

"Yes you're right. A boy." Ms. Prittey said opening her hands. "And here he is."

The entire class of twenty-fore, teen girls craned their necks to see.

"He's tiny." one girl said.

"It's just a doll.” said another.

"No, no." Ms. Prittey interjected he's real. His name is Philip Bemine.

1212121121222.content:
The chubby but cute brunette didn’t hold him too tightly. Phil sighed and relaxed in Melissa’s hands. The girls had beaten him senseless but maybe they weren’t so bad. Maybe they were just doing what Ms. Li had instructed them to do and there hadn’t been any malice in their actions…… Maybe just maybe Phil could make some new friends! Phil didn’t really have many friends; it would be great if he could get Melissa and the others to like him. Not only wouldn’t he have to worry about getting hit so hard he’d have someone to hang out with after school!

Unfortunately things rarely work out how Phil hopes they will.

When they were out of Ms Li’s sight Melissa lifted Phil up to her nose and inhaled, the sucking force of her nostrils caused his hair to stand up “Ew, you smell like feet. I’m not letting you anywhere near my lunch if you’re gonna smell like feet.”

Melissa headed for the bathroom. Inside she bumped into Samantha, the tall blonde girl whom Phil had remembered, and Julia, the Hispanic girl whose name he’d forgotten (and been punished for).

“Hi Melissa, hey what do you have there?” Samantha asked.

“Just Phil, I’m taking him to lunch though he probably doesn’t deserve any.” Melissa scrunched up her nose, “I think Ms Li was right. A bag of potatoe chips could have put up a better fight.” The three girls laughed, Phil looked down crest fallen, maybe he wouldn’t be getting any new friends.

“Okay, time for your shower.” She set Phil into one of the sinks and turned the water on, spraying him.

“Wait, no!” Too late, Phil’s clothes were soaked.

“I didn’t have a chance to take my clothes off.” Phil moan as Melissa dripped some hand soap onto his head.

“This is the girl’s room you perv!”

“Yeah!” Julia laughed, “We don’t want any naked boys in here.”

“You can take your shirt off, but that’s it.” Melissa violently pulled the shirt off a protesting Phil, it ripped in the process.

Melissa shrugged and tossed it in the trash. Phil felt humiliated and exposed. He was in nothing but his shorts, soaking wet, with three giant very powerful and seemingly mean girl’s smirking down at him. Melissa picked him up and dried him off by wiping him against the belly of her karate uniform.

“All right, let’s go.” Samantha led the way.

The girls didn’t need to change out of their uniforms considering they were coming right back after lunch.

“……I was hoping we could be friends.” Phil said hesitantly, maybe a friendship was still possible.

“Look at you, you’re bite size! The weakest puniest boy I’ve ever met! Why would I, or anyone for that matter, ever want to be your friend?” Melissa let out a deep belly laugh, Phil just sighed, she was right.

The girls made it to the lunch room and went through the line. Samantha had brought her own lunch so she went to grab them some seats. Melissa set Phil on her tray, “You’re having what I’m having.” Phil nodded sadly.

When they finally got up to the front of the line Phil saw they were having grilled cheese sandwiches. Normally that would have cheered him up but today just hadn’t been his day. Julia and Melissa got their food and took their seats next to Samantha and a few other girls from their karate class.

“Here.” Melissa brushed her finger against the crust causing several crumbs to flake off, “Eat up.”

“……….. That’s all I get?” Phil asked quietly.

Melissa looked offended, “Well yeah! I’m really hungry! Besides it’s not like you earned those crumbs anyway. If you want to lose them keep talking.”

Phil shut up. The girls scarfed down their grilled cheese sandwiches and started on their desert. Melissa got up to head to the bathroom. Phil, not knowing when to keep quite, decided to ask for some desert as well, “Ummm, do you think I could have some of that?” Phil indicated Melissa’s cup of chocolate pudding.

“Sure.” Julia smiled, flicking Phil he flew into the air and landed in the sticky substance. The gooey chocolate delight pulled him in like quick sand. It was too thick for him to break free! Slowly his arms were pulled downward.

“Eat quickly, if Melissa catches you in there I doubt she’ll let you out.” Samantha giggled.

“Yeah, you came here for lunch not to be lunch.” Julia added.
Phil struggled like crazy but it was no use. Soon Melissa was back, “Hey, where’s that shrimpy little dork?”

“In your pudding!” Samantha giggled.

Melissa peered at her pudding and spotted him, “He IS in there! Why are you in my desert?”

“Maybe he hates being beat up by girls. He probably wishes he was stronger. Maybe he wants you to eat him so he’ll become part of a better fighter.” Julia thought out loud.

“Is that it Phil?” Melissa asked.

“What?! No! I was just hungry.”

“Well I’m hungry too! Don’t expect me to eat around you.” Melissa raised her plastic spoon.”

“W- what do you mean?”

“You shouldn’t be in there to begin with. You should get out now or be prepared to suffer the consequences of your actions.” Melissa’s belly growled.

Ms. Li turns to them sternly. "Girls! Why are you late?! Where is Julia and where is Phil?"

The girls "caught their breath" and explained their lie to Ms. Li. The instructor's eyes grew wide as they told their tale. Just as they finished, Julia entered with Phil in her fist.

"I found him girls!" Julia exclaimed. "He was hiding under a bench in the hallways. The tough guy probably got scared during passing time." she laughed.

He has demonstrated zero work ethic and in response to any challenge, his decisions have been to run away. This obviously comes from growing up spoiled with his family catering to his every whim. If we're ever going to do our job of getting him ready not only to interact with the people within this school but also to get ready for the real world, we need to get him out of that controlled environment. I recommend we move him out of his parent's house and into our on campus housing. Because of his size, it should be little additional cost. He can stay under the supervision of my best students, Samantha and Julia. Melissa also has demonstrated a strong work ethic and would be a great example for him."

121212112122211211.content:
Ms. Li opened her palm and looked at Phil. "Now....about your punishment...." she started, "The severity of your actions cannot be overstated. You have shown a complete disregard for the lessons that are being taught in my classroom and a disrespect for the martial arts. However, since you have decided that you do not need my training, I will give you the chance to prove that with a simple 3-step skill drill. Should you pass any step, your punishment will simply be a week's detention. However, if you fail all three steps I have something a bit more unique in mind for you."

Phil felt his knees quivering as he was held in place by his karate instructor. Now he had even lost the light at the end of the tunnel and the opportunity to go home. He was stuck with these three ruthless girls not only every day in karate class, but outside of classes too! He was hardly able to focus on what Ms. Li was saying as she outlined the first drill.

Ms. Li asked Melissa to come forward. The chubby brunette bounded to the front of the class with a huge smile on her face. Ms. Li looked at Phil and said "Phil, the first skill I want you to demonstrate is escape and reversals." She put you down on the mat and turned to Melissa. "Melissa, I want you to repeat that picture perfect hip drop you used on Phil earlier in class..."

Before she could continue, Melissa anxiously nodded and lept into the air. Phil looked up in shock and saw the shadow of her huge, round butt block out all the light in the room before crashing down on his exposed body again. His form presented no resistance to her body and he was flattened to the mat beneath her massive weight. Melissa smiled and looked up at Ms. Li waiting for additional instructions.

The teacher smiled slightly at her anxious student. "Not quite yet Melissa. I hadn't given Phil his instructions yet." When Melissa remained seated on top of the tiny boy, Ms. Li continued "Please stand up so he can hear his task."

Melissa embarrassingly complied to laughter of some of the girls in her class. While some girls were laughing at Melissa, other girls and spotted Phil's flattened form in the large groove Melissa's ass had left in the mat.

Ms. Li continued her instructions as Phil tried to recover. "Phil, in order to demonstrate this skill you need to either escape from or reverse Melissa’s hip drop. If you fail, you will have a 2 minutes to move the match into your favor.”

Ms. Li paused and then shouted “Begin!” as Phil’s body had finally completely reforming. He rolled onto his back just in time to see Melissa’s ass once again eclipse all the light in the room and come crashing down on his defenseless body. For the third time this period, Phil found himself flattened beneath a butt at least five times his size.

Through Melissa’s crushing weight, Phil vaguely heard Ms. Li’s instructions. “Your 2 minutes begins now!” Poor Phil did not have the energy to attempt an escape, but knew he had to put forth some kind of effort and maintain hope.

When Ms. Li started the 2 minute clock, Melissa immediately took advantage of her now familiar position. She started slowly, shifting her hips back and forth and grinding her huge butt across the thin mat in the karate classroom. Phil felt the added pressure and was pushed and pulled as Melissa moved. Staying seated, Melissa focused her weight on the cheek Phil was under, her left side. She lifted her right leg off the mat and let the left cheek support her entire mass, compacting Phil even further. As the 2 minutes neared an end, Melissa pushed herself to a standing position using her ass to generate the forward momentum she needed, only to come crashing back down to earth before fully standing. She repeated this process three times before Ms. Li shoutded “TIME!”

With that, Melissa finally stood up straight lifting the huge weight off of Phil’s body. Phil found himself going with her, stuck to the seat of her karate uniform. Again, the girls laughed and giggled at his position.

Ms. Li roughly peeled him off of Melissa’s rear and looked at him with disappointment in her eyes. As soon as Phil reformed, she lectured him on his failings in the first drill and let him fall to the mat. She turned to her class and called Jackie, a tall muscular Asian girl to the front of the class. Ms. Li faced her two students and explained the second drill.

“Skill number two will be attacking technique. Phil, you are to deliver the standing kick we learned at the beginning of class to Jackie. Jackie will attempt to reverse your attack. Simply attacking Phil before he can execute his kicks will not count as an attack, as you must identify a weakness in his technique.” Ms. Li explained.

“Once again, if Jackie gains the advantage Phil will have two minutes to regain control.” Phil just shook his head. He remembered the standing kick well, as each student smashed him into the dummy’s head at the beginning of class. Unfortunately, he did not have the opportunity to practice delivering the move, only receiving it. There was also the small matter of the height differential between himself and Jackie to deal with…

In any event, when Ms. Li signaled for them to begin, Phil approached Jackie tentatively. He raised his left foot into the air and balanced on his right leg as best as he could. He steadied himself as he prepared to kick Jackie’s ankle with his elevated left foot when his world turned into chaos.

Jackie had seized her opportunity and grabbed Phil’s outwardly stretched left leg in her fist and lifted him over her head in a swinging motion. Without wasting any time, she slammed him down to the mat. Phil was completely scrambled and didn’t know what had happened until Jackie repeated the motion and once again slammed Phil into the mat without releasing her grip. She held the battered student in front of her face and waited for a response from Ms. Li. The instructor soon signaled that the 2 minute timer had begun and Jackie continued her assault on Phil.

The Asian Amazon maintained her grip on Phil’s left leg and reared back and through him as hard as she could into the wall of the karate classroom. Phil hit the wall with a loud SPLAT and stuck there. He could see the classroom through the stars that were clouding his head and he saw the huge Asian beauty charging directly at him. His lungs were too flat to scream, but he cried desperately for help in his mind when he saw her leap with a warrior’s passion and deliver an incredibly powerful jump kick directly where he was stuck. He remained on the wall with the odor of Jackie’s bare foot hanging around him until the beautiful girl peeled him off the wall and slammed him straight down into the mat. As the 2 minutes ticked away, Jackie leapt as high as she could into the air and landed on Phil’s defenseless body with a ruthless STOMP!

As Jackie stepped off of Phil, he saw Ms. Li’s disappointed face high above him shaking her head. “That’s two strikes Phillip. Ready for drill number three? This is one that you’ve at least demonstrated some ability in,” she said sarcastically.
121212112122211211.title: Skill Drill for Lil' Phil

choices: Follow Phil back to the dorms
1212121121222112112.content:
As Phil reformed, Ms. Li held him to her face. “While Martial Arts teaches us the discipline we need to face any challenge instead of running away, mobility and agility is still a very important skill,” she said to him. She then looked at her classroom of hopeful girls and called Tina to the front of the class. Tina is African American and squarely in the middle of the class. She’s not exceptionally strong, tall, or quick but rarely makes mistakes.

Ms. Li opened her fist and let Phil fall to the floor. “Phil, your job in this drill is to make it off of the practice mat. Any edge of the mat will work. Tina,” she said looking up at her other student, “Your job is to stop him and to keep him on the mat. This will be a 10 minute drill. BEGIN!” she finished.

Phil took a moment to take in his surroundings. He realized that after Jackie’s kicks and throws, he was not far from one side of the mat. Unfortunately, when Ms. Li called Tina up she stood directly between Phil and the near end of the mat. Instead of taking a direct approach and running at her, Phil turned and ran toward the far side.

Tina laughed as she saw Phil’s decision to not challenge her. She started casually walking to cut off Phil’s path. But Phil had her fooled! As soon as her momentum was going in that direction, Phil stopped and turned on a dime and ran toward the closer end of the mat that Tina had just vacated. Tina had to recover quickly and Phil knew this would be his beset chance to minimize his undeserved punishment so he was running for all he was worth.

Just as he approached the edge of the mat, Phil felt a shadow overhead. Determined to make it, Phil focused on his goal and his destination, not being distracted by Tina’s attempt to stop him.

Phil was just steps away from his finish line when Tina’s crotch hit him like a freight train. She jumped into the air slightly and came down doing the splits. Her form was pure and her aim was perfect as she stopped Phil flat in his tracks, just inches from his goal. Tina smiled and enjoyed her position over Phil for a few minutes, flexing her muscles over and around Phil’s tiny body. Because this was a timed challenge and because she was not concerned about Phil getting away, she was going to take her time.

Eventually, Tina casually shifted her position so her butt was off the mat and her legs both faced the same direction, trapping Phil against her crotch with her thick thighs. As Phil regained his composure he knew his time was running out. He tried to push back and get away from Tina, but her thighs formed a wall at his back and the slight increase in elevation from the floor to the mat sealed any gap that might have existed under her legs. Tina just sat back and enjoyed the feeling of Phil struggling to escape, knowing that he had nowhere to run.

As time wound down, Tina let her thighs relax a bit. When Phil gave one final attempt at breaking through he found he was able to make some progress! Without thinking, Phil sprinted with every ounce of energy he had left, not realizing that he was running into a trap. Tina watched his progress from above like a cat toying with a mouse. When she decided he had progressed far enough, Tina clenched her thigh muscles and pressed them together, sandwiching Phil one final time.

Ms. Li declared the 10 minute time limit up and informed Phil of the obvious, that he had failed in all three drills.

“Phil, it is clear that you need the training you can receive in this class desperately. That makes it even more frustrating that you continue to try to avoid challenges. Now that you’ve used up your third and final strike, your punishment…..”

BRING!

Ms. Li was interrupted by the bell signaling the end of class.

“Your punishment will have to wait for tomorrow. Julia!” Ms. Li called to her top student, “Please collect Phil”
1212121121222112112.title: Third Strike

choices: No, Julia catches him and takes him back to Ms. Li's class
12121211212221122.content:
Julia enjoyed the feeling of Phil trapped against her butt, but she knew she couldn't stay long and leave her friend's to face Ms. Li's wrath. So she fished Phil out and held him up to her face in a closed fist.

Phil struggled to free his mouth and gasped "You can't do this to me!"

Julia just giggled and answered "Phil, we can do whatever we want. We've already proven our physical dominance over you, so that much should be clear. We can say whatever we want because nobody in this school will take the word of the new 3 inch tall BOY over ours!" She said smiling.

With that, she walked out of the bathroom to follow her friends into the karate class. She tossed Phil up in the air and cupped her hands to catch him, playing with you. Much to her surprise though, as soon as Phil's feet made contact with her hands he pushed off and launched himself out and away from her. He fell rolling onto the floor. He used her shock to gain a head start and ran as fast as his little legs would allow.

He wasn't sure where he was running at first, he just knew he had to get away from Julia. He could hear her yells after him just a few feet behind. His eyes darted around looking for a way to escape. Then he saw it, an air conditioning vent just a few feet away from where he was at. He immediately shifted direction and darted toward the vent to escape. He didn't know where it would take him, but he hoped at the very least it would buy him some time until he could find someone to explain himself to.

Julia saw him change direction and wasn't sure what he was doing. She scanned the floor quickly and saw the same vent. She put in more effort in chasing him down, knowing that if he reached that vent she would lose him.

Phil's hands reached the vent as Julia dove to catch him. Does he make it through the vent in time?
12121211212221122.title: Escape!?

choices: "No problem squirt!" (Becky's always been his one true friend)
"You can make it up to me in my sock." (His sister is quite cruel)
121212112122212.content:
The first scoop didn’t get him but took a huge chunk out of Phil’s chocolate prison. Melissa downed it and mmmmm’d.

“That’s really good.”

“Please Melissa, you can’t do this to me! I’m a human being and… and your classmate!”

“And a lousy one at that.” Julia snapped, “You’re just some stupid little bug sized boy who got sent to an all girl’s school because no one else would have you.”

“That’s not true.” Phil said quietly, a tear rolled down his cheek.

“You’re just a worthless ant sized loser, at least now you’ll do some good. A good fighter needs protein to help get stronger.” Julia’s words cut him, Samantha’s laughter didn’t help.
“I thought if I took karate I’d eventually get to fight a boy but I never thought I’d get to eat one!” Melissa licked her lips and brought Phil to her open mouth……. Only to have the spoon pulled from her fingers.

“Hey, what’s the big idea?!” Melissa cried.

Phil looked up, it was his sister Becky! Becky stared down at her chocolate covered sibling, “Look, if anyone is going to eat my brother it’s me.” Becky stuck the spoon into her mouth and pulled it out Phil-less.

She set the spoon back down on the table and left the three girls gaping as she turned and walked away. Phil was a little intimidated but he wasn’t really scared. He knew his sister wouldn’t eat him, hey, she was his sister! Still, it was very gross being in her mouth. Her hot breath pressed against him and he found himself wishing she’d taken a breath mint before tossing him in. She rolled him around with her tongue licking him clean of pudding. Her mouth started to fill with saliva. Phil wrapped his arms around his sister’s tongue to keep from accidentally sliding down her throat.

Eventually she spat him into her hands, “Well, I see your first day is off to a good start.” She grinned.

“Thanks Beckster.” Phil gave her a weary smile, “I owe you one.”

His sister cringed at the nickname.
121212112122212.title: Thanks Beckster!

choices: "I'm going to call Mom, she's going to learn them respect!!"
"I'm keeping you with me. They won't hurt you anymore I promise"
1212121121222121.content:
"No problem squirt."

They both laugh at the nicknames and finally Becky gives her tiny brother a kind kiss

"Don't worry lil bro, I'm there."

And she makes him the beautiful smile ever. Then all his suffering is gone. He loves staring at her like that, feeling her gazing at him kindly. That's in moment like those that he is happy to be so tiny. Her hand is soft and warm, he could stay there forever. But they are in a school, that mean they have to go in their classes.

"Do you know someone who can take care of you?"
"Huh ... well I haven't really ... Becky, i'm in trouble."
"You? Tell me what's wrong."

Phil tells her sister about the volley-ball team and how he was sent to the Karate class. He could see the anger growing behind his sister's face.

"How could they ...? Argg This wasn't your fault, they did'nt have any right to treat you this way!!"
1212121121222121.title: Nice Becky

choices: Phil gets ready for Karate class the next day
Someone from class saw Phil's new technique
12121211212221212.content:
"I'm keeping you with me. They won't hurt you anymore I promise," Becky said as she gave Phil a little hug.

"Thanks so much, big sis," Phil replied. He knew that his sister would always be there for him. It made him feel very happy. But still, he had to learn how to fight for himself. Or else he would continue to be stepped on... literally.

"I appreciate your help, Becky. But I still gotta learn how to defend myself somehow." Phil walked around on the palm of Becky's hand, trying to think. "I just don't know how. I'm too tiny."

Suddenly, an idea popped into Becky's head. "Hmm, there may be a way...." Holding on to Phil tightly, she took him to an empty class room. Becky then set her brother down on the floor and took a seat.

"What are we doing in here?" Phil asked, wondering what crazy scheme his sister had. At that moment, Becky took off her left shoe. A pungent aroma filled the air, making Phil choke a little bit. It seemed that Becky had been doing some running earlier in the day. The bottom of her sock was discolored yellow and dripping with sweat. In all his life, Phil have never gotten used to the smell of his sister's ripe feet. He took a few steps back to avoid the stench. "Sorry, Phil. I should have warned you..."

She continued to take off her sock, which only made the smell worse. At that moment, Phil noticed that there was a tiny, pebble in her sock. It was smooth and white and reeked of Becky's toes. Holding the pebble gently, Becky handed it to Phil. The stone still felt warm from the heat of her feet.

"This is for you, Phil," Becky said as she wiggled her toes for a bit, enjoying the chance to air them out.

"So I'm suppose to defend myself with a stinky pebble?" Phil asked, confused by his sister's offering.

"Phil, you might not remember. But years ago I took a karate class. My teacher taught me many important things. And one of those lessons was that even the mighty giant may be tripped by the lowly pebble."

"Okay, so I'm a lowly pebble. That won't make me any stonger." Phil cast the pebble aside, looking a bit disappointed.

"Listen, Phil. Even though you're itsy bitsy, you still have some strengths." Becky stood up and lifted her bare foot off the ground. "Now your training begins! Just pretend that I'm one of the girls from your karate class. What do you do?"

Phil just sat there. He didn't want to fight. What was the point? Suddenly, Becky brought her bare foot down on Phil, covering him in the terrible stench. "Becky, get your stinking toes off me!"

Becky didn't listen. She waited for her brother to fight back. Phil tried to wiggle out of the length of his sister's sweaty flesh, but couldn't. "I warned you, sis!" Phil managed to crawl toward the ball of his sister's foot. He brought his arms into position and began to tickle Becky without mercy.

Becky was caught off guard and began laughing out loud. "Wait-Heh heh heh Stop! Ha! Ha! Ha! No fair!" Becky fell backwards with non-stop laughter and landed on her side. Phil grabbed on to his sister's heel and continued with the tickle torture. "Hehehe- Please stop! Ha Ha Ha I'm-I'm about to wet my pants!"

Phil stopped and realized that he had just defeated his sister. Well, he had done this many times before. But now he realized that he could use this to his advantage.

"Gee, thanks Beckster," he said standing triumphantly on his sister's foot.

"Think-think nothing of it," Becky smiled and tried to catch her breath.
12121211212221212.title: Phil Learns Pebble Kung Fu

choices: Find someone in school who stinks
121212112122212122.content:
What Phil and Becky didn't realize was that Melissa, Julia and some of the other girls from his karate class had been watching them.

"So he thinks he can tickle his way into victory, eh?" Melissa giggled at the silly thought. "Yeah, but you saw how quickly he brought down his big sister," Julia said as she looked at her feet. "If we don't do something, we might be beaten by the squirt."

"Yeah, but his new technique has a flaw," Melissa said and then took off her shoes and socks. She told the other girls to do the same thing. "Phil doesn't seem to like foot odor. We just gotta figure out which one of us has the stinkiest feet." The girls sat around in a circle and tried to figure it out. But they all seemed to have very clean, well-kept feet.

"Well, I have some toe jam on my left foot," Julia spoke up as she wiped off the gunk between her toes.

"Not good enough!"
121212112122212122.title: Who has the stinkiest feet in all the land?

choices: Phil fights against Julia and loses...
1212121121222121222.content:
The girls from Phil's karate class searched the school for someone that could help them. After searching for a while, they finally found who they were looking for. Sitting alone under a tree was Smelly Shelly. She was known by all the students as a real tomboy. Shelly cussed, burped, and would go days at a time without taking a bath. As Melissa and Julia approached her, she parted her frizzy black hair and stared at the visitors.

"Yeah, what do you want?" Shelly smacked the gum in her mouth and glared at the girls with an impatient look.

"This may sound strange," Melissa started, feeling a little nervous. "But we need your sneakers... um... for a project."

Shelly shrugged and began to take off her shoes. "You know most people prefer that I keep these things on." As the shoes dropped off, an immediate stench filled everyone's nostrils and caused several flowers in the area to wilt. Shelly giggled as the other girls choked and their eyes filled with water.

"Oh, come on. My tootsies can't smell that bad. I haven't even taken off my socks!" Shelly then reached for her feet to take them off, but Julia stopped her.

"Thanks. We only need the sneakers." Julia then put on the sneakers and shivered a little as her feet felt the wetness that drenched the soles. It was as though there was some fungus growing there.

"Perfect," Melissa said with an evil grin.
1212121121222121222.title: Smelly Shelly

choices: once more at the mercy of his class and teacher
sewn into shoe's insole (head in toe section) and given back to Smelly Shelly
12121211212221212221.content:
The next at class, Phil stood up on the floor mat with a confident posture. He knew he could win and gain the respect of these girls. "Of coarse for now the girls would still tease him, but Phil stood there without flinching.

"Has anyone seen Julia yet?" Ms. Li asked as she looked over the attendance sheet. Suddenly, Julia stepped on to the mat wearing Shelly's sneakers. "Julia, you can not wear shoes on the mat! Take them off immediately." exclaimed Ms. Li. Julia took one off and them threw it toward Phil. The ripe stench over powered him instantly and caused him to vomit a little in his mouth. The girls' laughed as Julia took off the other shoe and whirled it around in her hand. "Come on Phil. My feet can't stink that much, can they?" She then took off her socks and stepped back on the mat.

"Okay Julia, it's your turn to spar with Phil today. Are you ready?" asks Ms. Li. "More than ready." says Julia with a smirk.

Ms. Li nodded and Julia stepped forward. Phil tried to get up, but he had a hard time standing because of the stench. It seemed to drain his energy. Julia stood over Phil with a evil smirk and pressed her toes against his nose. "Go on, Phil. Do your new move!"

Phil didn't understand how she knew about his Pebble Kung Fu! How could he defeat her now? Phil tried to move, but was too grossed by the toe jam between Julia's toes. He fell back and tried not to breathe, but Julia only pressed her toes closer and closer. Phil took in a deep breath and cried out. His lungs filled with a cheesy, horrible aroma. Phil was starting to black out. Julia then took hold of Phils head between her toes, lifted him and then stomped his body beneath her foot, all the while holding his head firmly between her toes. Phil soon fainted from the stench and pressure.

When Phil awoke, he found himself...
12121211212221212221.title: Phil fights against Julia and loses...

choices: Shelly get's home hot and sweaty
121212112122212122212.content:
"Julia what are you doing! Why am I in your shoe?" Phil asked.

"Oh yeah I forgot to mention these aren't my shoes." Julia said smiling.

"Then who's are they?" Phil said struggling with the smell.

"They're Smelly Shelly's" Julia said with a laugh. "She is the smelliest girl in school and is such a tomboy I bet she'll like her shoes back though."

Julia walked back to Shelly taking a nap with her socks hanging out.

"Here Shelly thanks for letting me borrow you shoes." Julia said.

"Hey no problem, but why did you need them anyway?" Shelly asked.

"Oh you know use girls and our shoes" Julia lied.

"Yeah if you haven't noticed I really don't care about that stuff." Shelly told Julia.

"Oh right well there's the bell time to go and thanks again." Julia said chuckling a little.

Phil started to feel the shoe move, and sees a socked foot coming in.

"NO WAIT SOMEONES IN HERE!" Phil shouted.

But Shelly didn't hear him.

"Crap it sucks I don't have a car and my bike needs new tires oh well guess I'm walking." Shelly said to Phil's terror.

Shelly then starts her long walk home.

choices: Sees you stuck in her shoe!
1212121121222121222121.content:
Shelly's smelly sock had smothered you every step of the way. Literally sewn to the sole, you couldn't do anything but endure the smell, grime, sweat and dirt that were covering your body. Her sock was so sweaty that it was practically sticking to your face by now, it was so wet that you couldn't even breathe through your mouth anymore. You had only one option left, you stuck your nose through one of the many holes in her sock and started breathing... The smell was terrible, every breath reminded you of why this girl was called Smelly Shelly. While covered in her sweat the only thing you could do was breathe in her stench and pray that you reach your destination soon...

After a long walk, you hear a door open and you assume that Shelly finally made it home. Judging from the sweat pouring down from her feet, you assume she must be quite sweaty all over her body. Finally, she sits down and takes off her shoes;

Then, she...
1212121121222121222121.title: Shelly get's home hot and sweaty

choices: Duties?! Screw her, call her names!
Scream for help as hard as you can!
12121211212221212221211.content:
While her socked feet leave her shoes, she looks down and sees something moving inside her shoe. For a second you look her directly into the eye... In this highly awkward situation you manage to say: "H-h-hey... My name is Phi-"

Before you can finish your sentence, she grabs her shoe in excitement and shouts, "wohoo! I got a slave!" She jumps up, "man! Who knew Julia and the others would give me a present like this?!" You try to interrupt your new joyful owner, "wait a second... Can't we talk about this?" You ask. still stuck inside her shoe.

"No." Shelly answers with a very strict tone. "You can do so many things for me... I really hate showering and taking baths, however, with you here, I can skip even more of them!" You suddenly start to get an idea of what she is planning to do with you, you wiggle in your restraints trying to cut yourself loose. "Nonono, little guy, I just got home from school." She takes off her socks and leisurely throws them aside. "I am gonna play some videogames, meanwhile, I will keep you in there and think of what to do with you next." Uh-oh, this does not seem to be going well for you... You try to convince her to let you go once more, "wait Shelly! Look, it was just a prank those girls did, I uhh... I have a very pressing... uhm, appointment with my mother in ab-"

Once again, Shelly interrupts you, this time by shoving her bare foot directly into the shoe you are still stuck in. Her foot covers your entire body and her toes wiggle around in your face. "I don't care." She then raises her feet onto a couch and gets comfortable. "Look, I am doing this for a few hours straight. I think it's time you start to get used to your new duties. So, lick my toes clean... Slave." You hesitate for a moment and instantly Shelly stomps her shoe on the floor slamming you really hard with her feet, "RIGHT NOW."

She has clearly demonstrated her dominance over you, so you obey and hesitantly start licking her toes. You think to yourself: "Yikes! These must be the smelliest and dirtiest toes you have ever seen, every inch of them is covered with hairs, dust, grime, sweat and whatever else". Then Shelly speaks up again, "You really have to make out with my toes to get them clean, sucking, kissing and licking them... Oh yeh, you eat whatever you lick off, is that clear? That's your dinner." You start to swallow all the bits you have in your mouth and... It is horrible! Shelly seems right, you really have to almost one-way French kiss her toes inch by inch to get them clean... You are basically scrubbing her toes with your tongue by now! While you are enduring your torture, she adds, "if I see you drop any of my toes' delicious jam, you'll get atleast ten of my stomps to trample you. Now, I am gonna focus on rekking some noobs! So shut up and do your job."

Time passes by, and you spend what seems like almost an hour just to clean her big toe, but it does seem kinda clean now. The worst part is that it is completely dark in here, so if you want to check if her toes are actually clean, you have to trace their surface with your tongue for anything you maye have missed. But, now that you have cleaned her big toe... You will have to move to the spot between her big toe and her index toe, you can just smell the massive amount of toejam that is stuck there. Inch per inch you lick it clean and swallow its contents. Then Shelly shakes her foot, "show me you love the space between my toes! Come on!" Knowing that you don't have a choice, you start to suck every inch of the space between her toes. By now you have licked up and swallowed so much of her sweat, you feel like you don't need to drink for days.

This procedure continues and you pretty much made out with all of her toes, then finally her feet move down while she sits up. Then her foot leaves her shoe and she sees you covered in her sweat and grime. "Awww, good job my little cleaning-slave!" She puts her foot in her lap and inspects her toes, "I don't think they have ever been this clean you know!"

"Now let's discuss your life here and your new duties..."
12121211212221212221211.title: Sees you stuck in her shoe! [Shelly's Slave]

choices: Weeks pass and the girls start to respect Phil
Weeks pass and they still rteat him badly
12121211212221212222.content:
The next at class, Phil stood up on the floor mat with a confident posture. He knew he could win and gain the respect of these girls. "Gee, Phil," Melissa said as she shoved the tiny boy aside with her foot. "You look so mighty. If we're not careful we just might get pulverized!"All the girls errupted in laughter but Phil stood there without flinching.

"Has anyone seen Julia yet?" Ms. Li asked as she looked over the attendence sheet. Suddenly, as though on cue, the doors opened with a mighty SLAM and Julia stepped on to the mat wearing Shelly's sneakers.

"Julia, you can not wear those shoes on the mat!" Ms. Li exclaimed. "Take them off immediately." Julia did as she was asked. She took one off and them threw it toward Phil. The ripe stench over powered him instantly and caused him to vomit a little in his mouth. The girls' laughter continued as Julia took off the other shoe and whirled it around in her hand. "Aw, Phil. You're upsetting me. My feet can't stink that much, can they?" She then took off her sock and took a big sniff of them. Phil groaned at the sight. It felt as though his stomach was twisting and turning.

"Ms. Li? May I spar with Phil right now?"

Ms. Li nodded and Julia stepped forward. Phil tried to get up, but he had a hard time standing on his legs. They were wiggling under him like jello. Julia stood over Phil with a superior grin and pressed her toes against his nose. "Go on, Phil. Do your secret move!"

Phil was shocked. They knew about his Pebble Kung Fu! How could he defeat her now? Phil tried to move his arms, but was too grossed by the toe jam between Julia's toes. He fell back and tried not to breathe, but Julia only pressed her toes closer and closer. Phil took in a deep breath and cried out. His lungs filled with a cheesy, musky aroma. Phil was starting to black out. He would have fainted from the stench, but suddenly he heard Becky's voice in his head telling him that he could win!

Phil stood up and thrust his hands outward, screaming a battle cry. "Cootchie Coo!" He started tickling the sweat stained feet with fury. Julia tried to hold back but suddenly dropped to the ground crying with laughter. "Stop-s-stop!" Julia rolled around on the mat, but Phil stayed stuck to the bottom of her heel. All the girls watched and were amazed that one of their finest fighters was on the ground and in a fit of laughter. "Heh heh he...I give up! Just stop!" Phil jumped of Julia's foot and looked toward Ms Li.

"How did I do?"

Ms. Li smiled. She was quite impressed with Phil's display. "Well done," she said and reached for a white sash. Cutting out a piece of the sash, she handed it to Phil. "There you go, Phil. You are now an official student in my class for getting your first KO."
12121211212221212222.title: Phil vs. Stinky Feet

choices: Ms. Li decides to train him privately
A new student arrives in the class
121212112122212122221.content:
Weeks pass, and the girls begin to treat Phil with more respect during class. They even enjoy having the chance to spar against him and his odd, Pebble Kung Fu technique. The girls make sure that their toes are jam free and that their feet smell great so that Phil will choose them as their sparring partner.

Phil Tiny is even getting respect in his other classes. If anyone tries to lay a finger on him, his karate friends are more than happy to lend him a hand... or a foot.

Suddenly, little Phil feels like he's on top of the world. One day....
121212112122212122221.title: Phil: Karate master!

1212121121222121222211.content:
Phil walk into his karate class one afternoon once the other classes had been done for the day. He saw Ms. Li standing on the mat, strangely enough, with a pair of slippers on her feet.

"Um, you wanted to see me Ms. Li?"

She nodded and moved closer to her student. "Phil, I want to tell you that I am happy with all the work you have done in my class. You have come far. But now I think it's time for you to move on to the next level."

She then removed her feet from the slippers and wiggled her toes a bit, allowing their stench to spread. Phil gagged but tried not to lose his ground.

"Phil, for the next few weeks we will be doing some training. You must overcome your greatest weakness. Now how shall we begin?"
1212121121222121222211.title: Your real training begins now!

12121211212221212222111.content:
"Your first task today," Ms. Li said, "is to paint my toenails." Phil looked at her wriggling toes with disgust. "Why do I have to do that? What can I possibly learn?" Ms Li said nothing, but merely moved closer to Phil. Without warning, she stomped on Phil hard, crushing him under her foot. She twisted her foot into the floor, smashing Phil completely. Ms. Li then removed her foot and placed it next to Phil. "Nail polish is a few feet to your left," was all she said.

Phil managed to get up off the floor and slowly moved to the bottle of nail polish. It was closed, so he looked back up at Ms. Li and said "I'm too small to get it open." Ms Li sighed, and lifted her foot again. Phil panicked and said "wait, wait! I can get it open, just give me a minute." Ms Li put her foot back down on the floor, and Phil did his absolute best to open the bottle. With enough effort, he managed to unscrew the cap, and pulled the brush out. Though it did not weigh much, the brush was actually taller than him, so it was incredibly difficult to walk far with it. However, Ms. Li was not going to help Phil at all, so he had to walk the distance.

When he finally arrived at her feet, he began the laborious task of painting her toe nails. The stench was incredible, but he did not want to be crushed again. Slowly he managed to place the polish on Ms. Li's big toe, making sure to brush evenly (he was afraid of what would happen if he did a bad job). After a little while, Ms. Li looked down and said "Phil, you have already used up too much polish, go back and get more." Phil walked over to the bottle, brush held above his head, and attempted to dip the brush back in. However, he was unable to reach, so he tried angling the brush and forcing it in.

With all of his struggles, Phil forgot to be careful about the bottle. As he was trying to dip the brush back in, he saw the bottle start to tip over. He frantically tried to hold it up, but the momentum moved it too fast, and he was unable to stop it. The bottle tipped over and nail polish oozed out. Phil froze in fear.

Ms. Li looked down and said "Philip! You have no respect for my property! This calls for some punishment." Phil took off, running as fast as he could, though he knew in the back of his mind it was hopeless. Just as he suspected, it was only seconds before Ms. Li's now familiar foot was back on top of him, crushing him into the ground.

"Philip," Ms. Li said, "this is unacceptable. You will have to spend the next day with me. Your place of punishment will be........
12121211212221212222111.title: Paint Ms. Li's Toe Nails

choices: Phil Has To Try To Paint Ms. Li's Toenails Again
121212112122212122221111.content:
"I have decided," Ms. Li said, "that you will have to spend the entire day under my foot. I will make the arrangements with the rest of your class and your mother. You will learn to respect my property, and my feet, and tonight we will see if you can do a better job." Ms Li rubbed her foot all over Phil, grinding him into the mat until he stuck to her sole. She then picked up her foot and placed it into her shoe. She stepped in roughly, causing Phil enormous pain.

The day wore on like none before. Phil was face up under his teacher's foot, and there was nothing he could do about it. The arch of her foot provided just enough room that Ms. Li was able to keep her foot completely inside her shoe and still torment Phil. With each step, though, it pushed down harder onto Phil's tiny body. The sweat from her foot completely enveloped him, threatening to drown him completely. He tried pushing up against it, but that only caused him to tickle Ms. Li's foot, and she responded by standing in place, making sure he didn't even get temporary, minimal relief.

As the hours continued, Phil's discomfort was increasing. When Ms. Li's foot raised up a little, he started pounding on it with his tiny fists. At first Ms. Li didn't even feel his punches, but when she did, she pulled her foot out of her shoe. Phil was excited, as he was able to see light. Before he could escape, though, Ms. Li tipped her shoe forward, pushing Phil all the way to the front of his teacher's shoe. Ms. Li's foot returned, and this time Phil was covered by the woman's toes. She wrapped her toes around Phil's body, completely coiling them around him and preventing any movement.

When the day finally ended, and Ms. Li took off her shoe in her house.........
121212112122212122221111.title: The Day Under Ms. Li's Foot

choices: Phil's mom takes him back home
Becky takes Phil to go shoe shopping
12121211212221212222112.content:
Ms. Li brought her foot close to her tiniest student. Phil studied his teacher's gigantic toes and noticed that they were grey with grimey, slimey toe jam. It was as though Ms. Li had not washed her feet in days! She wiggled her toes again and Phil was able to hear the gross squishing sound that her foot fungus made. The little boy tried not to flinch, but found it a difficult task as his eyes began to water and his nostrils filled with the powerful, cheesy aroma.

"Phil, for this session of training, you will be doing some toe jam duty," Ms. Li said as she took a seat on the training mat. The ground underneath Phil's legs shook about as Ms. Li's huge butt planted itself firmly on the floor. The tiny boy tripped forward and his face landed directly in between his teacher's smelly toes. "I'm waiting, Phil," Ms. Li said in an impatient tone. "I want my feet to be clean and tidy. And I don't want to hear any complaints about the smell."

Phil began his strange training. He grabbed handfuls of the grey, greasy toe jelly and cast them aside in a pile. For the deposits of toe jam that were to hard to get at, he used his finger nails to scrap off. Phil tried to hold his breath when he reached Ms' Li's big toe, because for some odd reason it smelled the worst. "What's wrong, little one? Does it smell too bad?" Ms. Li asked in a teasing manner. She then pinched off a bit of toe jam from the pile that Phil had made and rubbed it all over his hair.

Phil groaned and tried to pick the disgusting jam out of his hair. "You still need much practice, little one," Ms. Li said with disappoinment. "But I'm sure your family can help you."

Phil looked up at his teacher with a confused expression. At that moment, Phil's mother and big sister walked into the class. Ms. Li stood up from the ground, knocking Phil over a bit. She then rested her smelly foot on top of Phil's face.

"Your son still needs much training before he can master his weakness," she said to Phil's mother. "I'm counting on you two to help him with his training." Phil pulled himself from under his teachers bare foot and looked at his mom.

"You KNOW about this?" He asked, feeling somewhat dizzy from the foot odor.

Becky nodded her head and grinned. "Yup! And mom and I plan to help you train at home!" Becky said happily as she peeled her smelly little brother off Ms. Li's foot. "From now on you'll sleep in mom's work shoes, Phil. And you'll use one of mu used socks as a blanket," she said as she handed Phil over to their mother.

"Yeah, little bro. And from now on, mom and I are gonna remain barefoot at home all the time so that each room smells like our feet," Becky said cheerfully, since she really enjoyed the smell of her own feet.

Phil groaned, hardly able to believe what was going on. His mother patted him on the head and kissed his face. "Don't worry, little guy. It will only be for two weeks. And we'll give you plenty of breaks so that you can get some fresh air."

The little boy felt a bit more comfortable, but he knew the next week or so was gonna be painful.
12121211212221212222112.title: A Fistful of Toe Jam

121212112122212122221121.content:
Phil's ride home was an uncomfortable one to say the least. Before they left the school, Phil's mom had stopped at the restroom and placed Phil in the toe section of her favorite pair of pumps she was wearing. She then walked out of the school and was driving home from the school. Meanwhile, Phil was being put under constant pressure as his mom held the gas peddle down.
She would occasionally scrunch up her toes, which only added to Phil's torture. This went on for the entire car ride home. When they got to their house she turned off the car and went into the house. She took off her shoes and dropped Phil at her feet.
"Well now Phil", she said,"you have a choice. You can either clean between my toes or you can give me a foot massage. Which will you pick?"
121212112122212122221121.title: The Punishment Begins

choices: Phil has to sleep in his mother's shoe
Phil has to sleep next to his sister's feet
1212121121222121222211212.content:
Phil didn't like either choice. But he knew that he had no other choice. "I guess I'll... clean between your toes," Phil said quietly. He decided it would be the best choice since he really wouldn't need to touch his mother smelly, sweaty feet.

"Good choice, dear," his mother said and then handed him a tiny brush. Phil reached for it and noticed what it actually was. "Hey, this is my toothbrush!"

"Yep. Your teacher said it would be an excellent way to get the taste of feet in your mouth," his mother said and then wiggled her eager toes.

"Mom, that's just gross!" Phil exclaimed. "Give me another brush now!"

"Phil you have to do this. You know I can think of worse things," she said and then paused for a moment. "I can get grand ma to help us. Her feet..."

Without saying another word, Phil quickly began flossing his mother's toes, scraping off crusty, green jam. When he was finished, he toothbrush was worn down and reeking.

Suddenly Becky came inside, having just finished her practice. She took off her athletic shoes and dropped them in front of an electric fan. Soon, the cheesy stench of her feet filled the room.

Phil gagged an wondered what would happen next...
1212121121222121222211212.title: Flossing Mom's Toes

choices: The next moring, Phil goes to have breakfast with family
The next morning, Phil has more foot-related chores
12121211212221212222112122.content:
Night time fell and Phil began to get ready for bed. He put on his pajamas and then went to a small cup next to the bath room door that he used as a sink. As disgusting as it was, he had to brush his teeth using a tooth brush that reeked of his own mother's feet. The taste was awful. He knew it was the culmination of a hard days work of a pair of Birkenstock-clad feet. Once he was done, Phil had the distinct flavor of cheap leather and foot sweat in his mouth.

But at least know he would have a good night's rest... Or so he thought.

Suddenly Becky playfully grabbed her little brother and dragged him to her room.

"Hey, Becky! I gotta get some sleep!"

But Becky only smiled. "Oh, you will, little guy. But tonight you're sleeping in my room." She entered her room and set Phil at the foot of the bed. Phil's bigger sister then took out a small piece of wire and wrapped it around the tiny boy's waist.

"What's this for?" Phil asked. He then watched as Becky placed her enormous, reeking foot next to him. Phil tried to escape, but found his movement limited by the wire. Becky then tied the opposite end of the wire to her big toe.

"There. Now you have to sleep next to my feet," Becky giggled as she carefully laid down on her bed.

"What! Aren't you gonna take a shower first?!"

Becky shook her head. "Nope. I'm doing that in the morning." Phil's big sister then stretched out her arms and rested her head on a pillow. "Come on, little guy," Becky said in a caring, yet teasing, tone. "This will help you. Besides, they're just feet and nothing more." Becky then yawned and within minutes she was snoring.

Phil tried to break free of the wire, but found that it was just too strong. He decided to try and fall asleep, but the pungent aroma of his sister's feet continued to sting his nostrils.

Phil sighed and covered his face with the bed sheets, waiting for morning to come.
12121211212221212222112122.title: A Night with Sister's Feet

choices: Jaz let's Phil put stickers and glitter all over her foot
Jaz plays race car with Phil... Using Aunt Lily's shoe...
121212112122212122221121221.content:
Much of the night was awful for poor Phil. He had nightmares of giant, smelly feet chasing him. And each time he woke up, Phil was confronted by his sister's huge, smelly toes. Eventually, Phil managed to get some sleep.

When he woke up in the moring, the tiny boy realized that he was alone on Becky's bed. The wire was gone, so now he could move around freely. Phil realized that now there was a very strong smell of feet in the air, but he ignored it. The boy was to excited because it was Saturday and he had the whole day to rest. Phil jumped off Becky's bed, and landed into a huge, smelly pile of woman's shoes, sandals and pink socks.

"Oh, gross!" Phil shouted and he pulled off a pair of grass-stained socks from his face. "This wasn't here last night." Phil then noticed that some of the shoes were child-sized, pink, and covered in Hello Kitty stickers.

Phil groaned once again and realized what was going on. He stepped into the kitchen and was greeted by a forest of toes and feet. There stood his mother, big sister, Aunt Lily, and his kid-cousin Jaz. All of them were in their bare feet and getting ready to eat breakfast.

"Morning, little guy," Aunt Lily said suddenly and walk to reached for the tiny boy. Phil never like this part. Aunt Lily was taller and wider than his mom. And her breath usually smelled terrible. She gave Phil a big kiss and set him down on her feet.

"We heard about your strange, new training, Kiddo," Aunt Lily said as she shifted her toes so that Phil's legs were trapped between them. "So took everything off and left it in Becky's room."

Phil groaned and managed to squeeze out from between Aunt Lily's toes. Everyone giggled and then Phil's mother picked him up and gave him a kiss. "Don't worry, we won't be so hard on you today. It's Saturday aster all." Phil sighed, feeling much better.

Becky brought her toes up to Phil, causing him to immediately put his hands over his mouth. Becky chuckled and wiggled her toes. "Go on and give them a sniff. I washed them today. Phil was relunctant, but did as he was told.

Becky was right! Her foot smelled like soap. Phil sighed, jumped on to the table and then quickly atre his breakfast. His favorite cartoons would be shwoing, so he quickly ran into the tv room shortly after.

Phil sat back and relaxed, but his peace was suddenly disturbed as Jaz entered the room and took a seat. Jaz was your typical 10 year old girl. So of course she had many questions to ask.

"Hey, Phil... Why can't I wear shoes in your house no more?"

Phil turned up the volume on the tv using a tiny remote and then turned to look at Jaz.

"It's just for a few weeks, Jaz. I got to get used to the smell of feet so I won't be grossed out by them all the time!"

Jaz smiled and rested one foot next to Phil. Each toe had a tiny Hello Kitty sticker. "Oh, like the time you almost puked up your lunch when I accidentily dropped you in your mother's stinky work shoes?" She smiled and continued to wiggled her toes.

"And-and we made up that little song... um...

Phil's the guy you got to meet!

He's tiny and smells like his mama's feet!

He walks all dizzy where ever he goes

Because he smelled his mother's toes!"

Phil looked disappointed suddenly. He had hoped that Jaz had forgotten about that. "Please, don't remind me of that again," Phil asked and then turned back to look at the tv.

Jaz looked at her toes and wondered how she could help her little cousin with his condition. She smiled as an idea popped in her head.
121212112122212122221121221.title: Aunt Lily and Cousin Jaz

1212121121222121222211212212.content:
Jaz picked up Phil and quickly ran into Becky's room. The tiny boy struggled in the giant hand, but it was no use. "Come on, Jaz!" He screamed. "I don't want to play now. I just want to watch cartoons!"

"But Phil, I just figured out a way that we can have fun and you can get used to the smell of feet!" Jaz entered the room and began digging through the enormous pile of shoes until she found her mother's old sneakers. Well, rather the stench of the shoes for her first.

"Listen, Jaz! It's Saturday! I'm taking a break today!"

But the excited girl didn't hear a word of it. She carefully placed Phil inside his Aunt's shoe. The tiny boy nearly gagged as the foul stench entered his nose. It was like the stink of an old burrito.

"Jaz, how's this fun!?" Phil screamed again and then fell back into the toe section of the foot.

"We're playing race cars!" Jaz said eagerly and then started moving the shoe about. "Vroom! Vvvroom!" Phil tried to hold on tightly. He grasped a pair of shoe laces and wrapped them around his arms. "JAZ!?"

But the girl didn't wasn't paying attention. She sped the smelly "car" and make it crash a few times into a chair. "Come on, Phil!" She said happily. "You have to drive!" Phil sighed and started telling Jaz what to do.

"Go left! Now right! And up, up, up!" Jaz did as her cousin instructed and started whirling about. "Left, left, left, left!" Phil shouted and Jaz spun about until she was dizzy.

"Cool!" Jaz said as her world twirled around her. She accidentily let go of the shoe and sent flying into the kitchen. He landed directly into a small wash tub which his aunt had been using to soak her feet. Phil scrambled to swim through the grey-ish, dirty, foot flavored waters. Suddenly, he felt himself being lifted up from the waters. Looking down, Phil realized that he was on top of his aunt's big toe.

"Hey, there little guy," Becky said as she picked up her little brother. "That's Auntie's foot bath!" Phil groaned and spit up some of the grey waters. Jaz entered the room with a woried look on her face.

"I'm sooo sorry, Phil. I was only trying to help."

Phil sighed, unable to stay mad at her cousin. "You can help me later. But please let me watch my shows first." Jaz nodded and took Phil into the television room.

When Phil's done watching tv....
1212121121222121222211212212.title: Racing in a stinky shoe

choices: Ask if he can go outside and get some air
12121211212221212222112122121.content:
Phil watches the rest of his favorite programs and then looks up to his little cousin. "So what do you want to do know?" He asked, not quite sure what the girl had in mind.

"Let's play house!" Jaz say excitedly and then picks Phil up by the waist. She carries him into his mother's room where she keeps an old doll house.

"I'll be the mommy and you be the daddy," she said as she set Phil down by her feet. He shrugged and walked around the doll house. He never really liked these sissy games, but it made Jaz happy. Turning around, Phil noticed that his cousin was drawing something on the sole of her right foot.

"Umm... What are you doing?" Phil asked, afriad of what the response would be.

Jaz finished and then wrapped yellow yarn around her toes. She brought her foot up to Phil's face. On the sole of the foot, Jaz had drawn a smily face with huge lips.

"Don't you recognize me," Jaz said in a squeaky voice as she wiggled her toes. "I'm your blonde, beautiful wife...um... Toesy!"

Jaz brought her foot closer to Phil, which grossed him out. It was dirty with dust and there was a pink Hello Kitty bandage near her heel where she had stepped on a tack.

"Um... I have to go to work now... so..." Phil tried to back away, but his foot-wife came closer.

"Aren't you going to give me a kiss?" Jaz asked and then started rubbing her foot in Phil's face. The tiny boy muttered something and then wrapped his arms around the giant foot. He then pressed his lips against the foot and gave it a quick peck.

"Aw, isn't that cute!" Phil's mom said as she entered the room, followed by Becky and Aunt Lily. Phil's eyes widened and he moved away from Jaz's feet. "Do that again," Phil's aunt said with a laugh. "I want to take a picture!"

Phil spat on the ground and started shouting. "No way!"

Bcky sat next to Jaz and extended her feet toward Phil. "Hey bro, my foot needs a kiss, too. It's... um... your daughter, Miss Footsie!"

Next, Phil's mom sat down and extended her left foot into Phil's face. It was much large that Becky's and had a stronger aroma. "And my foot shall be the wittle baby... Stinky!" Everyone laughed out loud, except Phil, who was now surrounded by a family of feet. He sighed and wondered what he should do...
12121211212221212222112122121.title: Married to a Foot

121212112122212122221121221212.content:
Phil walked past his mother's huge, somewhat smelly foot and tried to get her attention. "Ma, you said I could have a day off today!" he complained hoping that she would understand his situation.

Phil's mom smiled and leaned down to pick up her son. "Sorry, little guy. I forget how our toes smell 100x worse compared to your size." She then walked with him outside the house, followed closely by Jaz and Becky. She then set him down on top of her feet. The fresh air outside helped to mask the wickedly powerful aroma of shoes and toes. Phil sighed deeply and hopped off his mother's foot.

"Thanks, Mom!" he said happily and then began to walk around the yard. He loved to explore the green grass and look for bugs and other tiny things. He sat back on a rock to relax. He noticed that Becky was standing in the yard and wriggling her toes in the tall grass. Meanwhile, Jaz was busy making dirt clumps in a mud puddle.

Phil decides to...
121212112122212122221121221212.title: Out in the Yard

choices: Janice finds a way to defeat Phil
1212121121222121222212.content:
As the weeks pass, Phil comes to find he's gained a new found respect from the girls in his karate class, and that's spread to much of the rest of the school. Despite their respect though, the girls still don't enjoy losing to Phil. They find their sparing sessions with him to be fun and enjoyable, but they pride themselves on being the best they can be, yet nobody has yet discovered a way to beat the little 2 inch kid and his pebble kung fu.

At midterm, Ms. Li got the attention of the class and introduced a new student: Janice Hodge, from Texas. She spoke with a very strong Texan accent, was average height, but very athletic. She had long wavey brown hair and a curvey body. Janice had taken karate at her former school in Texas and was able to enroll in the Ms. Li's advanced class.

Janice's first match was with Ally, a girl stuck in the middle ranks of the class. Janice beat her handily, but was very friendly with Ally and even helped her off the mat after its conclusion. She then proceeded to work her way up the ladder of the class in the following sessions, until finally she came face to foot with Phil and his Pebble Kung Fu....
1212121121222121222212.title: Everything is Big in Texas....

choices: The girls rush to Phil's aide
12121211212221212222122.content:
The girls were all excited for the session between Janice and Phil. Some wanted to see Phil finally meet his match again, and hopefully learn the true secret to beating him. Other girls were rooting Phil on, hoping he would represent against the newbie.

The match started as most of Phil's matches do, Janice immediately moved to stomp him into the ground. Phil had become an expert at positioning himself so to not get crushed immediatly without losing access to the ball of his opponents foot. Without hesitation, he promptly began his tickle attack with his trademarked "Coochie coo!"

Phil noticed something different about Janice's foot though. Unlike the soles of most of the girls in his class, her feet were rough and calloused. He was worried his pebble attack wouldn't have any affect on the Texan. Soon though Janice started to giggle a little, and lifted her foot from Phil.

"Hee hee....little fellah," she started, "You're goin' to have to do more than tickle me if you think you're gonna win."

With that she brought her foot back down swiftly, covering Phil before he had time to react. She repeated the stomping motion several times, to the audible gasps of the girls watching. She moved to reveal Phil crushed into the mat.

She wasn't done yet though. She lifted Phil off the ground with her toes and tossed him in the air. She bumped him up with her knee with such force that he rose over her head. She did this a few times before finally catching him in her palm.

Turning her palm flat, she flung herself towards the mat, landing face down. Phil lay motionless as she positioned her upper body over him, counted to three as if it were a wrestling match, and declared herself to be the victor!
12121211212221212222122.title: Pebble Style defeated

choices: Phil manages to get close to Janice
Janice ignores Phil, and he is back at the bottom of the class
121212112122212122221222.content:
The girls, while concerned about Phil's well being, marveled at Janice's ability to completely resist his Pebble Kung Fu. They rushed to her side and bombarded her with questions.

"How did you do it?" Julia asked.
"It didn't affect you at all!" Ally said.

Janice just laughed. "Girls...I come from Texas! Ain' no kind of tickle this lil' fella can do that can get to me! I spent years runnin' all over bearfoot in that hot Texas sun. I ain' been tickelish since I was 5 and a half years old!"

This started to sink in to the girls. They had found Phil's weakness, the way to resist his technique. Around town, people started noticing the students of Ms. Li's karate class walking bearfoot, no matter the surface. Gravel, grass, concrete. Soon, they had all built up a callous that was similar to what Janice had when she came into town.

As good as things had gotten for Phil, he had a feeling that they were going to get a whole lot worse very soon. He knew his only option was to get close to Janice, the girl was head and shoulders above the rest of the girls in class. She now had the respect and admiration that he held so briefly.
121212112122212122221222.title: Changing of the Tide

1212121121222121222212221.content:
The next day after class, Phil waited outside the room as everyone was exiting. He couldn't help but stare at the soles of his fellow classmate's feet. The had all become so hard and rough from weeks of running around without shoes. Melissa stopped in front of Phil and wiggled her smelly toes in his face.

"Sorry for beating you so badly today. Looks like you're low man on the totem pole," she teased as she pushed the tiny boy with her big toe.

"More like low man at of stinky tootsies," Julia said suddenly and the girls errupted with laughter.

Phil groaned and waited for Janice to leave class. Phil approached her very large foot and tapped it gently. Janice looked down and giggled.

"Hey there, little fella. You need somethin'?

Phil nodded and Janice sat down suddenly, her butt causing the floor to rumble with a loud thud. Phil then climbed up her calloused foot and sat down in between her toes.

"Listen, Janice. I know you're really big in Texas and you're probably even bigger here. But I'm small and have always been small... Very, very small..." Phil slid down the Texan girl's foot and landed by her ankle. Janice could see that the little boy was barely as tall as her foot.

"Janic, I'm asking you for a favor," Phil continued with a serious tone. "Let me win at least one fight against you. Please..."

Janice patted Phil on his head and shook her head.

"Sorry, cowboy. Can't do it. I'm too proud." She then stood up and began to walk away. "But I'm sure you'll figure out a way to win," she said as she continued to move.

Phil sat down on the cold floor and waited for his big sister to come for him. He could only sigh and begin to think of a new strategy...
1212121121222121222212221.title: A meeting with Janice

12121211212221212222122212.content:
Later that afternoon, Phil decided that it would be best to ask his big sister for more advice. He found Becky in her room, lying on the floor listening to music. Phil walked up to her foot and tickled it.

Becky giggled and looked down to she her little brother. "Hey, bro. What's up?" she asked and then looked down to see the sad expression on his face. "Hey, are you alright?"

Phil shook his head. "There's some new girl in town and she figured a way to beat my Pebble Kung Fu. Now all the girl's feet are so rough and calloused that I can't tickle my way into defeat."

Becky smiled as she crossed her legs. "Now it's time for your next lesson, little guy." She wiggled her toes in front of Phil and giggled.

"Remember that a giant can trip on a pebble. But once he knows the tactics of the pebble, he can easily avoid it..."

Phil shot back a confused glance. "What tactics, Becky? A pebble just stays in one place."

"Exactly!" Becky exclaimed suddenly. "You must revise your technique. No longer can you be a Pebble. You must advance into a Rolling Stone..."

Phil was now even more confused. "You mean like the band?"

Becky giggled again and then picked up the little boy. "Just know this. People have more than one ticklish spot." She then set down her brother on her left foot and continued to listen to music.

Phil was beginning to get an idea in his head to defeat Janice and reclaim his title.
12121211212221212222122212.title: Pebble Kung Fu: Revised

choices: Janice and Phil form a romantic relationship
Janice and Phil join forces against the school bullies
121212112122212122221222121.content:
Class the next day began as it had for the past week. All the girl's crowded around Janice, talking to her and looking up to the Texan as their leader. Phil walked into class, unnoticed by anyone else except Ms. Li.

"Phil, you're tardy!" his teacher shouted at the tiny boy.

"Yeah, but I'm just in time to kick some Texas' butt!"

Janice turned about and frowned. She had great pride in her state and her strength. The Texan stood up and walked over to Phil.

"You wanna start somethin', little fella?" Janice asked with an angry glance. "Ain't nuthin' that can beat rough and tough Texan."

"Oh, right. Just ask the guys at the Alamo..."

Phil's snide remark hit home. Janice charged and attacked with a stmop, but Phil dodged with spectacular backflip. Janice only pressed onward with a sweeping leg kick. Phil jumped and grabbed on to her foot.

"Now I got you!" She screamed and swung out her hand to swat the tiny boy. But Janice only hit a lot of air. Phil and grabbed a hold of her fingers and made his way on her arm and under her long sleeves.

The Texan girl lifted her arm suddenly, sending Phil Rolling down the length of her sleeves until he smashed face first on to her armpit. Janice suddenly realized her mistake as Phil began to tickled her pits and shouted his battle cry: "Cootchie Coo!"

Janice gasped and tried to resist. "Heh heh heh... No fair! Get-get out of there... Hehehehehehee!" The girl dropped to the ground and began rolling around as Phil grappled with the folds of moist flesh under her arms.

"I surrender!" Janice managed to scream. The movement stopped for a moment under her clothes. She could finally breath again. Janice then felt more movement and Phil climbed from under the dank pit and around on to her shoulder blade. Phil walked on top of Janice's chest, which heaved up and down, and looked at his opponent with a happy face.

"I'm sorry what I said about Texas."

Janice grinned and blew a kiss at the tiny boy.
121212112122212122221222121.title: Rolling Stone Kung Fu

choices: Phil asks her on a date to make-up
Too late. Janice has thought of a punishment.
1212121121222121222212221211.content:
For the weeks that followed Janice's defeat, the other girls tried to find a way to thwart Phil's Rolling Stone Kung Fu, but had limited results. The tiny fighter always seemed to escape their grasp and find the most ticklish spot on their body.

Janice's weak spot, of course, were her arm pits. Melissa had a spot under her chubby tummy that was especially ticklish. And Julia's always giggled out of control when ever Phil rubbed her belly button.

The girls eventually calmed down and once again accepted Phil as one of their own. And surprising to them, Janice and Phil seemed to be growing closer and closer together. They would spend the class period simply craking jokes and talking. Some times, Janice would get playful and shove Phil into her cleavage when it was his turn to be called on the list. Phil would reply by gently biting on the Texan girl's toes when she wasn't looking.

The two were in love, but didn't realize it yet. One day, they were sitting down eating their lunch. Phil was seated on top of Janice's shoulder, chewing on his tiny sandwich. Soon, Phil realized that he was staring into the Texan's bright, red lips. He watched as she chewed on an apple and was unable to look away.

"Oh, um... Janice. YOu have something on your lips," Phil teased.

"Really, sugar," she responded with a mouth full of food. Janice then grabbed Phil and brought him toward her lushious lips. "Well, then clean them up, little man."

Phil grabbed on top Janice's lower lip, which was wet with saliva. Without realizing it, he had drawn himself closer and was giving her a deep kiss... So deep that most of Phil's face had passed her mouth and was touching her enormous front teeth.

Janice responded to this by pinching Phil's tiny butt. The boy shouted suddenly and stopped his romantic advance. The Texas girl giggled as she watched Phil rubbing his sore butt.

"Listen, little guy. I like you more 'an any fella I've seen in these parts," she said and then set down Phil. "But you don't kiss a Texan girl before you've had at least a date er two."

Phil became embarrassed and his face turned bright red. Janice only giggled. "Maybe I should punish you for what ye did, honey."
1212121121222121222212221211.title: In love with Janice

Janice smiled and then set the tiny boy down on the table near her left breat. "Keep talkin," she said in a playful way. Phil paused for a moment as a thought popped into his head.

"Well, we can go see a movie and then grab something to eat." Janice like the sound of that. "Well then, darlin', you can pick me up at eight," she said and then placed Phil on her shoulder.

later that evening, Becky drives Phil to Janice's home. "Aw, my little bro is growing up," Becky teases and then parks the car. Phil is looking a little nervous. His fists are clenched and he's breathing is getting harder and harder. Becky picked up her tiny brother and set him on his back.

"So, where are we off to?"
