Phil and Janice had just finished another day of class. The two were laughing as they had told everyone about the date they had last night. Some of the students were grossed out, but still they thought it was funny.

As Phil and Janice were leaving, they noticed that down the hall the science class was having it's annual Science Fair. "Hmmm.... Want to see what's up?" Phil asked from his perch on Janice's shoulder.

Janice nodded tentatively. She really didn't care for science, but still was curious about what kind of presentations were on display.

The couple walked down the hall and saw a variety of boring projects. There was a baking soda volcano, a test of static electricity in balloons, a mouse in a maze, and more of the usual things. Finally at the end of the hall was a science display that was covered in a blue sheet. Working on the display was Morgan, the school's biggest nerd. She had large glasses, big black shoes with rainbow socks that went up to her knees, and braces in her teeth.

"Hey, what do you got there?" Janice asked with some interest. The hidden display was in the shape of the gun, so she could only begin to wonder what was under the blue sheets.

Morgan looked up, sweat on her forehead. She must have been working hard to fix a malfunction. "Oh, this little thing... It's just my size adjuster," she said quickly and then went back to work. "It can switch your size in a snap." Morgan looked up again and frowned. "And I need to fix it but I don't have my screwdriver..."

Morgan walked away and then turned back. "Please make sure no one steals it!"

After Morgan was long gone, Janice lifted the blue sheets and grabbed the silvery gun that was underneath. "Are you sure we should be doing this?" Phil asked.

Janice smiled and set her little friend down. "Ah, don't worry. She just said not to let anyone take it away," the Texan girl said and then started to fiddle with the buttons on the gun. "Besides, wouldn't you like to be BIG!?"

Phil smiled and then extended his arms. "HIT ME BABY!"

Janice aims the gun, fires and...

Phil just let out a depressed sigh.

As soon as she finished saying this she grabbed him and brought him up to her lips and gave him the biggest kiss of his life causing him to blush bright red.

Soon Morgan returned."We made sure your thing is safe." Janice assured her. Morgan was about to thank her when she noticed Phil and began to suspect something. He noticed a much different feel to how Janice was treating him than when Melissa or his sister had tormented him by threatening to eat him. This was not a threat. This was a warm, full bodied embrace.

"Mmmmmmmm" Phil heard Janice humm from deep in the back of her throat as she continued to massage him with her tongue. She worked him back to the front of her mouth and slowly let his body slip out through her mouth. Lingering once again on his face, holding it hostage between her cherry red lips for a few extra seconds.

Finally, as Phil was catching his breath, she said "So...how about that date?"

Phil's response....

choices: "In that case, why don't you do it for me?" she snickered.
"No, I'm sure mine smell worse than yours," she giggled.
1212121121222122.content:
Phil looked up from his sister's giant cupped hands, and saw her unfavorably looking back down at him. She almost rolled her eyes as she looked down at the scrawny, spit covered boy in her hands.

“You can make it up to me in my sock,” she finished, wrapping the fingers of one hand around him and casually walking back to her own table, across the lunchroom. Phil's heart sank – he hadn't really expected her to be nice to him, because she never had been. Putting him in her sock was not the worst thing she'd ever done to him, but it was her favorite way to torture him, by far, and he had already spent many hours of his life being playfully mashed between her smelly toes.

As she arrived and sat down, she dumped him out onto the table, face down.

“Oh!” exclaimed the unfamiliar voice of a teenage girl in front of him, “Is this your little brother?”

Before he could even look up to see the girl's face, a large finger came down on his back, mashing his bare chest into the cold surface of the table. He lifted his head as much as he could, but could only see about up to her chin. She had perfect, curly brown hair coming down a bit past her shoulders, and was already snickering at his plight under her finger.

“Yeah, that's him. He just about got eaten by some freshmen over there, but I saved him,” Becky giggled. “He owes me so I'm gonna put him in my sock for the rest of the day.”

“That's gonna stink,” the unknown girl laughed at his misfortune, while looking the tiny boy over. “They were really going to eat him?” She added, with a chuckle. “Well, I guess I could see that, he looks pretty tasty to me too,” she snickered.

“Let me up...!” Phil whimpered toward the unknown face of the girl pinning him to the cold table. She just giggled in response, as he squirmed, trying to get out from under her finger. It was obvious that he couldn't, and she began playfully rolling her finger all over his back, until he finally gave up, and quit struggling at all.

“Your sister told me you were a wimp, but this is just plain sad,” she teased, as her thumb slid under him and grabbed him by the chest. He found himself between her thumb and forefinger, and felt a lurching feeling in his stomach as he was lifted high in the air, greeted by the giant girl's grinning face, looming just like a billboard in front of him...

Her skin was fair and smooth, and her eyes were pale green, and everything about her face seemed perfect and lovely. She was the most beautiful thing he'd ever seen! Her curly brown hair bounced all around her face, going up and over her forehead, like a rainbow. Her eyes were wide, and she looked playful and innocent compared to the girls he'd been around lately.

“Mind if I have a taste for myself?” she politely asked, with a playful smile.

Phil was mesmerized by the beautiful curves and perfect, almost creamy features of this girl's face. The thought of being overtaken by her gorgeous pink lips, and overpowered by her sticky, slick, sweet tongue was suddenly not at all repulsive. His jaw dropped, and he slowly shook his head that he didn't mind at all.

“No, go at it,” Becky replied.

“Hey look, I think he actually likes the idea,” the giant girl giggled, seeing his response.

“Really?” Becky replied, surprised. “Hmm... he must like you or something,” she snickered.

The girl grinned and looked Phil right in the eyes. “Is that right? Do you like me?” she giggled.

Phil blushed and looked away, suddenly ashamed and embarrassed. Her finger and thumb gave him a quick squeeze, as he found himself being brought closer to her giant face. He looked into her eyes again, and he could see that she was staring intently back into his.

“Aww, that's so cute, he's blushing,” she snickered. “Since you DO like me, I think I should make this a little more fun for us,” she smiled. With that, she suddenly brought her plastic fork underneath him with the bottom of it facing toward her.

“Hey... what are you doing!” Phil yelled, suddenly afraid that he was about to be skewered from below.

“I'm not going to stab you, just wait...” she said, focusing on what she was doing. She took her thumb and bent the two middle prongs away from her, toward Becky, and slid the tiny boy in right where they had been. His back was resting on the prongs, but he was about to slide off until she repositioned her thumb on his chest, suddenly putting all the pressure bending back the two prongs on his body as well.

“Now little boy, just spread out your arms, and your legs...” she continued, starting to chuckle. He did as she said, and suddenly the fork snapped back to its normal position as she released her thumb from his chest. His arms and legs were caught, rather painfully, by the prongs of the fork at each end.

“Perfect...!” she happily finished. She turned the fork around, with the bottom of it facing Becky to show her the result of her actions. Phil was caught in the fork, staring at his sister's delighted face, unable to move at all.

“That's awesome!” Becky exclaimed. “I didn't realize I could do that – we'll being doing this all the time from now on, when we're at home, twerp,” she snickered. Phil began to struggle against the plastic of the fork, but there was nothing he could do. He was quite stuck.

“And now...” the girl continued, twirling the fork back around so she could see him, “I hope you like pudding, 'cuz you're about to get more of it than you can handle, little boy,” she snickered.

The next thing he knew, he was being plunged into a cup of dark, brown pudding – something he was already familiar with – and after a moment of being submerged in the sweet chocolate, he felt himself lifting out of it. His body was covered in it, even his face, and he couldn't see a thing until a huge, warm, slick object blanketed his body and slid across him, from bottom to top. He was left with a layer of sticky saliva all over his body, mixed with pudding, and he looked forward to see the huge, almost goofy grinning face of the beautiful girl who had just licked the pudding off of him.

Before he could think to speak, she laughed and plunged him back into the pudding. He got it in his mouth this time, and swallowed a few mouthfuls of the sweet chocolate himself before he was out of the pudding again. This time he could hear it coming as she giggled, but there was nothing he could do as she ran him along her tongue. He opened his eyes in time to see the overwhelming sight of her enormous tongue, finishing its sticky invasion of his tiny body, but he only got a glance at her beautiful grinning face before she laughed and he was plunged into her pudding again.

After his third trip from the pudding cup to her awaiting tongue, the girl stopped and looked at the tiny boy who was caught in her pudding smeared fork, gasping to catch some air. “You don't even know my name, do you?” she smiled, a bit amused at the fact. “I'm Kristen, pleased to meet ya,” she giggled.

“More like 'pleased to eat ya',” Becky added from across the table, with a chuckle.

Kristen cocked her head to the side a little, and stuck out her tongue again, this time covering the tiny boy's face with the end of it. She rubbed it around on his face for a few seconds, before she quit and returned her tongue to her grinning mouth. “Mmmmm...!” she teased, as she plunged him into her pudding again, continuing their routine of dipping a licking.

It went on for several more rounds, with the giant girl barely giving the tiny boy enough time to get a gasp of air before he was plunged back into the pudding and she took him out for another slimy trip across her awaiting tongue. Becky just sat there and watched as her brother was overtaken again and again by her friend's giant tongue. Kristen did it so many times that Becky began to get bored of it. Finally Kristen stopped as she heard her teacher yelling for her students to go back to class.

“Here, I gotta go throw my crap away,” she said, as she handed the fork over to Becky, and scooted the pudding across to her as well. “I'll be right back,” she said, as she walked to throw away her trash.

Phil suddenly felt sick to his stomach, as the fork turned and he faced the familiar sight of his sister, slouching in front of him, with an expression on her giant face simply of boredom. She began to grin, however, as she stared into her tiny brother's eyes.

“My turn, twerp,” she proclaimed with a smirk, before she opened her mouth and her tongue descended, creating a giant pink U-shape over her bottom lip. He felt like he would puke, as her slimy, awaiting tongue became larger and larger in his vision, until he was looking up his snickering sister's nostrils as she finally pressed him into her tongue with the fork.

She ran her tongue flat across his body and the fork, left-to-right, as he coughed and hacked, and actually gagged a few times. It made him so sick to be totally overpowered by his sister and forced against her tongue – It had felt different when Kristen did it, he thought.

Before he knew it, his sister was repeating Kristen's game of dunking him into the pudding and licking it off – and it was making Phil sicker and sicker with every round. He had almost liked it as Kristen was doing it – her face was so beautiful and being pressed to her tongue as she giggled at him didn't feel gross at all. When it was Becky's face greeting him from every slimy, humiliating lick, he just wanted to puke.

“S-stop it Beck-eck-y!” he finally called out, even though he knew it was useless.

“No,” she said, dunking him back into the pudding. On the next lick, she took extra care to rub her slimy tongue all over him for an extra long time. He caught glimpses of her taut upper lip and her teeth, grinning evilly, as she pummeled him one last time with her tongue. When she finished, she pulled him back from her face a bit, and spoke again. “Just give up, you know I can do whatever I want to you, twerp,” she smirked down.

“I know you can... you're the boss, Becky...” he conceded.

“And speaking of that, are you ready to go in my sock and get squashed by my big, smelly toes all day?” she added, with an enthusiastic grin. He looked her in the eyes – he knew better than to tell the truth and make her mad.

“Yes, Becky...” he replied, defeated.

“OK then!” she smiled, then leaned forward and gave him one last giant humiliating lick. She then pulled him out of the prongs of the fork rather forcefully, and dumped him onto the cold table again as she brought her foot up to seat with her and began unlacing her sneaker.

Kristen returned about that time, and sat down again across from Becky. “You putting him in your sock now?” she asked, with a grin.

“Yup,” Becky replied. Phil looked up at the beautiful, curly haired girl, pleading with his eyes for help. He didn't find any hope in her eyes, though – although sweet, she seemed to be excited at the prospect of seeing the tiny boy get squashed between his own big sister's toes.

“You're lucky it's not MY sock you're getting trapped in – my feet never smell very good,” she giggled.

Becky then looked over at the pretty brunette, and with a grin said...
1212121121222122.title: Becky's Friend and Pudding

choices: Kristen is saving him from Becky's feet...
12121211212221221.content:
“In that case, why don't you do it for me?” Becky snickered.

“Do what?” Kristen replied, looking confusedly at Becky.

“Wear him in your sock. Squash him between your toes, I'll even let you take him home tonight,” Becky grinned. Kristen glanced down at the little boy with a mischievous smile, who suddenly looked very frightened of her.

Phil, suddenly not liking the way things were going, began to protest.

“Becky, I don't - ” he managed to say, before he was caught in his big sister's hand.

“You don't what, twerp?” she said, quickly bringing him up to her face. Her thumb was behind his head, and her fingers were wrapped around his body. “Shut up while the big people decide what to do with you,” she finished, dropping him into her fist, squeezing him tightly.

Kristen watched as the tiny boy struggled for air in his sister's hand, giggling at his plight.

“I'd love to have him between my toes all day,” She smiled, “But I can't. I'm not even wearing socks today,” she replied. “See?” she added, lifting her foot up in the air – she was barefoot. The bottom of her foot was dirty and dusty, from walking barefoot on the cafeteria floor.

“Did you wear any sandals?” Becky asked.

“Right here,” Kristen said, leaning over and pulling them out from under the table. They were black, wire-bed sandals. Becky could see Kristen's dirty footprints on the dark surface of them.

“Hmm...” Becky said, starting to snicker. She grabbed her tiny little brother, and shoved him into the wire-bed in the middle of the sandal. After some wrestling him down with her fingers, he was lying face up, exhausted, entangled in the wires in the wire-bed of the sandal. He looked up to see two pretty faces grinning down at him. They were both the same age, three years older than him.

Soon, he found himself looking up from the floor, at the same two giggling girls staring down at him. Kristen hovered her dirty sole above the tiny boy, slowly lowering it until it was right above him. The smell emanating off of her foot smelled like the dirty, dusty floor of the cafeteria. And just as he heard her giggle at him, he felt her cold sole slide onto the surface of the sandal, pressing down on the wires until her smelly sole came into contact with his body.

“Make him lick your foot clean,” Becky suggested, with a laugh.

“I will, but I have to go, I'm gonna be late for class,” Kristen said.

“No problem, just stomp him enough times and he won't be able to move, so he won't be able to get away,” Becky replied.

“Okay,” Kristen giggled. “See ya then!”

“Yeah, have fun with him!” Becky replied.
12121211212221221.title: Kristen's Dirty Feet

121212112122212211.content:
Kristen's giant dirty sole crushed him beyond belief, as she stood up and started walking back to her class. Before he could begin to take in the stunning force of initially being stepped on, she had already taken a second step, mashing his little body down hard into her sandal again. And before he could even cry out from being smashed a second time, her dirty foot had landed upon him, yet again – and his cry was muffled.

He was left feeling like his ribs were about to crack under her weight, because she just stood on him, not stepping off.

“Hey Becky!” Kristen called, after she stopped. “I have a little sister – would it be okay if she played with him too when I get home?”

“Oh yeah, that's fine!” Becky called back. “Have no mercy!” she laughed, cruelly.

Kristen smiled back, before she turned and started off again toward her classroom.

As she continued walking down the hall, there was nothing he could do as his body was crushed under her huge footfalls. The only possible path out of the wire of the sandal was to go up – and Kristen's dirty foot filled his vision in that direction, continuing to pulverize his tiny body under every step.

She walked down the hallway, obviously not caring that there was I tiny boy under her right foot, being crushed under every step she took. His vision began to grow blurry and his chest began to ache from being slammed so hard, so many times. Lifting his arms and legs had already become an impossible task, as they had been smashed under her first few steps, when he had used them to try to protect this torso.

'She doesn't care,' he thought, as he watched her dirty sole descend on him once again. 'I'm gonna die under her foot, and she doesn't care. This is like a big joke to her,' he despaired in his mind. As her foot came down on him, his body was again mashed under Kristen's crushing weight. He felt and heard one of his ribs crack, and his scream of pain was broken as well, as her foot depressed his lungs pushing out all the air. Silent tears rolled down his face, as her foot rose and came down once again. As she mashed him under another step, pain shot through him like a knife, and seeing her foot raise up again he braced himself, knowing there would be another painful step, and then another, and another...

...After nearly trampling the tiny boy out of his mind with her short walk to the classroom door, she finally came to a stop. Her foot slid out of her sandal, finally giving the little boy a chance to breathe. The black wire of the sandal, with the pressure let off, was returning to it's natural position, but after being stepped on so many times Phil was totally immobile. There would be no escape from Kristen's giant feet, at all, he realized. Looking straight up, he could see her beautiful face grinning down at him.

She had such pretty features, but he could also see her dirty sole hovering above him as well, reminding him of the playful torture she was putting him through. Her curly brown hair dangled all around her face as she snickered down at his plight.

“My foot smell good?” she quietly teased, bouncing it above him. He didn't reply, he just looked up at her face, with tears rolling down the sides of his eyes. He was in disbelief – he had only just met this girl, fallen in love with her, and now he had been stomped to a pulp underneath her dirty feet.

Her eyes looked into his, but all he saw in her eyes was amusement at his predicament. “Well?” she continued, with a chuckle. She began to lower her giant sole toward him again, and the dusty, dirty smell got stronger. He could see every speck of dirt, every imperfection and flaw in the bottom of her foot coming closer, and higher above he could see her beautiful face grinning down – it was too much to take, he closed his eyes, and before he knew it, he felt the pressure of her foot on him, and after it slid across his body, he felt it come to a stop.

She then slowly raised her heel until it was propped up in the air, leaving tiny Phil with a startling view of her slender, dusty, threatening sole; and the rim of her dark bluejeans dangled around it.

From high above, he heard the sound of Kristen quietly trying to turn the doorknob, with no luck.

“Crap, I'm too late...” she said, under her breath. She paused for a moment, considering knocking, as she bounced her foot up and down, teasing the tiny boy underneath it.

“They're just watching a movie... ... Screw it. I'm skipping...” she finally said under her breath, as Phil's world spun around and the dirty sole suddenly came back down on him, ending his moment of peace. He was crushed extra hard as she intentionally used that foot to take off, heading down the hallway... now to a new destination, one which he didn't know.
121212112122212211.title: Crushed Under Kristen

1212121121222122112.content:
What Phil didn't know as his body was further pulverized under the crushing, smelly sole that kept coming down on his tiny form was that Kristen had meant that she was skipping the rest of the day, not just a single class period. Her only other classes that day were gym and algebra, and she knew for a fact that they wouldn't be doing anything in algebra but watching another movie.

Phil, however, tears streaming down his face and flattened to a pulp, was unable to continue enduring such torment. He passed out, seeing the horrible, dirty sole crashing down on him again...

---------

“Hey!” Phil heard, a loud voice above him, something large poking his stomach. “Wake up kid!” she continued. He opened his tiny, disoriented eyes, and saw her two giant, beautiful eyes, and a huge grinning face high, high above him. It was Kristen, her giant big toe hovering dangerously overtop of him. “You're missing my giant feet!” she exclaimed, opening the door to her car to drive home.

Her dirty sole found its way back to the sandal, crushing his tiny body again. He felt numb until the full pressure was on, and then the pain swelled, and the smell seemed to mix with it in his mind. He could hear her giggling above, and thought he would pass out again, but he didn't.

Soon Kristen was in the driver's seat, the car door closed, the car started and the radio on. Phil was incredibly thankful that the pressure was off, but it only gave him an opportunity to experience the smell of her enormous sole as she pressed him down into the sandal, working the gas and brake.

“Hey, I have a question for ya',” she finally said, turning the music down at a red light and moving her smelly foot out of his view for a second. “Wanna be my boyfriend?” Just as she asked it, the light turned green, and her foot slammed down on tiny Phil as she hit the gas. “I could show you how to make out when we get to the house, nobody will be home this early,” she giggled, while grinding her foot into the sandal as she spoke, painfully crushing him.

Oh, the thought of being Kristen's tiny little boyfriend was not an unpleasant one for tiny Phil; it certainly beat his current position, a tiny bug being squashed underneath her smelly feet, but that itself made him weary about agreeing. Kristen wasn't as bad as Becky, but if he agreed to be her boyfriend, she could become a regular tormentor in his already rough life.

Finally she reached her house, smiling as she stomped the hell out of his tiny body all the way to the front door. Once she got inside she finally kicked off the sandals and reached down, plucking the tiny boy out from the wire bedding. His chest was flattened, his arms dangled limply at his sides; he looked like he'd been put through hell. “Aww! You're so adorable!” she grinned at the broken little boy in her palm, as she walked to the kitchen sink. She brought his helpless little frame up to her nose, and sniffed him lightly. “You smell like dirt,” she giggled.

Soon he was put through a quick rinse in the sink, Kristen's giant hands rubbing soap all over his weak, broken little body. There was nothing he could do but just let her, although it wasn't really that bad. After she finished, she brought him over to the counter and dried him off with a rag. The house was eerily silent besides the towering titaness in front of him. “So, have you decided yet?” she grinned, her curly brown hair dangling over him, so beautifully. He couldn't move or sit up, so broken already.

Did he really want this girl to be his giant girlfriend from now on, was that really a wise choice?
1212121121222122112.title: Kristen, Phil's New Girlfriend?

choices: Kristen hears her parents come home.
12121211212221221121.content:
But what if Phil said no? He was alone with the giant girl in her house where no one could find him or help him. She could do anything she wanted with him. "Okay" Phil said as his chest filled back up with air "On one condition."
"What sweetie," Kristen asked beaming down at him.
"Don't walk on me anymore."
Kristen thought for a minute. "Okay," she said excitedly. She brought Phil up to her chest and held him there. The feeling of being held gently against her breast was preferable to her sole any day. After Kristen decided she had enough of that, she brought Phil to her lips and smothered him with kisses. Her breath smelled like the bubble gum she had just been chewing. The sudden change was puzzling and a little bit disturbing to Phil. How could a girl be so cruel and then so gentle? "You know what I love?" Kristen asked.
"What?" Phil say nervously.
"Bondage," she whispered as she closed her fingers around Phil. She pulled a string out and hog tied the tiny boy and put him on the counter. Phil hand to strain his neck just to see above Kriesen's waist.
"What are you doing?" Phil demanded. "Let me go!" Kristen seemed to ignore Phil as she carried him up to her bedroom and set him on her comforter.
"What are you doing to me?" Phil demanded. Kristen said nothing but laid down so that her face was next to Phil.
From a nearby dresser, she grabbed a bottle of honey and poured it over Phil. Then her cavern-like mouth opened up and sucked Phil in, cleaning all of the honey off of him the the slimey tongue that he had become so familliar with at lunch. He could hear moans coming from the back of her throat. When she spit Phil out, he looked up at her flawless face with a disgusted look.
"What?" she said, reading his expression. "That's how you make out with someone." She then sat up on her knees in front of Phil. "I wonder what we should do next?" she thought aloud.
12121211212221221121.title: A less than perfect couple

choices: "Put on your shoes, we're all going camping."
"Me and your mother are going out, so you need to watch your sister."
121212112122212211211.content:
Phil could only stare straight ahead at Kristen's gigantic blue-jean knees, pressing down into her enormous bed. She didn't speak for a little while... He knew she was pondering what to do with him next. As she thought, he felt her enormous finger caressing his back. His giant new “girlfriend” was admiring him, amazed at him and just how easily she had turned him into her human jolly-rancher. She was taking it in... he was her new possession.

“Kristen, please, just untie me,” she heard his tiny voice finally squeak.

“I... um...” she started. “Oh,” she giggled, “No way!” She had nearly been in a trance, it seemed, as her finger had slid again and again across his tiny, honey-saliva-covered back. Her finger finally stopped, and she quickly grabbed him and flipped him over. Upside down, his girlfriend's perfect, grinning face leaned into view. “I'm nowhere NEAR done playing with you yet, sweetie!” she giggled.

“This isn't fair!” Phil cried.

“What?” the giant girl giggled down, “I thought you said you liked me! Admit it, you liked being in my mouth...”

“Just untie me!” he began to sob.

“What's your problem!” Kristen retorted. “I know your sister has been a lot meaner than this to you, and I've even agreed to keep my feet away from you!” she added. Just after she said that, she hopped up and ran to the window. “Looks like my family's pulling in the driveway, so I only have a few more minutes alone with you,” she grinned, turning back towards Phil, hogtied on the bed.

“Fine, since you APPARENTLY don't like doing these things my way, I'll untie you...” she reached down and tugged on a few strings until they became loose. As she pulled away the strings, she lifted him up into her soft palms up to her beautiful face. Her giant tongue slid out of her mouth as she laughed, exhaling her hot breath on the tiny boy who was being shoved closer and closer. As she shoved him in her mouth again, was was suddenly surrounded by her hot, sticky saliva. To Kristen's delight he fought back, so she mashed him to the roof of her mouth with her tongue and started sucking harder and harder. He finally quit fighting, at which point she opened her mouth and spit him out in her hand.

She giggled as he coughed up her spit and sputtered in her hand.

“I'm gonna have to hide you somewhere, kiddo, cause my family's home. But... since I had to give up what I wanted when I untied you, I've decided that any FOOT stuff is completely fair, honeybunn,” she grinned. She clasped her soft hand around his saliva covered body before he could protest, and walked over to her sock drawer. “This is what your sister wanted me to do to you in the FIRST place,” she grinned.

The next thing Phil knew, he was being dangled over one of Kristen's white cotton socks, and plummeting to the bottom he heard her giggling as she improvised a little tune:

“My feet were made for walking...
...and that's just what they do...
...my big-old-giant dirty feet, will walk all over you!”

The sock swung back and forth as she walked back to the bed and sat down. He looked up the long tunnel of the sock, at his beautiful girlfriend's face, her curly brown hair dangling down. She gave him one last wink, before she went out of sight and he instead saw something very familiar at the top of the tunnel... her giant dirty toes.

Her toes entered the sock and he could instantly smell the dirt and sweat, just what he'd smelled when she walked on him earlier. He helplessly watched as she slid her foot further and further into the sock, bringing him him closer and closer to her smelly toes. Before he knew it, he had been touched by them, and they quickly wrapped around him and started squeezing his sticky, spit-covered body. He felt the sock pull tight around him, and heard her voice high above:

“Aww! Perfect, you fit perfect!” Kristen giggled, “We must be meant to be!” she added, as she wiggled her stinky toes around him, forcing the smell into the tiny boy's nostrils. He tried to open his mouth to speak, but couldn't get a word out with Kristen's sweaty, grimy toes wiggling around, muffling every word.

“Now you're my toejam, huh?” she teased. “Phil is his girlfriend's toejam!” she sang, mockingly, as she hopped up off the bed and started walking around. The extra weight added more pressure. “You're nothin' compared to me, kiddo,” Kristen continued teasing. “So lick my feet, you insignificant worm!” she giggled, trying to get into it. “I'm your queen, little slave boy, so you must do everything I say!” she continued, giggling at her own antics. “Lick my beautiful feet! NOW!” she teased, and to her surprise actually felt his tiny tongue, weakly licking between her second and third toe, even as she playfully squashed him between them.

Suddenly came a knock on the door, and someone entered:

“Kristen, what are you doing in here?” came a man's voice. It was her father.

“...Nothing,” Kristen replied, suddenly very hushed and silent. Her smelly toes wrapped tightly around the captive little boy.

After an awkward silence, he finally spoke again...
121212112122212211211.title: His "Girlfriend's" Toejam...

1212121121222122112112.content:
Her Dad looked at her as if she was hiding something. "Anyway I almost forgot to tell you, but your mother and I are going out for a while." Kristin was excited when she heard this and asked, "Really? Where to? How long?" Her dad sighed and replied

"We'll be gone for the week actually. They told us that we should spend some time alone. Time away from work and the kids. It's supposed to keep our relationship strong." Kristin, while very excited about the news, was mad about one thing. "Why didn't you tell us earlier?" Her father scratched his chin and said, "Guess it just slipped our minds." He said and then laughed. Kristin simply rolled her eyes at how absent minded her father was. "Anyway, we'll be trusting you to keep the house in order and watch over your little sister." "Don't worry, Shelly will be fine." Kristin replied.

After another hour of explanations and farwells, Kristin's parents left. Now Phil was alone in this house with Kristin and her 8 year old sister, Shelly.
"Kristin, where is mom and dad going?" her sister asked. "They're going to be doing grown up stuff for a week so we get the house to ourselves." Kristin answered. "And speaking of which. Look what Becky let me borrow." Kristin then removed her sandel and Shelly looked in shock at the tiny figure gasping for air and tears leaving tiny trails in his very dirty face.

"Is he.... real?" "Yes." Kristin replied, "He's Beckey's 'little' brother. I'm going to call her to see if we can keep him longer. Why don't you play with him while I do that."

Is Shelly nice or cruel to Phil?
1212121121222122112112.title: A WEEK!?!?

choices: Queen Kristin tortures Phil between her royal buttcheeks.
They take turns suffocating Phil under their giant smelly feet.
12121211212221221121122.content:
Phil's view was of the enormous 8-year-old's big, wide eyes, as her face grew larger and larger in his vision. He started to cry; he'd never trusted kids younger than him, especially since he had a cruel little cousin that tormented him on a regular basis. He tried to roll up into a ball to protect himself, but her giant index finger came down on his belly, preventing any further movement. The breath was knocked out of him – she had no concept of how much force she was applying to his tiny body.

“COOOL!” she squealed. “I've heard about you before, but I never actually thought I'd meet you!” she added. “Why were you under my sister's foot?” she giggled.

Phil coughed and pushed against her finger, helplessly. He finally gave up, and just stared upward towards the cute little girl's giant face. “She put me there,” he managed to cough out.

“WHY?” she inquired.

“Because my sister told her to,” Phil replied again.

“WHY?” she repeated.

“...Because she thought it'd be funny,” Phil answered again, becoming quite annoyed. The girl's eyes were large and fixed on him, and her finger still held him flat to the floor.

“Why did she think it'd be funny?” she again repeated.

“I don't know! And stop it, you're crushing me!” Phil finally protested.

“NO!” she giggled. “I'm bigger than you, so you can't tell me what to do, you stupid little boy!” she busted out laughing. Suddenly she grinned from ear to ear. Before Phil could say a thing, he'd been lifted high in the air, and was hovering over her giant grinning face.

“Stop it!” Phil screamed, dangling by one leg.

“Nope! You look like candy to me, and I'm the boss!” she squealed.

Her giant pink tongue extended out of her mouth, and Phil peered down into the dark depths of Shelly's throat. “PLEASE, DON'T!” Phil cried, starting to sob... but it did no good, before he could say anything else, her giant lips had passed and closed behind him. She shoved him to the roof of her mouth, with her giant tongue, and started sucking on his exhausted body like a jollyrancher.

After about 5 minutes of being tossed, sucked on, drowned in spit, and deafened by the giant girl's giggles, she spat him out in her hand. As he looked up, he saw Kristin's grinning face upside down, grinning down at him along with Shelly.

“Your sister said yes!” Kristin squealed.

“YAY!” Shelly grinned as well, handing Phil over to his giant girlfriend, who was now grinning down at him almost evilly.

“You're in for a long, long, long week, little peasant boy,” Kristin giggled, as she bent down and sat him on the carpet. He rolled over on his back, and looked up her towering long legs to her beautiful face, blocking the light of the lightbulb on the ceiling.

“Remember, I'm Queen Kristin, and this is my sister, Princess Shelly! You'll have to call us that all the time, or you'll be punished severely, little boy!”

"Kristin, please... please... (sob)... just let me go home!" Phil cried. He reached up towards her pretty face, and watched as her smile grew.

"Already disobeying the queen, I see. We now have no choice but to punish thee for this, tiny peasant boy!" she grinned. She looked completely, utterly delighted as she grinned down... Shelly started to giggle. Obviously Kristin already had some sort of humiliation in mind.
12121211212221221121122.title: Queen Kristin and Princess Shelly

choices: They Want to Play "Princess vs Peasant"
They Want to Play "Climb the Queen"
121212112122212211211221.content:
Suddenly, Kristin reached for Phil, and grabbed him before he could make a run for it. She clutched him tightly, and there was no way she was gonna loosen her grip.

"How do you think our little peasant boy should be punished Princess Shelly?" Kristin asked her sister. Shelly thought about it for a moment, Phil being amazed at just how many thoughts an 8 year old could have about torturing a tiny kid.

"Sit on him!" she exclaimed. Kristin smiled. "Well, if you say so!" was the reply. Phil was mortified. Kristin moved Phil towards her gigantic butt, lifting up her skirt, revealing her gigantic panties. Without hesistation, Kristin placed him in, placing him between her buttcheeks.

"Now comes the fun part!" Kristin exclaimed, sitting down on a nearby chair. The force in which she sat down knocked the wind out of him, her buttcheeks already pinning him down and slowly suffocating him.

Kristin moved the lower part of her body around, so Kristin could attempted to give Phil a feel of every part of her butt. Needless to say, Phil was nearly smothered thanks to the gigantic flesh.

After what seemed like forever, Kristin removed Phil from her panties and smiled. "Has the peasant learned his lesson?" She asked. "Yes, oh Queen Kristin, I have" Phil replied, sarcastically.

"I don't appreciate sarcasm. But at least you're following the rules", she replied. Shelly was delighted that Phil was being hurt, much to Phils shock. "I wanna sit on him!" She exclaimed.

"Princess, he hasn't done anything to deserve that again...yet" replied Kristin, much to Phil's delight. "However, if he disobeys us again, then you can punish him", which pleased Shelly.

Kristin placed Phil back on the ground again. "So what do the royal family want to do now with the peasant..."
121212112122212211211221.title: Buttcheek Torture...

choices: Becky (Phil's cruel big sister) comes over to visit...
The girls go three days on their own...
1212121121222122112112211.content:
While the two giantesses thought, a thought came to the tiny boy's mind. He now had one advantage over his two giant captresses... Shelly's immaturity. She was obviously very eager to get her hands on him... what if he could use that against her? He cupped his hands and yelled up at her.

“Princess Shelly, I'll let you punish me however you want if you can beat me at a game of chess!” Phil called. He had played chess with his mother since he was younger than she was, and was actually quite good at it, despite his small size. His mother would lift him up in her hand, and show him the board, but he always insisted on pushing the pieces around himself. “But if I win, you've both gotta leave me alone for the next three days.” he bargained.

“Alright!” she grinned down, her eyes narrowing... she was obviously thinking of some horrible punishment she could administer if she won. She sniffed – her nose was running horribly, and she saw as Phil gagged when saw snot seeping out of her nostrils. “What! I have allergies!” she protested.

“Why don't you just blow your nose? Gross,” Phil coughed. It really did make him sick, he couldn't stand the sight of mucus and snot.

“Fine... then I've decided,” Shelly spat.

"What will it be, then?" Phil called up to her.

“Well... I'll do it, and when I win, I'm keeping you in my hankie for the next three days." she started to smirk. "I'll be able to blow my nose on you anytime I feel like it, and THEN I'll make you eat my snot and boogers until I'm satisfied,” she proclaimed, suddenly grinning from ear to ear. “THEN I'll wrap you up real tight in my hankie with all my boogers and snot still in there, and you'll hafta stay that way, in my pocket for THREE DAYS – except for when I take you out to blow my nose again!” She giggled hysterically.

Phil grimaced, as he looked up at Kristin. Her brown, bouncy hair was as pretty as ever, but the look on her face was one of pure delight. “Hehe... a hankie slave,” she giggled. “Sounds like there's gonna be a competition between the Princess and the peasant...” she said, mockingly hovering her dirty foot over tiny Phil. He could smell the familiar scent of her sole... it was humiliating to even look up at her with her giant foot hovering so close overhead.

“I'll get the chess set!” Shelly exclaimed, as she ran out of the room. Within a couple seconds, she was already back. “I getta be white, tho'!” Shelly demanded, prancing back into the room with the chess set in hand.

“Fine, I don't care, there's no way you'll beat me at chess,” Phil agreed. “You can be white, it doesn't matter. I don't care how gross your punishment is, it doesn't matter,” Phil said confidently. Kristin giggled.

The chess set was tossed down on the carpet in front of tiny Phil. As the giant girls pulled out the board, and started setting up the pieces, Phil began to notice that there was an important piece not being placed on his side...

“Hey! Where's my queen!” Phil complained.

“The black queen's been missing for a while,” Kristin snickered, biting her bottom lip.

“Yeah, tough luck, loser! You're gonna be eating my snot for three days straight when I beat you!” Shelly grinned, positioning herself cross legged across the board, with her full set of pieces, queen included.

“This isn't fair!” Phil cried.

“She's eight,” Kristin countered. “This makes it more even.”

“Kristin!” Phil cried again.

“...That's QUEEN Kristin,” she replied, as she plucked one of his rooks from the board, hovering it just out of his reach. “And you just lost another piece, peasant boy.” There was nothing Phil could do; he chose to keep his mouth shut, to avoid making things worse.

“Hehe!” Shelly giggled, as she pushed a pawn forward. “Go! Go! Go!” she started chanting, as Phil stumbled onto the board, and over to his set of giant pieces. He literally had to “shove” his pawn forward two squares, and Shelly immediately moved another one, barely giving him time to rest. “Go! Go! Go!” she started again. Phil just rolled his eyes, and pushed on forward.

It was a long, hard game of chess for Phil. The girl seemed to know more about chess than he'd expected, and he wasn't getting the “big person” perspective of the whole board that his mother would always allow him by picking him up. Before he knew it, Shelly had gotten his other rook with her bishop because he couldn't see the opening for the other pieces

“You're gonna be my SNOT SLAVE!” she giggled, as she intentionally pushed him onto his back as she moved her white queen past him. “Check!” she grinned, licking her lips intimidatingly at his tiny figure, sprawled out on the squares. He got up and made the only move he saw... pushing his king out of check. As soon as he had finished, she immediately moved again, taking his last remaining knight. “CHECK AGAIN, snot boy!” she giggled. “You're already beat 'cha know!”

Phil began to realize that he had dug himself into a deep hole, and that there was no way out. Three days of eating that giant brat's snot... why did he ever make that bet? He slunk forward, and pushed his king out of the way again, as he looked up at that rotten, delighted grin on her face. As she took her queen in her hand, he saw her winning move, and saw that she'd seen it for a while. Thinking back on it, it was actually a very simple set of moves that led her to victory, but without a way of seeing the whole board he hadn't been able to recognize it.

“CHECKMATE!!” she squealed, reaching down and grabbing the tiny boy to her giant face. “CHECK-MATE-CHECK-MATE!” she sang, hurting his ears.

“She plays chess on the computer all the time, you coulda' beat her at anything else,” Kristin laughed.

“HEHE!” she giggled, her giant mouth making him want to cover his ears. His arms were pinned to their sides, struggling would do no good at this point. She reached down into her jean pocket, and pulled out a white handkerchief with the decoration of a pink butterfly on the side. Before he knew it, it was spread out behind him, and he was dumped out onto it like it was a giant sheet. He felt the cupping of her hands underneath the handkerchief, and he was raised closer towards her gigantic, bratty, grinning face.

“Please don't!” Phil cried, spying the snot just barely up in her nostrils.

“NO WAY LOOOZER! THREE DAYS!” she chuckled, as she pulled him upward and covered her nose with the giant handkerchief. He was positioned directly in front of her giant nose, and then there was darkness. He heard giant mouth below him filling her lungs, and then:

Phil was instantly covered in layers upon layers of Shelly's mucus and snot... The sound was SO LOUD, but immediately muffled by the nasty flem that was all around him. He reached his arms out... trying to reach outside of the giant ball of snot that he was suddenly being drowned in. All he pulled back was several long, stringy boogers, which became tangled around his arms.

As he opened his eyes, his view was blurry but amazingly he could see... Shelly's giant grinning face was distorted, but enormous above him. He could hear her muffled laughter. “...EAT..IT!” she commanded, laughing hysterically. The next thing he knew, he felt a horrible, horrible crushing pain all around him... Shelly had squeezed the hankie in her fist, as tight as she could.

Phil started to cry, as light again entered the snot-filled butterfly hankie. There was now not as much snot covering him, but the boogers were still wrapped around his limbs, and a thin layer of snot was all over him. “EAT MY BOOGERS, NOW!!” Shelly ecstatically squealed. There was nothing he could, do... as he cried, he pulled one of the stringy boogers up to his face, and bit off a chunk.

It was salty, and surprisingly not horrible tasting. He started sobbing... he was eating a bratty little giantess 8-year-old's BOOGER, and it wasn't all that bad. Suddenly realizing that he *could* stand to put the horrible looking, slimy thing in his mouth, chew it up, and swallow it, he started shoving the rest of it into his mouth.

Shelly giggled and giggled, as she watched Phil lying on her hankie, weakly filling his mouth with her slimy, snot covered boogers. Kristin laughed from a distance, delighted to see Phil's newest misadventure had ended so perfectly.

“EWWW! YOU'RE SO GROSS!!” Shelly mocked, obviously getting him back for calling her gross earlier. Her face was huge in Phil's vision. “You loser,” she giggled. “We'll do this again later, but for now, you're gonna be stuck in my pocket,” she grinned, as she started wrapping Phil up tightly in her snot-filled hankie.

She scrunched the hankie up tighter and tighter. Phil was covered in the 8-year-old girl's snot, he could feel her boogers strung all around him, and the pressure made it very hard to get air. Soon it was completely dark, as he felt the hankie being slid into her giant back jean pocket, where it came from. Very very muffled, he could hear her voice:

“Three days!” she snickered, patting her back pocket, as she went and sat down in the chair.
1212121121222122112112211.title: The Princess of Snot

choices: Kristin challenges Phil to a game
Their parents call. They'll be away longer.
12121211212221221121122112.content:
The next 3 days were a living hell for Phil. Besides being a snot slave, Shelly used Phil to wipe her sweat and clean up the floor after she got sick and threw up. Unfortunately for Phil these wern't as bareable to eat as the snot was.

Kristin didn't even care that she didn't get a lot of time with Phil since Shelly had him busy every second of the day. She wold just sit and laugh as he was put through various tortures from the 8 year old deamon.

After the third day .....
12121211212221221121122112.title: 3 Days in Hell

choices: Phil attempts to jump onto her foot...
121212112122212211211221121.content:
Kristin watched on as her sister played with Phil. For three days she had let Shelly torture Phil, to the point where she was starting to become bored. She had the advantage of playing with such a tiny person, and she didn't want to lose that opportunity.

She watched Shelly wipe off her sweat with Phil for what seemed like the umpteenth time. "Hey Princess Shelly", she began, "I think it's time I had some fun with our little peasant". She put Phil on the ground, smirking evily. "No problem", she replied. Phil was extremely relieved that he wasn't going to be bathed in an 8 year olds perspiration any longer, but quickly regained his panic after realizing that Kristen wanted to play with him.

"You know what Phil, I wanna see what you're capable of, athletically", she began. Phil was confused, but didn't like the way she was going. "I wanna take you on in a game called Queen vs Peasant. It's quite simply really. You and I are going to fight!". Phil was extremely scared. This kind of stuff could get him killed. "Don't worry, I'm not going to kill you. The game goes like this. I proceed to pin you down for three seconds, and if I can do that, I win. However, your job is to knock me down. If you can do that, you win!"

Phil suddenly felt slightly relived. "Can we make this more interesting?" he asked. "Why not?" she replied, "What did you have in mind?" Phil thought about it for a moment. He thought about asking for freedom, but he knew that he wouldn't get it out of them. "If I win, I want both of you to start treating me gently, and with respect".

Shelly was laughing. "You're not going to beat my sister Peasant! She'll squash you like a bug". That was what Phil was fearing. Kristin took a moment before thinking of her reply. He didn't move at first, hoping that Betsy wouldn't notice him and would leave him alone. "This is ridiculous," Wendy said after a few minutes, "I wanted to see some wrestling." She grabbed the case with both hands and shook it up, causing Phil to topple over. The tiny boy got up and realized the snake had spotted him and was inching closer. Betsy bared her fangs and Phil screamed and began running in the other direction. The women cheered as Phil ran and Besty gave chase. "Come on Phil," Kelly called out, "don't let Betsy do the chasing, go after her." "Yeah," called out Fiona, "I'm sure Betsy's more scared of you that you are of her." The women laughed at that suggestion and went back to watching the match.

Phil managed to get to the rear of Betsy by running really fast, but it was no use. Betsy coiled and grabbed Phil in her mouth and lifted the screaming boy into the air. She then dropped him onto the ground and immediately coiled herself around him. Betsy wrapped her entire body around Phil, completely engulfing him and not leaving any part of his body visible. She then began to squeeze him tightly, pushing the air out of his lungs and preventing any movement. Phil was unable to breath from the pressure and was sure he was about to get crushed. Betsy then uncoiled herself and released Phil.

The tiny boy lay motionless at the bottom of the case. He looked up to see that Betsy had bared her fangs and was poised in attack mode. He realized that she had attempted to weaken him and was now moving in for the kill. Phil was too weak to stop her and lay there waiting to see what happened...........
1212121212122112111.title: Cage Matches Between Phil And Their Pets

choices: Phil Makes It Out Of The House
12121212121221121111.content:
Betsy coiled back and then struck, launching at Phil with her jaw wide open. Phil was sucked into the snake's mouth and swallowed whole, slowly sliding down her gullet. As he was inched deeper and deeper into the snake, Phil began to regain his strength. He tried punching at the walls around him but he was no match for Betsy's insides. His only hope was to stop his descent and slowly climb back out. He managed to push hard against the walls of the snake, preventing him from moving down any further.

Phil managed to look up and saw that there was a long way to go to escape from his predicament. He slowly tried moving in the other direction, attempting to leave Betsy. The snake must have noticed because she swallowed, forcing Phil down even further. The movement stopped and Phil again tried his ascent. This went back forth for what seemed like hours, Phil moving up a few inches and then pushed back down several more. The tiny boy didn't know how long he could keep this up, fearing that eventually he would get digested. He kept trying to escape but Betsy was determined to keep her snack inside of her. Phil continued fighting, and slowly he managed to make it back into Betsy's mouth.

Once inside the snake's mouth, Phil pushed on the roof of the mouth with all his might and looked outside. The snake was thrashing around inside the cage, desperately trying to snap her jaw shut again to retain Phil. The human meal took a deep breath and the leaped out of Betsy's mouth. He landed on the floor of the cage and looked up to see that Betsy was striking again, hoping to recapture him. Phil ran towards Betsy's rear and this time managed to climb onto her tail. Phil ran up the length of the snake as she rose higher. When he reached the top, he managed to get on top of Betsy's head, preventing her from eating him. Betsy banged her head on the roof of the cage, causing the glass to come off. Phil saw his chance and leaped out of the cage, landing on the stand where it rested. He then climbed down and ran to the door.

The tiny boy heard a hissing behind him and turned around to see that Betsy was chasing after him. Phil ran through a crack in the door and sped through the hallway. Betsy continued behind him, coming up close and snapping her jaw every time she was within reach of Phil. The tiny boy continued to run, looking behind him to see how much room he had. He then suddenly slammed into something soft and fell backwards. He looked up to see that it was a giant toe, with the owner of the toe reaching down to pick him up. Phil then saw it was Ms. Carter, who lifted him up to her face. The teacher asked "Phil, what on earth are you doing?" Phil was panting and managed to say "the snake was trying to eat me, I managed to escape." Ms. Carter glared at Phil and said "first, 'the snake' is named Betsy, and second, who told you that you could leave the cage?" Phil was shocked at what he heard and screamed "that thing tried to eat me!" Ms. Carter stared back at him blankly and said "of course she tried to eat you, she defeated you in battle, that's what snakes do." Phil could not believe his ears and said "so you were just going to let her eat me?" Ms. Carter raised an eyebrow and asked "why would I interfere?"

Ms. Carter clasped her hand tightly around Phil and walked back to the room. Along the way she picked up Betsy and placed her back in the cage. She then turned to Phil and said "I don't want to hear any more complaining. You are going back in that cage and that's final." Phil squirmed in her hand and said "you can't do this to me!" Ms. Carter squeezed more tightly and said "that does it Phil, if I catch you out of that cage again I'm going to eat you myself!" She then thought to herself and said "actually, that gives me an idea to make sure that you don't try anything." The giant woman lifted Phil and dropped him into her mouth. She sloshed him around inside, banging him against her cheek and tossing him around with her tongue. She then walked over to the cage and said "hey Betsy, are you hungry?" Betsy lifted herself out of the cage, stopped just short of Ms. Carter. The woman smiled and said "that's a good snake." As she spoke, Phil tried to climb out of her mouth but she pushed him back in with her finger and said "Phil, you are getting on my last nerve." She then turned her attention back to Betsy and said "okay honey, I have a snack for you, open wide." The snake opened its jaw and Ms. Carter opened hers directly over Betsy. She used her tongue to push Phil into Betsy's mouth, forcing the tiny boy inside of the snake. As Phil slid down the snake's gullet he heard Ms. Carter say "that's a good snake, you eat so nicely."

Phil slid down the snake's body, this time even further than before. He knew Ms. Carter would be waiting, so his goal was to make sure he didn't go down too far and then try to climb out later. The more he waited, though, the further Betsy pushed him inside. After about an hour, Phil began his escape.........
12121212121221121111.title: Betsy Swallows Phil (temporarily)

121212121212211211112.content:
As Phil crawled up Betsy's throat, he felt the snake's throat muscles working twice as hard to push him back down. Phil increased his efforts and climbed harder than he thought possible, working much more diligently that he had done the first time. He knew that at his height he might be a target for animals, but never thought he would spend his day escaping from a snake's throat, twice.

When Phil finally reached the top he once again forced Betsy's mouth open and leaped out. This time, though, Betsy seemed to have given up hope of keeping Phil, and just lay down, exhausted from the ordeal. Phil felt victorious and climbed out of the cage. Rather than risk being caught in the house, Phil ran towards the window to escape.

"Phil!" he heard a voice call out from behind him. He turned around to see Ms. Carter standing in the room, hands on her hips. "What did I tell you about leaving the cage!" she demanded. Phil decided to stand up for himself and said "I don't care what you told me, I wasn't going to let that snake eat me." Ms. Carter walked over and picked Phil up. "Listen," she said to him through gritted teeth, "you lost your fight and therefore became food. That is the way the world works." Phil thought for a moment and said "but I managed to escape, so that means I won the fight." Ms. Carter shook her head and replied "no, it means that after you lost you tried to escape your punishment. I can't stand for this."

Ms. Carter lifted Phil up above her head and said "I told you what would you happen if you left the cage." Phil stopped acting tough and switched to begging. "Please Ms. Carter," he said "don't eat me." Ms. Carter opened her mouth and tapped at Phil's feet with her tongue. "If I don't eat you," she said "then you will never learn." Phil flailed about and said "but if you do eat me then I'll die." Ms. Carter shrugged and said "but you'll have learned your lesson. And as your teacher, that is my role, to teach you right from wrong, at all costs." As she lowered Phil to her mouth she said "besides, there's a chance you could survive this."

Phil screamed and struggled as he was brought closer to Ms. Carter's gaping, open mouth........

Burp.

12121212121221121111212.title: Stay there and wait

1212121212122112111122.content:
Phil screamed and struggled as he was brought closer to Ms. Carter's gaping, open mouth. The slow pace Ms. Carter performed it at made it especially torturous for Phil. It gave him false hope that she will reconsider at the last minute, and claim - in her own sick way - that it was just a joke.

But the heartless harpy wasn't joking; she was as serious as a heart attack. Utterly determined to eat him; reassuring herself that she had every right to. In her mind, she was a goddess compared to him; she could do whatever she wanted with her little slave. She knew he probably wouldn't survive her insides. But she figured that no one would care if he was gone; she'd be taking a burden off of his mother for caring for such a pathetic creature. And if he was missed, she could just deny having ever seen him. She only wished that every man on earth was the pathetic stature Phil was.

(Apparently - being of a completely lesbian family, Carter is a complete Man-Hater. Also I'd like to take this moment to say that Carter is now once again African American - not that there was anything wrong with her being white.)

By now, Phil's legs had passed her lips; she decided to close her lips around them, to let him know she meant business. Phil's realization that this was all real filled her with incomparable bliss. She now had Phil's lower half securely in her mouth. It was at that point that she decided to remove her hand from her victim and slowly suck him into her mouth.

She tried to suck him in slowly - but his exquisite taste was making her loose control. It wasn't long until Phil was up to his neck - her lips pursed around his chin. By now his begging had a mixture of full on sobbing added in. It was truly heartbreaking - but for Carter's case; how can you break what I do not possess? It was cruel to see Phil like this.

Ms. Carter figured that once he was inside, she'd torture him more by playing around with him in her mouth - she knew he really didn't like it. She felt so empowered by this act she was about to accomplish and she didn't ever want it to end. But it had to come to an end or she'd never feel satisfied. She knew she had to end Phil's -

WHAM!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Suddenly, Ms. Carter felt a sharp blow to her midsection - something had struck it. And it struck her with such force that it completely knocked the wind out of her, causing her to bend forward, and grip her stomach where it'd been hit. This pain was so incredible - it felt like her insides screamed out in terror. Her first instinct was to cough. She'd completely forgotten that Phil was in her mouth the pain was that great. She needed air now! She opened her mouth wide and released her lost air in raspy cough.

Phil didn't know what caused her to suddenly jerk forward like that - and he did not like it. It was very uncomfortable. It was almost like being on a Roller Coaster that came to a sudden stop. But he knew it wasn't over, as he felt a large amount of breath in her mouth. He saw her cheeks swell up. And before he knew it, a massive gust of wind had forced him from her mouth and sent him flying across the room; she'd spit him out!

But that wasn't good either - cause now he was flying forward with nothing to catch him. And the force at which he was traveling, he was soon going to be a memory on the wall. But suddenly he felt something grab him and wrap large fingers around him. Ordinarily this would've probably snapped his neck, but somehow he felt cushioned and secure. But if Phil thought the Roller Coaster ended there, he was wrong. He suddenly felt whatever hand he landed in, whoosh around, like it was swinging in a loop.

Before long, he leveled out and thought he was gonna be sick. But he still felt unsafe; logic told him that he was either in Ms. Carter's hand, or one of her crazy relative's. And seeing how cruel she was, the only reason any of her relatives would want to save him, was so that they could either torture him or eat him themselves. It would probably be like two lionesses killing each other for a scrap of meat - and Phil was the scrap.

However, Phil got a strange surprise. He saw that Ms. Carter was standing there bewildered. He then decided to look around him and saw that the hand around him was clad in a fingerless, leather, Motorcycle-Glove. The palm was padded with cushions; the material that cushioned and secured him. He then looked to the right and saw that he was in someone's left hand. He looked further up and saw that he was being held by a teenage boy - 17 years old by the look of him. He was wearing a black blazer and a matching fedora. Phil saw that in his right hand, held forward in defense was a cane. He saw Ms. Carter, clutching her stomach in pain. He figured that the boy must have hit her with it.

"Who the Hell are you?!" she suddenly asked with a raspy breath. "And how did you get in this house?!"

"I'm Santa Claus," he said with a snide tone. "and I came down the Chimney; Ho, Ho, Ho."
Suddenly Phil felt himself lifted closer and saw the boy's head turn slightly toward him. He whispered, "I'm talking about her, by the way."
He began chuckling to himself. Ms. Carter looked like she was about to yell something at him...or grow long fangs and bite his head off - when suddenly there was a barrage of hard slams on the door.

"Oh, and by the way - I brought a few Elves with me," the boy said.

Suddenly the door was flung open and a Swat Team stormed in, with M-16 guns aimed at Ms. Carter.

"FREEZE! PUT YOUR HANDS IN THE AIR!" one of them said. Ms. Carter - obviously - didn't get the message.

"Oh thank God you're here," she said pointing at the boy. "This boy broke into my Mother's house and assaulted me with that cane!"

"I SAID PUT YOUR HANDS IN THE AIR LADY!!!" She stood there, completely unable to comprehend what was happening. But they had guns on her, so she slowly raised her hands over her head. Suddenly, a man with a large mustache and wearing a heavy trench coat entered the room. He crossed over to the boy.

"Looks like you were right," the man said. "Six other women in the house - just like you said; we've secured them all."

"Excellent - and I got this one," the boy answered.

"Good work, Hark," he said. "Where is he?"

"He's right here Chief," the boy said gently raising the hand you were in up to eye level.

"Good," the Chief said. He then took a radio off his belt and pressed the button. "Area's secure; bring her in."

Phil was completely astounded by what had just happened. He kept thinking that he was somehow daydreaming all of this, and that he was still in Ms. Carter's mouth, or worse, on his way to her stomach by now. It didn't seem possible that something like this would suddenly happen and save him. But he remained silent as he wondered who they had called for to enter the room.

He looked over by the door and saw -
1212121212122112111122.title: An Shocking Change of Pace

12121212121221121111222.content:
Mrs. Prittey walked in, and took Phil from the chief.
"Phil! Thank goodness you're okay!" Phil was stunned. How could Mrs. Pretty have found out about Mrs. Carter taking taking him. Perhaps Kendra tipped her off? No, that couldn't be it. Phil doubted Kendra would be the kind of person to do him any favors. Who, then?
"In case you're wondering how I found you, well you have Marissa to thank for that." Suddenly Phil was dropped from Mrs. Prittey's hand, and landed in the palm of another girl. He got to his feet, and turned around. He was quite surprised hew hadn't noticed her sooner. She was incredibly beautiful, with long wavy blonde hair, flawless white skin, and seductive lips which were covered with a layer of red lip stick. Her breasts were fairly large, although Phil could only make an approximation as to their size, since she was wearing a T-shirt. Tight black leggings squeezed her figure, and showed off her amazing ass.
"She told me about how she saw Kendra hand you over to Mrs. Carter. When you went missing, she was worried, and told me. I called the police and told them about the kidnapping. It looks like we got here just in time." She then looked at Phil, "Don't worry, Mrs. Carter will be going to jail for a long time, and Kendra has been expelled. I'm sorry I didn't believe you before."
Marissa looked at her hopefully while gently cupping Phil in her palm, "So what should we do with him."
"Well, it seems that Kendra took it upon herself to tell Phil's family that he was staying with a friend. They probably won't be back from their vacation for a few weeks now. Until then, I suppose . . . why don't you keep him Marissa?" Her face practically glowed with joy, making her look even more pretty. Phil, however, was shocked. He had escaped the clutches of one women, just to be handed off to another.
He protested, "Wait, you can't do that! I'm still-" Marissa brought the tiny boy up to her luscious lips.
"Shhh. Don't worry, I'll keep you safe," she cooed. She began walking toward the door, when Mrs. Pretty stopped her. At first, Phil thought that she had a change of heart.
"Wait! They'll need to take Phil's clothes as evidence."
"Of course, I almost forgot." Before he could say anything, Phil was stripped of his clothing, even his underwear. After handing them to the teacher, Marissa ran off with Phil enclosed in her hands. She had him completely caged in, so he couldn't see anything. He simply sat naked on her palm, afraid of what would come next. When her movement finally stopped, Phil found himself slowly lowered onto her bed. "What do you want with me," Phil demanded. He couldn't quite muster a serious tone, as he found that his voice was shaking.
"Aww, don't be afraid. I really like you Phil, and I just didn't want to see you get hurt." As if to prove her point, she grabbed Phil and pressed him against her puckered lips, and held him there for a good twenty seconds. When he was released, he noticed that his entire upper half (which was still naked) was covered in lip stick and saliva.
"It's time to go to bed now Phil," Marissa stated. She then undressed down to her bra and thong. Phil turned red, and noticed he had a boner. When Marissa saw his hard on, she giggled. "You are just too cute."
"So . . .where can I sleep," he asked.
"With me silly!' She jumped onto the bed and turned off the lights. She took grabbed Phil, and delicately held him against her bosom. Phil admitted that it was quite a soft bed. Still, the girl's amorous behavior unnerved him. He also realized that since his clothes were all specially tailored, he might be naked for the next few weeks, until his parents came home. The thought frightened him. In the morning when he woke up, Marissa took him to school . . .

The first was a tall, attractive lady in her late-thirties. Kendra recognized the woman from earlier in the morning - she was Mrs. Bemine, tiny Phil’s mother. The second person Kendra only recognized from passing glances around the school halls - her name was Becky Bemine. Becky was Phil’s older sister - at age 16, she was three years older than him.

“Hello,” Phil’s mother politely asked, “Are you Kendra?”

The sock shifted and swung, and the rim proceeded to open, and Phil saw his giant older sister’s huge eyes peering down the sock at him. He could tell that she fought back a snicker - she couldn’t help but think it was a little funny.

"We can continue his punishment at home if you want,” Mrs. Bemine proposed to the seated Ms. Prittey. Phil was dumbstruck - he had been expecting his mother to defend him, and to tell Ms. Prittey a thing or two about her teaching style. But instead, his mother had accepted this form of punishment, and it looked like she might even embrace it!

Phil rolled over, facing his mom “No! Mom, I don’t want to be at your feet - I didn’t even do anything!” he begged.

“Well, well,” Ms. Prittey began, “I was going to say that you’ve been very good at accepting your punishment like a big boy, and that you didn’t need anymore, but now I see you’ve resorting to lying.”

Phil rolled back over to face his giant teacher. His wrists were still tied by the knot in the string.

Ms. Prittey continued. “Because of that, I’m going to have to recommend that your punishment continues, and that it is continuous until you reach school, tomorrow morning.”

She then spoke to Phil’s mother. “I think it’s best that he learns his lesson quickly, so he doesn’t develop disruptive habits, and learns to always tell-the-truth,” she finished, with an emphasis on the last three words.

Phil turned to his mom again. “Mom...! Please...!” Phil cried.

“What do you want me to do about it Phil?” she replied. “When you misbehave, there are consequences. When you lie, there are consequences. When you do both, there are BIG consequences. I’m not going to let you out of punishment you rightly deserve,” she declared.

Phil then looked at his sister - she was grinning. ‘Why is she so happy?’ he asked himself.

The teacher began again. “He’s in trouble for bothering Kendra’s feet during class - invading her personal space - so we decided that a fitting punishment would be to let her invade his personal space with her feet. So that’s what you need to make sure happens - he needs to constantly have his personal space invaded by someone else’s feet if this punishment is going to do its job.”

Phil’s mother and sister were both nodding at every point the teacher made.

Phil’s mom then turned to Becky. “Do you mind helping me some of this, Becky?”

Becky smirked. “Let’s see... I get to rub my feet all over my little brother, he doesn’t get to complain, and I won’t get in any trouble for any of it. Do you think I’d mind, Mom?” she snickered. Her mother and Ms. Prittey laughed as well - they understood what it was like to have a little brother - you’re always willing to humiliate him.

“Becky! Please don’t - ” Phil began, but was cut off as Becky stepped forward..

“Shut up. You’re going to have to smell Mom’s feet, and you’re also going to have to deal with mine. They’re big, they stink, and your little cute nose is going to smell them all over. I’m going to enjoy every second of it. It’s final,” she declared.

“That’s the spirit...!” Ms. Prittey said. “Your daughter knows what this is all about - just let her have him some, and I guarantee he’ll learn his lesson more quickly than if you grounded him a hundred times,” she finished.

Phil looked up at his mother. She looked him in the eyes, slightly raising one eyebrow. “Well, I’ve been looking for a good form of discipline to use with you. If rubbing my smelly feet all over you is what it takes, it’s what it takes,” she said.

Phil was horrified - it sounded like she might start doing this regularly, as a normal punishment. “Let’s get this string off of you, tho’” she continued, as her other hand came into view. Her huge fingernails grabbed the knot around his wrist, and pulled it loose. The string fell the long distance to the ground, and he was free from it.

His arms would barely move, however.

Becky beaming down once again lowered her sweaty toes over Phil's face grabbing at them while slowly wiggling them to get as much of her sweat on his face as possible. All the while Phil trying not to vomit while taking in bit of sweat in is nose and mouth tries to endure this torture.
Phil starts to feel faint for a moment only to have it short lived as they have arrived at McDonalds.

Phil's mother looking over at Becky and then at Phil and back at Becky again says, "
1221121211211.title: Becky's sweaty hell

Under her sole; less smell, more sweat
12211212112111.content:
"Put your sock back on with your brother in it!" You don't understand how your own mother could be so cruel!

Becky chuckled and said "with pleasure, mom!" She grinned evilly down at you, and taunted you mercilessly. "Trust me, bro, your life is going to SUCK now!" She wiggled her dirty toes, and then picked you up between them, and put her sock on. The socks were tight before, but now with the addition of you, they were impossible to get on.

Where does she maneuver you?
