"Just shove him in your shoe and come on."
1221121211212.content:
Instead of running, tiny Phil remained on his back this time and tried to protect his face with his little, tired arms. Becky’s sweaty socked toes came to rest on the tiny boy’s chest, and held him firmly to the floorboard of the car. The smell was so overpowering... Phil looked up past his own arms and past his sister’s toes, and saw the delighted grin on Becky’s face.

“Hey, move your arms, twerp,” she chuckled.

Phil didn’t do what she said. After waiting a moment, she slid her foot forward, and her toes touched the tiny boy’s elbows. She pushed on his arms a little - he held them as tight as he could around his little face.

She leaned a bit forward, to see a little better. “I said move your arms,” she smirked, “I want to cover up your face.” Her toes wiggled around his chest - it pounded at him.

Phil was horrified by the huge, delighted grin on his big sister’s face. “But I won’t be able to breathe,” pleaded Phil’s tiny, muffled voice to huge Becky.

“I’ll let you breathe, just move your arms out of the way,” she assured her tiny little brother. Her toes moved forward again, over his arms. She pressed her socked toes down onto them and it blocked out all the light; sweat drenched him, and dripped down from his arms onto his face.

“No!” he cried. It was too much, he wasn’t going to let it engulf his head and face again, if he could stop it. The toes began wiggling around and gripping his arms, and he could hear his sister humming happily up above. He was getting too tired - soon his arms would give out, and his face would be covered by the airtight sweaty sock.

“He certainly isn't minding you, is he Becky?” the mother commented, rhetorically.

"No, he isn't," Becky giggled, wiggling her toes, still trying to wear out the tiny boy's arms.

Their mom paused for a moment. Then she spoke. “Phil, you’ve just earned yourself another date with Becky’s feet on Saturday - and if you want to try for mine on Sunday too, by all means don’t move your arms, sweetie," she proclaimed.

Phil was defeated. He reluctantly relaxed his arms, losing the grip around his own face, and the giant sweat soaked toes pushed their way down, forcing his tired arms off to his sides. His head was caught between Becky’s first and second toe - and there was no air, only sweat and darkness and foot stink.

“Haha! Gotcha!” Becky beamed from above.

Phil gasped, and only got a mouthful of sweat. He began to cough, and get strangled - he tried to turn his head, but her big toes were clamped too tightly around it, and it only hurt his neck to try. He then tried to push her foot off of him with his tired arms, but his hands only made indentations into the sock and didn’t budge the foot at all.

She laughed down at him some more, and started wiggling her toes around again. He was thrust back and forth, as the toes had him by the head, and he had to go with them. He began to cry, but all the sounds were muffled and his tears were soaked into the sweaty sock.

Becky held him with his head between her toes, laughing as she wiggled him around for over a minute. As she finally released her grip, he gasped for air over and over, and looked up with tears rolling down the sides of his face, at his giant sister, still laughing at down him.

“Oh, poor little baby...” she mocked, with a grin.

“I couldn’t breathe, Becky!” he sobbed.

“Don’t be such a wimp, Phil. You’re fine,” she commented. “Now, let’s take these off,” she added, reaching down and pulling off her socks.

“We’re here,” their mom called. Becky looked up; they were in the McDonald’s parking lot.

“I thought we were going through the drive through,” Becky responded.

“Nah, let’s go in,” their mom replied, opening the door of the car and starting to get out.

“Well, where do you want me to put Phil?” Becky asked.
1221121211212.title: Sock Suffocation

12211212112121.content:
With a happy grin on her face your mom lifts her heel from her right pump and tells your sister to put you in. Your sister cant help but laugh at you as she wedges you between the shoe and your moms heel. To humiliate you more she put you facing up. "Done yet?"
"yup" your sister replied. With that your mom lowers her heel down on you. Your scream for help is muffled as your squished flat under your moms heel.Each step your mom takes your body gets flattened more and more.*sigh* "what a long line this is gonna take forever mom." your mom replies, "Its not so bad maybe about 20 minutes or so. Besides your brother needs to learn his lesson." Your mom keeps leaning her weight on the foot your under and you feel your flattened body sinking into the thin padding of the shoe.Then she suddenly stands on her tippy toes which makes her heel rise off of you. "I knew she wouldnt keep down there." you think to yourself. Then the second your body begins unflattening she slams her weight down on her heels smashing you flat again. She continues doing this for the ENTIRE 20 minutes in the line. Each time the heel lifts up you catch a glimpse of your sister smiling down at you and sticking out her toung before your smashed again. when she gets to the register she shifts all of her weight on you and starts to order the food. Then the person taking the order asks "for here or to go?" Your mom replies...
12211212112121.title: Heel cushion

choices: He awakens at home, still at his mom's mercy.
He awakens at home, with Becky, alone.
122112121121211.content:
“Oh, for here, definitely... ”she responded with a giggle.

Phil heard his mom’s muffled response high above, past the crushing heel on top of him, which continuously pressed him flat.. He was gaining a new understanding of terms such as ‘flattened’, ‘trampled’, ‘stomped’, and ‘crushed’. It was overwhelming - overpowering. His mom’s giant heel was too much to take, but he had to take it anyway.

“Okay, we’ll have your order ready in a few minutes,” Phil heard the distant reply of the person at the register.

“All right,” responded Phil’s mother’s muffled voice. The weight of his mother’s foot lifted up for a moment, and he gasped for air as he saw her heel lift up above the rim of the shoe. He again saw Becky’s giant grinning smirk from the world outside. He could see as she silently laughed at him, right before his mother’s foot slammed back down onto the hard floor, impacting him, flattening him, and then mashing him down hard. Before he knew it, the same thing repeated, although this time he was more dazed, as he saw his sister’s grinning face and then SLAM! MASH! His body was becoming so mashed that he could barely feel it. Becky’s grin grew with every step his mother took, and with every step his view of it was blurrier and more disoriented.

His mother and sister walked to the table they would sit at, and finally sat down. It was a welcome relief to the tiny boy, who was now so horribly dazed that he fought to remember exactly how he got where he was. The heel suddenly lifted up, higher than before, but it was still menacingly poised above him.

His mother curiously peered down into her shoe at him.

“Mmm, maybe that was a little rough...” she said after examining him from above, with a sudden expression of concern. That expression was so familiar to him - in his disoriented state he tried to raise his tiny, mashed arms up toward his mother’s pretty face, up above her propped up heel. His left arm wouldn’t make it all the way without falling back down, but his right arm weakly reached up toward her huge face. Her expression changed to one of slight surprise, and then amusement.

“No, sweetie, just stinky feet for you,” she quietly sang down to her flattened little boy, reaching for her help. She then smirked slightly, biting her bottom lip and running her fingers through her hair, while bouncing her giant foot above him, tauntingly.

“Hungry?” she then sang down. Phil couldn’t reply, he just stared back up at his giant mother’s now smiling face. He was hungry, he guessed, but what did it matter if she wasn’t going to let him out? Was she going to drop a french fry down into her shoe with him or something?

The shoe then leaned forward, as she raised her entire foot up. “Well if you are, sweetie, you can just lick the toejam from between my toes,” she smiled, sweetly. She was attempting to make him fall down, further into the shoe, where the ball of her foot and toes were pressing against the sole. Phil wouldn’t fall.

“Oh, stuck?” she giggled. “Maybe I really was too rough on you...” she smiled. She then looked up, out into the restaurant, as she reached down and her finger pried him free from the insole of the shoe. Phil saw that he had left an imprint of himself, as he rolled down the slope of the insole and stopped at the ball of his mother’s foot. It smelled so strong, and his mom’s foot suddenly lifted up and came back over top of him - he found himself overtaken by her giant toes, which manipulated his body until he was face up. Then they readily gripped him by the head, and quickly dragged him with them to the end of the shoe. All light was cut out, he was struggling for air, squeezed horribly by the smelly toes, and he could hear his mother and sister’s muffled laughter up above.

His mother and sister obviously thought of his predicament as simple ‘punishment’, and from both their giggles, he could tell they were enjoying putting him through it. No one else in the restaurant knew that his mother had him at her feet. It must of been funny from their perspective.

But to him, this experience was frightening in a sense they couldn’t comprehend - his mom had always warned him about hiding in peoples shoes, and now he was being played with, in her shoe, by her own smelly toes! Neither his playful mother who was crushing him now, nor his enormous mocking big sister really understood how much their ‘fun’ was really putting him through. He couldn’t move, and they were in charge, and his mom’s giant wiggling toes were squeezing and rubbing all around on his head and face, making him miserable. Just great.

Soon Becky and her mother’s food was delivered, and they happily ate while discussing what tiny Phil would go through, when they got home. Phil’s body was mercilessly ground in between and under his mother’s smelly toes, and the ball of her foot. It took them a long time to finish eating - longer than Phil could last. After a long bout of battling with his mother’s toes, an exhausted, beaten Phil finally passed out...
122112121121211.title: Son Underfoot

choices: Her smelly bare-foot lowers toward the slipper... "It's MY turn!"
"I'm going to dress you like a doll before she gets here."
1221121211212111.content:
Phil finally came to. The haziness of being unconscious faded, but he found himself in a predicament, as a giant foot was already...

SLAM! MASH!

A huge sole came down on him, and then lifted again. He found the surface he was on was strangely forgiving to the it pressure put on him, as it gave a lot, causing the giant weight that had came from above not to crush him as bad as before. Where was he? He began to look around, but then he felt himself descending...

SLAM! MASH!

The surface he was on hit the floor, the giant sole came down on him again, mashing him down flat. Whatever he was on took some of the pressure, but it was still a flattening blow. The foot rose up off of him again, and he realized this time that the surface he was on was rising with it.

He struggled with his tired arms and legs to move - maybe he could roll out from under the horrible sole that was descending on him already. He found that his arms were not only worn out, but there were several loops of... string or thread, holding his arms flat against the surface he was on. He was sewn to whatever he was lying on! His legs and upper body were all held fast by the same loops. Then he felt himself descending, and ...

SLAM! MASH!

The sole came down on him, and he suddenly noted the smell of the air around him... it smelled just like the terrifically strong scent of his mother’s feet. He was sure of it, and as the sole raised back up, he noted the shape of the foot, and tried to see her face or what clothes she was wearing just to be sure. He couldn’t see more any of her for her giant foot, but he could see the scenery of the inside of his house going by. He was home, but the foot was already descending for the next big stomp...

SLAM! MASH! - this time didn’t come back up off of him. It just stayed there, and little Phil had to endure the flattening pressure, and struggle to get whatever confined, stinky air there was with him under the pressure of the foot.

“Becky, I told you to clean up this room,” he heard his mother’s muffled voice from directly above. He had been right, it was her who was stomping him all along.

“I’m about to, Mom...” he heard Becky’s muffled voiced reply, from a distance. From what he saw of the scenery of the house, he knew that his mother was standing in the doorway to Becky’s room. The flattening pressure of his mother’s foot was getting too him - he began to struggle, although he knew it was useless.

“Oh!” he heard his mother say, and suddenly all the weight lifted off of him, relieving him from all that horrible pressure. He looked up to see his mother’s smiling face, peering down at him from the top of her mountainously tall body. “Are you finally awake, sweetie? You’ve slept about an hour of your punishment away, it’s already after two o’ clock!” she commented.

Only two o’ clock? He remembered that his mother had picked him up early from school. They had all kinds of time to punish him, before he had to go back the next day.

His mother then grinned and squatted down, closer to him. “Like my handiwork?” she giggled, and then ran her large fingers across the tiny boy’s arms and body, feeling every stitch of thread holding him down “These are my favorite slippers too, and they’re nice and soft so we won’t crush you,” she continued. He recognized these slippers now - they were his mom’s favorite pair - the pink and fluffy ones.

She then stood up, and resumed her typical smile. It almost looked conquering, as Phil watched her slowly raise her foot up, and lower it down again, onto his tiny body. She wiggled her toes around on him for a moment, and he coughed at the smell, which made her giggle from above.

“Are they that stinky?” she snickered, as she grabbed his head between her second and third toes, squeezing his face between them. Phil began to cry as he looked up at his mother’s smiling face. This was too humiliating.

Her foot slid forward, blocking his view, and all light. The smell was strong all over her foot, and as she got her foot to the end of the slipper, she started rhythmically putting pressure on the tiny boy, as a way of teasing him.

“Becky, get your room cleaned up,” her now muffled voice called.

“OK, Mom,” Becky’s distant voice answered, and he heard a thump on the floor as Becky got up.

The giant sole above him rose up again, as his mother began walking back down the hallway.

SLAM! MASH!

SLAM! MASH!

SLAM! MASH!

His mother started making her way around the house, sometimes stopping and standing on him for a while she was busy, sometimes constantly on the move. It was crushing to the tiny boy, and it went on for over an hour. Finally, the crushing and mashing came to a stop, as his mother sat down on the couch, kicked off her slippers, and turned on the TV. She glanced down at her tired little boy and smiled.

“More than you bargained for, sweetie?” she grinned.

Yes it was, he’d had enough. He was hungry, and worn out, crushed and tired. He wanted free, and nodded ‘yes’ to his giant mother, above. His mother didn’t respond to him - she just looked up, leaving him there, and started watching TV.

Soon, Becky came and sat down beside her mother. She peered down at her little brother, sewn to the slipper, and laughed at him.

“Hey twerp, guess what?” she grinned. “Your favorite little cousin, Mandy, is coming over later. Won’t that be fun?” she laughed. Mandy was not his favorite little cousin - she was his least favorite. At 8 years old, she was extremely smart and cute, but she would torture the poor little boy. “I wanna see you lick her toes clean, little bro’” Becky cruelly laughed.

“And guess what else,” Becky continued, with a laugh...
1221121211212111.title: Finally Home, But Still Underfoot

choices: Mandy, Phil and Becky's 8-year-old cousin, arrives...
12211212112121111.content:
Giant Becky smirked down into the slipper at Phil. “My feet are SO cold...” she continued.

“Hmm...” Their mother began to reply, as she leaned forward into Phil’s view, smiling at him sweetly. “Why, my slippers are right there in the floor, sweetie..!” she giggled. “You don’t mind sharing them with your sister, do you Phil?”

Did he mind? Did he mind his sister putting her giant smelly foot in the slipper on top of him? He hadn’t done anything, to anyone, to deserve any of this ridiculous punishment! Becky’s foot was already lifting up, and she was grinning down at him, expecting to continue lowering her foot on him, without anything stopping her. Why was he putting up with this!?

“Stop it!” he screamed up at them, busting out into tears. His mother and sister were both stunned, and for a moment the smirky expression left both of their faces. Becky lowered her foot and just looked at him.

“Stop what, twerp?” Becky replied. “I’m just putting on Mom’s slippers.”

“Phil, I already warned you once about talking back to us,” his mother sternly began.

“I don’t care! I don’t care! Let me go!” he screamed back, sobbing. “I hate you! I hate both of you, you and your stupid smelly feet! Let me go! I don’t want to go back to that school! I don’t wanna be under your feet! Just stop it!” he sobbed, screaming up at the giant faces above.

An angry smirk formed on Becky’s face, as she lifted her giant foot up above him again. “That’s NOT happening! SHUT UP!” She then slammed her grimy cold sole down onto her little brother. It knocked the breath out of him, but the tears continued rolling down his cheeks.

Grinning evilly, she slid her foot back a bit, and started wiggling her giant toes on his tiny face - they smelled SO bad, and he couldn’t do a thing. He could see her huge face spitefully grinning down at him from between them, and he could see his mother’s giant face glaring at him as well. She didn’t look happy with him.

“Fine, I won’t ever send you to that school again,” she finally replied, and the look on her face was quite assertive. Becky glanced at her mother, and Phil’s sobbing began to slow down, as he looked at his mom’s face from between Becky’s stinky toes. For the moment, she had quit pummeling him in the face with them, and instead just wrapped them around his tiny head.

“You can’t be serious!” Becky protested. “That’s exactly what he wants! You can’t let him stay home and get out of school just because he had a little tantrum!” she argued, keeping her huge foot on her brother, and looking at her mom with wide eyes.

Their mother just smiled back at her. “He’s not staying home either, sweetie,” she smirked. The smile on his mother’s face grew, and she ran her fingers through her hair. “I’ll take him to work with me everyday, in my shoe,” she smiled, then glanced down at her tiny son.

He was dumbstruck.

“What, afraid of little old me?” she giggled. "The lesson for today is... Don't talk back. Oh yeah, and Becky - anytime you want 'play' with your brother at your feet, you can, from now on.” She then laid over and rested her head on Becky’s lap, facing the tiny boy at Becky’s foot. “And right now, I’M gonna watch the show... Go at it, Becky,” she grinned, cruelly.

“This is so great!” Becky grinned. “Oh trust me, your life’s gonna suck now, little bro’,” she giggled, as she slid her foot forward into the slipper, overtaking her tiny brother’s body and covering his helpless face by the smelly sole of her foot. He inhaled sharply - it smelled so strong, but there was nothing he could do about it.

He heard them giggling from the outside world, as Becky slid her grimy foot back and forth across his tiny body and face, forcing him to helplessly take it. He didn't want his life to be that of a toy at his sister's foot, but it was headed in that direction...
12211212112121111.title: Talking Back = Feet

choices: When he wakes up, he has to kiss her mouth...
When he wakes up, he has to kiss her giant butt crack...
122112121121211112.content:
Becky's enormous barefoot was all over him, with the smell constantly invading and humiliating him. The gritty, grimy bottom of her unwashed sole slid back and forth at her leisure, further claiming Becky's ownership of his tiny body. Several minutes passed.

His body was so useless – it couldn't even move to protect his helpless face from his sister's gross giant sole, casually sliding forward and backward on him. The pressure and constant rubbing began to become really painful, and his lungs were screaming for air...

... He began to forget where he was...

... Becky's voice: Laughing,“Smell this... Phil...”

... His mom's voice: “Phil... wake up...”

... Becky's voice: “Hey... Wake up... twerp... ... smell ...”

Phil began to come out of it. As he opened his eyes, he found that Becky had her humongous toes right over his face, and the smell was overwhelming his senses. She was taunting him from above, with her tongue stuck out. Becky stared at him intensely as the smell of her toes seeped into his nostrils. Forcing him to smell her huge feet seemed to amuse her to no end.

“It's too bad Mandy couldn't come over, she would've loved this,” Becky said to their mother.

“Aw... he's awake...” his mother said. “You want a break from your Sissy's big mean feet?” she giggled, and Phil saw his giantess sister smacking on some chewing gum, grinning down at him too from above her own giant stinky toes.

He nodded weakly to his mother, from under the horribly sweaty, smelly toes of his sister.

“Becky, you wanna give your little brother a break from your feet?” their mother asked. “You can do other stuff to him too, you know,” their mother added.

“Like what Mom?” Becky inquired.

“I don't know – your armpit would probably make a pretty good 'torture device'," she giggled "Anything that would humiliate him. I mean, I don't want him to see you naked or anything...” their mom continued.

“Oh I know, that'd just be sick... but... I could see him squirming around him my butt for some reason... Would that be okay?” Becky asked with a giggle.

“Oh, that that wouldn't be too bad,” their mother snickered. "I want you to make him kiss you and say he's sorry, and that he loves you in a minute, after I leave."

"Sure Mom. But I won't quit with the feet just yet,” she grinned, continuing to chew her gum. There was a sudden shift of her huge foot, and he found his face completely flattened into the slipper, buried underneath Becky's giant toes. It seriously smelled so strong that he became dizzy.

“I really didn't think you were done,” their mom shook her head and snickered to herself. “Well, he belongs to you now, so do what you want.”

Becky laughed too. “I'll give him a break from my feet in a sec Mom, just let me finish with him...” She began squeezing his head tighter and tighter, between her smelly toes, and Phil began desperately gasping for the stinky air that was becoming harder and harder to find. He could still see his sister's giant face through a shrinking crack between her toes, and she was casually smacking her gum as she grinned down, and just kept squeezing harder.

“I'm gonna go down town now, sweetie. Love you! I'll be back later. ” their mom said.

“Okay Mom. Love ya too, bye!” Becky called, grinning and waving goodbye, as their mother opened the the door and left them both there alone. Becky then glanced down at her little brother's cute face, still struggling for air between under her toes.

She was in charge – she looked down at him with a smirk. “You said you hated me, but I think you just hate my feet. Regardless, you hurt my feelings, and I'm mad,” she proclaimed, as the crack he could see her through vanished, along with any trace of air. He could feel her toes becoming tighter and tighter around his head, as he began to become disoriented again. Soon, his lungs were screaming for air, but there was nothing he could do...
122112121121211112.title: Belonging to Big Sis

1221121211212111121.content:
Phil awoke slowly. The last thing he remembered was his sister's giant foot in his face, and he had been struggling for air. As his eyes adjusted to the light, he saw the outline of a face in front of him. Slowly it came into focus, and he saw that it was Becky. He tried to jump up, but Becky put her finger down on him, holding the little guy down.

"Wakey wakey," Becky said," time for more punishment." Phil groaned, fearing what was coming next. Becky then said "so mom was here, and she was very upset about your attitude. She didn't like the nasty things you said about me." Phil looked away, not wanting to think about what was coming. Becky continued "she said that when you wake up, you have to give me a kiss." Phil immediately looked back at her in disgust. "What?" he exclaimed, "that's just gross. You're my sister." "Sorry," Becky said, "mom said you have to. Now, pucker up."

Becky stood Phil up and leaned in. She puckered her lips and held them an inch from his face. Phil refused to budge. Becky stopped puckering and asked "how would you like to spend the day in my armpit?" She then puckered again, and Phil finally relented. He leaned forward and pecked Becky on her upper lip. As he started to pull away, Becky put her hand on his back and forced his whole body against her lips. Phil was trapped! He started pounding away on her mouth, struggling to get free, but Becky would not let him. This continued for several minutes, Becky keeping little Phil stuck to her mouth. Finally, she let him go, and Phil fell on to his back.

Becky then looked at Phil and said "so, what means of torture for today?"
1221121211212111121.title: When he wakes up, he has to kiss her mouth...

choices: To the mall to try on shoes
To a friends house to play more cruel games with Phil
12211212112121111211.content:
"Well bro we could try the new game my feet have for ya." Becky said, Phil groaned at the thought of being around his sisters gross, smelly feet any longer but he had no choice in the matter "What kind of game" he replied.

Becky began to giggle "Okay bro, this game is called gumshoe but with a twist. I take a piece of gum, stick you to one side, and stick the other side to the inside of my shoe. That way you get a free ride around in my shoe and you get to smell my feet, isn't that great?" She smiled. Phil was anything but thrilled about the idea since the last time he was in his sisters shoe he was stuck there for almost a month "So how exactly do I win?" Phil asked.

"Oh that's easy, you just can't put any clothes on. I'll let you figure it out from there." She said as she ripped his clothes off and stuffed him and her gum into the shoe. "Happy sniffing bro, just don't make too much of a mess" She teased.

As her bare foot slid into the shoe, Phil began to wonder what sick thoughts were running through his sister's mind right now, and why he couldn't wear clothes...

Finally her foot settled in the shoe, with Phil's head directly between her toes she gave him a squeeze "Comfy bro? I hope so because this'll be a long ride."



Where was she going?
12211212112121111211.title: Gumshoe...

122112121121211112111.content:
"Hmm I guess I could go try on some new shoes at the mall..." Becky thought as she began stretching for the long walk ahead.

Phil meanwhile was finding it hard to breathe beneath the immense weight of his sister's foot, and the sweat and stench wasn't helping. Every time he breathed in he had to stop himself from gagging as her rancid stench permeated the air around him.

Suddenly just as he was about to finish inhaling he found himself mashed into his sister's sweaty toe cleavage forcing him to recoil in disgust. "She must be moving" He thought, preparing himself for the inevitable.

Lucky for him however, she was just stretching at the moment as evidenced by his face slowly being dislodged from between her toes just moments later. "Phew."

At least 5 minutes spent in peaceful humiliation had passed before Phil found himself forced face first into his sister's toe cleavage, breathing in the stink inadvertently.

He had to stop himself from puking as he was mashed against them, time and time again. Each time Phil thought Becky had finally let up he was forced back in between her toes, breathing in her stink for what seemed like the thousandth time.

As the walk continued with seemingly no end in sight Phil started to feel strange as his lower body began to react to his sister's constant rubbing. He hadn't noticed it until now but a warm, pleasurable sensation began to build up in his nether regions as more and more friction was applied to him with every step.

He tried to fight it as Becky continued her walk, completely oblivious to what she was doing to Phil.

Phil had to remind himself of his current situation, and how humiliating it would be for him were his sister to find out that he was deriving any sort of pleasure from her feet of all places. 'If she finds out about this I'll never hear the end of it...' Phil thought to himself.

"She won't find out, don't worry." He heard a voice tell him, "She won't even notice..." the voice continued, "But, she's my sister! And... besides I don't want to give her the satisfaction of... that. " Phil replied, trying to fight against his urges.

Your letter went on and *on* about the ways you liked to get squished under my feet and butt, about how you wanted me to want to do it. And even to eventually *die* under my bum..."

"No! Mom, that's a lie! Becky did-nnghh!!" Becky squeezed her little brother's tiny manhood between her fingers. There was no sense giving the game away now, when she was so close to winning!

"Oh sweetie, it's perfectly natural to only be able to *get it up* when you're thinking about your mother's big body! I'm the only woman who's ever shown you any kind of kindness, and I'm much more voluptuous than those little girls in your class, right?" She smiled, coquettishly wiggling her bum in front of her son's face. "At the same time, it was getting so tedious dealing with your little "mishaps" sweetie; scraping you off of the bottom of girls' shoes, picking you up from school after a teacher abused you, seeing you fail with so many, many girls! And then Becky told me how you kept *asking* her to crush you under her feet, and how you begged her to wedge you up her butt-crack and pretend to be me! That's when this all made sense! Treating you like a normal person was never going to work sweetie, because you're not! You're a tiny little man who needs to submit to his mommy's massive body, and that's exactly what we're going to do; wedge you right up between my butt-cheeks, so you can smell my ass and get squished by my big, heavy cheeks for the rest of your life!! It's a great way of reminding you that you'll never be normal, and that your place is here, under mommy's big bum." His mother pointed at the exact center of her massive ass-crack, and smiled down at him dominantly. "And I'll be honest sweetie; I've always wanted to do this to you! I'll always love you dearly, but the sensation of walking on top of my own sweet son, of shoving a little man up my big bottom and knowing it's *you*, knowing I'm stopping you from having a normal life, knowing your pitiful little life is in my hands - or rather, up my bum!" She cooed as she thought of happy situations she could get into with her son. "I just feel so good! Thank you for finally being honest with me, sweetie!"

Phil couldn't believe this! His mom had just told him he was going to have to spend the rest of his life wedged tightly up her big, round ass! Worse still, his sister had convinced her that this was what he really wanted!

She turned around, and looked her son in the face with nothing but pride and love. Reaching out, she stroked his tiny, shivering body soothingly. He was slick with sweat.

"I know you must be nervous right now sweetie, but you've got to trust mommy that this is for the best. You won't have to worry about girls, or your education, or moving away from home! You just have to worry about how bad my gas smells, or getting squashed whenever I go for a jog! You'll be mommy's little boy-toy, all tucked away in her butt!" She said, and kissed him lovingly on the forehead. "And don't worry sweetie, spending years in my bum will shorten your life dramatically! I promise someday soon *both* of our dreams will come true, and you'll die embarrassingly wedged up your own mother's backside! Oh, I know what'll make you feel better! I've always wanted to get you to do this! Your letter said you liked to fantasize about doing this whenever you got nervous or talked to a girl!" She swiveled her large hips around, and pressed her enormous butt into her son's face. "Kiss mommy's big butt, sweetie!"

Phil was hyperventilating. He couldn't believe how badly this had gone; first his mom had decided he would spend the rest of his life in the back of her panties, and now she wanted him to kiss her ass to show how thankful he was!

"Kiss mom's ass or I'll crush it." Becky whispered in his ear, giving his fragile member an ominous tweak.

With tears threatening to fall, Phil took a deep breath, swallowed what was left of his manhood, and then pressed his lips against his own mother's ass.

"Oh Phil, that feels lovely!" His mom moaned. "And how appropriate! After years of failure with girls, your first kiss is your own mother's big, round bum! Oh keep kissing sweetie," she said, looking over her shoulder as he buried his face in her gigantic rump, "I want you to always remember this sweetie, okay? Always remember how you're feeling right now, kissing your mommy's bum for the first time. I promise you'll get to do it lots and lots!" She was sure Phil didn't need a reminder, but the feeling of forcing her own son to worship her big bottom in abject submission, of his tiny lips kissing all of her big, round butt-cheeks was a feeling she was always going to remember, and she wanted to make sure he did to!

Becky sniggered, and pushed her little brother forward, straight into their mother's cavernous ass-crack!

"Oooh! Someone's eager!" Mrs Bermine said, supressing a giggle. "Okay Becky! It's time to send your brother to his room!"

And with that the inevitable happened, and tiny Phil Bermine was wedged by his sister up his own mother's ass, his tiny body already being squashed and pummeled by her omnipresent maternal buttocks. She shrieked and then giggled in pleasure, explaining to her daughter that she had pushed her little brother so far up her derriere that his little head had popped into her anus! So while his family laughed at his misfortune, poor Phil had to endure the suffocating warm stench of his mother's asshole, while her tight sphincter chewed greedily on his neck and her titanic buttocks ground his body slowly into powder.
1221121211212111122221.title: She's really keeping him in her bottom forever.

12211212112121112.content:
"I think it would be cute to see a little fairy lick her feet." Becky put on the slippers and stood up. She didn't weigh as much as her mother, but Phil was still squashed down as he tried to gasp for air between her smelly toes.

In what seemed like an eternity for Phil, Becky walked upstairs to her room. Then she untied Phil and dumped him on the floor. Phil could only lay on the carpet in pain as Becky rummaged through an old shoebox. "Here it is!" she exclaimed, holding up a tiny doll's fairy outfit, complete with wire wings. "Just the right size for you, too." She picked Phil up and stuffed him in her shoe with the outfit. Then she crammed her sweaty, smelly sock in to prevent his escape. "Now change into the doll outfit or you'll be sorry." With no other options, Phil took off his clothes and put on the fairy costume. Not only was it itchy, it was too tight and constricted his arms and legs. Just as he was finishing up, Becky removed the sock and dumped Phil out of the shoe. "You're so adorable!" she said with an evil smile. "Mandy's going to love you!"

This sort of thing was exactly what Mandy and her "little" friends from the legions of hell loved to do to Phil whenever they could their sticky hands on him. He knew he was about to be put through misery and then some with the young girl. The doorbell rang as Becky was admiring Phil. "Looks like she's here!" Becky said. She snatched Phil up and bolted downstairs. She opened the door to see...
12211212112121112.title: A Fairy for Mandy

122112121121211122.content:
Becky saw the blonde-haired Mandy as well as a girl with brown pigtails that looked to be Mandy's age. "Is it okay if Michelle stays over for a little while, too?" Mandy's mom asked.

"Sure, that's fine," Becky said. "We'll have lots of fun." She held Phil in his fairy costume behind her back. The tiny boy's stomach churned as he listened to the conversation. Now he was going to have to face THREE tormentors. He wasn't too fond of Michelle, either. It was because of Michelle and Mandy that Phil's family knew of his incredible ability to survive abuse. Two years ago, the two girls had gotten ahold of Phil with the intention of using him as a doll. When he tried to get away, the two girls put him in a plastic chair and took turns sitting on him for ten minutes. Although he was flattened and in a great deal of pain, Phil survived with no permenent injuries. After that, Phil's parents prevented Mandy from playing with him, unless under close supervision (except for when she stole him at family gatherings). Now, however, his only line of defense was Becky, who wasn't about to stop the two little girls from their tortorous games.

"Where's Phil?" Mandy asked as Becky shut the door.

"I have him right here," Becky said, pulling him out and showing him to the little girls. They both laughed as they saw the tiny boy in the fairy outfit.

"Why's he dressed like tinkerbell?" Michelle asked.

"He was bad at school, so he's being punished," Becky beamed. And I need you two to help punish him." Both girls smiled evily. "So this is what we're going to do," Becky explained. "You two take your shoes and socks off and put your feet on the coffee table. Phil is going to lick your toes clean."

"Eww, that's icky!" Michelle said, although Phil couldn't help but notice that she was smiling as she said it.

"Shoes and socks off!" Becky commanded. The two girls eagerly obliged, racing over to the sofa and putting their feet on the coffee table. Becky put Phil down in front of Michelle's toes. "Since Michelle doesn't get to play with Phil as much, she gets to go first." Becky decided. "Now lick her feet, little fairy." Both grils laughed at Phil as he went over to Michelle's feet and stuck his tongue to her big toe. The taste wasn't too bad, compared to his mother and sister, who had many of their stink glands activated by hormones. Phil continued to lick as Michelle and Mandy giggled far away from him. This was far from the worst Becky or his mom had done recently, but it was humiliating nonetheless. "It tickles!" Michelle said as she squirmed. Tears were running down her face as the tongue touched her feet again and again.

"It's my turn!" Mandy said.

"No, he's not done with me yet!" Michelle protested.

Mandy shoved her feet in Phil's direction. "If you don't start licking my toes, I'm going to sit on you and squish you!" She announced to Phil.

"If you leave my toes, I'M going to sit on you and squish you!" Michelle announced. Becky said nothing. This was turning out far better than she had hoped for.
122112121121211122.title: A Friend, Great.

choices: "He tried to escape while you two were fighting. Find him and punish him.
"He was between your butts. He's probably on the floor somewhere."
1221121211212111221.content:
Seeing no good option, Phil put his face back down on Michell's toe and continued to lick. He suddenly felt a warm, sticky hand grasp him and pull him up. "No fair!" Michelle protested. "He picked me!"

"Well if he's not licking my feet, he's not licking anyone's!" Mandy said as she threw her cousin on the cushon of the couch. Phil barely had time to look up before the left cheeck of the little girl was settled on top of him. From underneath Mandy Phil could hear a muffled voice. "Philly, Philly, short and fat, I'm your boss, I'll squash you flat!" Mandy sang. It was a song she and her friends would often sing whenever they were tormenting him. While Mandy usually had to worry about adults coming to Phil's rescue, this time there was nothing to stop her. Suddenly the weight on Phil seemed to double and Mandy constantly shifted around, smushing Phil around. It didn't take him long to figure out that the two girls were wrestling for him.

In broken, muffled voices, he could hear: "Leggo!...Get...off!...Meanie...Stop pulling...I'm telling!" Mandy remained in a sitting position right on top of Phil. She didn't want her prize taken away. Sitting on the living room chair, Becky cracked open a can of soda. Phil was getting squashed, Mandy was getting her butt handed to her, and she got to watch midget wrestling. It was like the Holy Trinity!

Suddenly, the weight lifted off of Phil as Michelle pulled Mandy off the couch. Instictively, he grabbed onto the button of her jeans back pocket. Mandy on her stomach landed on the floor by the couch, with Phil still clinging to her butt. Just as the impact of the fall wore off, Phil rolled over in horror to see Michelle sitting right down on top of Mandy's bottom. He tried to move, but the only part of him not squashed directly between them were his legs from the knee down. Michelle pinned down Mandy's body with her hands while her eyes scanned the cushon of the couch for her prisoner. "Where'd he go?" She asked.

Becky could not answer because she was laughing so hard. In between the two blue-jeans covered bottoms, she saw the legs of her little brother kicking frantically. "What's so funny?" Michelle asked, irritated. Becky couldn't speak. Soda was coming up her nose and tears were running down her red face. She snorted more than once as she held her side painfully. Michelle stood up, leaving Phil plastered to Mandy's bottom. Becky didn't try to attack Michelle as she stood up, knocking Phil to the floor. From Phil's prespective, all he knew was that he was trapped between two masses of clothes and flesh that offered him no air and no relief. As he stood up, Mandy's bare foot came down on top of him. He found himself under her weight, looking up at her between her toes.

"What's so funny?" Mandy demanded, her hands on her hips. "And where's Phil?" Finally composing herself, Becky says:
1221121211212111221.title: Was there really a good choice?

choices: Underneath the girls' butts.  They're getting along now, and taking turn
Completely paralyzed from his mouth down.  Becky gleefully tortures him.
12211212112121112211.content:
Becky finally composed herself from her fit of laughter. She looked right at him, but didn't give away where he was. “He tried to escape while you two were fighting. Find him and punish him!” she exclaimed instead. With that, Phil saw Mandy's giant eyes widen, atop her huge body, pressing down on him.

“Which way did he go!?” she cried. Michelle did the same, and the girls began hopping up and down... much to Phil's dismay. Suddenly the enormous foot that was firmly flattening his body, and the other, were coming down on him again and again. The pain was indescribable – so fast, so hard – he was being trampled flat into the carpet...

“I think I saw the runt run in the kitchen, so go see if you can catch him!” Becky laughed, still eying her hopeless little brother under Mandy's feet – he looked so crushed now in his little fairy costume, and she couldn't help but smirk a little at his sudden misfortune. The girls ran off to the other side of the house, and Phil watched, lying on his back, as his giant sister slowly approached and circled him, peering down as a cat stalking her helpless prey.

“She put you down for the count, huh twerp?” her eyes twinkled down as she grinned, and then allowed one of her steps to fall upon his tiny body, cruelly mashing him into the carpet again. She didn't take another step forward, but instead lifted her other foot off the ground, mashing him with all her weight. She grinned down at him playfully and mercilessly, as the pain swelled through his body. “Whatever this does to you, I'll just say it was an accident. I want to see you KO'd, little bro',” she smirked down.

“...Sissy... please don't...” he whimpered, starting to cry.

Becky only smiled bigger, and raised up on her ball of her foot, crushing his tiny chest under the bulk of her weight, balanced directly on him in his fairy costume. His ribs began to crack, painfully – he began to black out... but didn't. He suddenly felt the weight lift up, but only as she put her other foot on the ground, and she rolled him off his back, onto his stomach with the foot that was already on him.

“Hmm... that wasn't enough. Well...” she hesitated.

He was sobbing uncontrollably at this point. He wanted to get away, that was all. Why couldn't he just get away! The smell of her foot was seeping into the sobbing boy's nostrils - he couldn't help but notice it, despite the horrible pain he was going through.

“THIS'll be sure to do it,” he heard his sister snicker, as her foot lifted up off of his back. A moment later, a sharp pain hit him in the back of the neck and head and he was out cold, as her enormous weight came down on him with full force by her heel.

.........................
When he wakes up, he's...
12211212112121112211.title: Alone a moment with Big Sis.

122112121121211122111.content:
When Phil awoke, his body was screaming in agony. He was pinned down against solid wood by a familiar force of tons of flesh covered in denim. "That's enough, Michelle," he heard Becky's muffled voice say. "I think it's Mandy's turn now." Michelle grumbled a bit, but stood up obediently. Phil found himself in the kitchen, laying on a stool looking up to the ceiling. He groaned tried to roll over, only to find that he was taped down by his arms and legs. His ribs, back, neck, and head all felt like they were going to explode, although all of his body hurt.

"He really is a tough little bugger," another teenage girl's voice said from above. Phil looked over, horrified to see a pretty blond high school student in cheerleading shorts and a white tank-top. "Kendra!" he gasped. Kendra gave an evil smile and strutted over to the stool where he was lying. "You're going to be in real trouble when you get to school tomorrow," Kendra said maliciously. "Ms. Priety doesn't take too kindly to people cutting class."

"But I couldn't go to class," Phil protested. "Becky kept me home and..."

"You don't get it, do you?" Kendra inturrupted. "You still think you're going to school to learn. That school let you go so that the poor, overworked students, like your sister and myself have a toy to play with in class. Think about it. Unending punishment for something you really didn't do, a desk where you can't see the board at all in a classroom several levels too advanced for you, torture for the slightest infraction, it's all about making you a toy. I guess you don't know that your sister isn't being charged for tuition anymore."

"What?" Phil said, looking over at Becky.

"You see, little man, the only thing that separates you from other little bugs is your amazing ability to not die. You can apparently take quite a beating and recover quickly. You only come to school to be a toy for the big girls, including Ms. Priety. It will never stop. You might as well accept your fate." Kendra looked over at Mandy, who was looking at Phil anxiously. "How mean of me," she said. "I've been keeping your cute little cousin from her turn." Kendra sauntered off as Mandy plopped down right on top of Phil. "See you in school tomorrow," Kendra sang as she left.

Phil only wished that his cousin's massive weight would just kill him like it should. His mother sold him away to be tormented by giant girls, his sister was going to allow it, and his cousin and her friend were oblivious. How could his life get any worse.

Mandy raised her bottom off the chair and brought it down, smashing Phil into the wooden seat. She repeated this several times, until he was screaming in pain when she lifted up. Then she sat down again, grinding him into the seat. There was a knock at the door and Becky said, "It looks like your mom's here, Mandy."

"I want to play with Phil some more," Mandy said, standing up. "Can I take him home with me? He can go to my school tomorrow."

Becky thought for a moment. "Sure," she said, removing the tape and picking Phil up. She dropped him into Mandy's back pocket and buttoned it up.

"You're the best!" Mandy exclaimed, giving Becky a huge hug. Phil simply sat in the bottom of Mandy's pocket crying as she walked to the door.
122112121121211122111.title: Bad news and worse news

choices: He waits under Mandy's chair for her to get up
He goes to a different pair of feet and prepares to hitch a ride
1221121211212111221111.content:
"Mrs. Bemine," Ms. Prittey said over the phone. "You know you had a deal with this school. Now Phil has missed two out of the three days he has been enrolled."

"But Phil has been missing for those two days," Mrs. Bemine protested.

"In our deal, we specifically said there were to be no excuses for his absence. When he is found, he is to come in tomorrow and live at the school for two weeks. If not, we will reninstate your daughter's tuition bill." Ms. Prittey slammed the phone down in anger. She wanted to play with Phil for another day, and she didn't want to spend another day making up her lesson as she went along. Tormenting Phil was the only thing she had planned for the rest of the week.

Mrs. Bemine fummed. She didn't like the tought of being seperated from her foot toy for two weeks. Whatever Phil was doing now, those two weeks were going to seem like a vacation when she got through with him.
-------------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, at Park County Elementary school, Mandy and Michelle took their seats as class began. "Where's Phil?" Michelle whispered. Mandy responded only by pointing to a bulge in her chest pocket. From where Phil was sitting, it really wasn't a bad spot. His cousin't heartbeat had managed to lull him to sleep on the bus ride over to the school. (He had spent the night tied to a stuffed bear and squeezed by Mandy, making it very hard for him to get to sleep.)

"Good morning kids!" Mrs. Joy said excitedly. She was a pretty, blonde teacher in her mid-twenties with long legs, a slim figure and as much energy as a radioactive espresso. "If you will line up at the door, we'll be ready to go on our feild trip to the science musem.

Michelle and Mandy had completely forgotten about the feild trip that day. Now their toy would just be something to lug around for the day, with no recess or lunch break to play with it.

Phil was awoken from his slumber by the sound of a diesel engine starting up. He hadn't slept through the whole day had he? Maybe going with Mandy wasn't so bad after all.

After a ride of about twenty minutes, the bus stopped and Mandy and Michelle got off. Phil heard a tour guide start talking about the dinosaur bones, and he peaked out of Mandy's pocket and saw that the class was on a feild trip in the musem. Mandy paid little attention to the boy in her pocket. After several attempts to play, Mrs. Joy threatened to take her "doll" away. So, Phil stayed in the pocket, looking out occasionally. When he peeked out one time, he saw that he was looking at a human skeleton-his size. It was an exhibit on the evolution of man and it made note of several tiny babies born mainly in the third world and not reported on by the western media. The exhibit stated that the people "were said to be extremely resilliant to disease, injury and death despite their size. Phil began to formulate a plan of escape.

After lunch, when Mandy did actually get to play with Phil some, the class went to see the Imax movie of an expidition up Mount Everest. Mandy, getting bored and attemting to take advantage of the dark theatre, reached into her pocket only to find that Phil wasn't there. She actually hadn't felt him slip out and climb down her shirt during the first part of the movie. Now he stood under her chair watching her huge feet, and contimplating his next move.
1221121211212111221111.title: On display

choices: "Wear him in your shoe, he can't get away then..."
"Can I have a turn with him, pleeeeze?"
12211212112121112211111.content:
Mandy, suddenly realizing that her tiny toy cousin might have escaped, quickly checked all her other pockets just to be sure. Trying not to look panicky, she glanced around the theater, but of course, could see no sign of tiny Phil. Then she looked on the floor, and couldn't see him anywhere. Where could he have gone?

Phil on the other hand, was counting on his giant little cousin either not realizing he was gone, or not being smart enough to find him, even if she did notice his absence from her pocket. He was hiding under the seat where Mandy was sitting, holding his breath, hopefully.

Mandy reached over and poked Michelle, who was in the seat next to her. 'Phil's gone,' she mouthed. Michelle's eyes grew wider, and she repeated Mandy's futile actions of glancing around the theater and on the floor in front of them.

'I don't see him,' Michelle mouthed back. Phil was hoping – preying that the little girls wouldn't find him, but all was ruined as he saw Mandy's huge eyes appear upside down in front of him. Her blonde bangs dangled down from her head, almost touching the floor, and before he could do much more than notice her, and start to stand up, her arm came around the bottom of the seat and the little three-inch boy was wrapped in her moist sticky palm. She quickly sat back up and held him with her hands on her lap, peering down at him with a cute, victorious smirk.

“Found ya!” she quietly chuckled. No kidding, Phil thought.

She pulled both her legs up on the seat with her, sitting cross-legged. “Mandy please..!” he tried to beg, but her grip around him tightened, and he couldn't say anymore.

“Philly, Philly, short and fat...” she began in a whisper, as the huge grin spread across her face, and she started to shift her weight off of her left hip, and used her left hand to bring the tiny boy around to it. It was raised off the seat, as Mandy, still cross-legged, shoved him right under the denim of her small buttocks. The cushioning of the seat gave under him as she slowly shifted her weight back to the left, trapping him under immense pressure and darkness.

He heard her muffled, cute whisper continue, “I'm your boss, I'll squish you flat!” The crushing denim lifted off of him, for a moment, and then just came back down, crushingly. She had lifted herself up a little, clutching the armrests and pushing herself up in the air for a second, and then let go. It worked perfectly. Every time she did it, the 8-year-old's little butt became a horrible and painful force, flattening and crushing her tiny 13-year-old cousin underneath her, and then it conqueringly rested on him as she wiggled it around and quietly giggled to Michelle.

Eventually she heard him start crying, at which point she pulled her legs up, sitting with her knees in the air and her feet on the front of the seat, putting nearly twice as much weight on the tiny boy to muffle him out. She glanced to Michelle, who was grinning, and she grinned back. Then she tried to watch the show, which probably had over an hour to go...

Several minutes passed, and Phil eventually quit crying at all, pressed so painfully hard into the cushioning underneath giant Mandy's unkind denim butt. Slowly her butt scooted off of him, to the right, and she looked down at him with a huge, cute, evil grin. “Philly Philly he's so flat, use him for a welcome mat..!” she whispered, giggling. The light from the boring movie reflected on everything, as Mandy's eyes cut from him, to it, to Michelle, and back to him. “What should we do now..?” she whispered to Michelle, with a sweet, mischievous grin.

Phil had the weight off him, but he couldn't move again yet. Yesterday, it had taken him hours to get back to the point that he could move, after being flattened this way. It would take hours again, and he didn't even have the strength to talk again yet.

Michelle leaned toward Mandy with a matching grin, and whispered...
12211212112121112211111.title: Caught and Punished by Mandy!

choices: "Phil heals fast. We can still have some more fun with him."
"Don't be silly! We're not going to give him back to Becky!"
122112121121211122111111.content:
"You know, I was nice to you letting you ride in my shirt pocket," Mandy whispered to Phil as she crushed him with her fist. "But maybe you won't get out of here." She lifted her hip up again and sat directly on Phil. Although the barely-concious Phil didn't realize it, Mandy was bending down and taking off her shoe. She lifted her butt up, grabbed Phil and laid him in the bottom, his head right up against the end of the toe section.

"Mandy, don't please..." Phil managed to gasp as the sock-covered foot came down on top of him. He felt his body flatten just from Mandy tying the shoe back on tight. Then he felt the weight of her leg press on his chest as he gasped for air between her toes. Mandy ground her foot into the ground, all the while giggling with Michelle.

"Mandy and Michelle, be quiet and watch the movie," Ms. Joy whispered.

"Sorry Mrs. Joy," the two girls said in unison, huge smiles decorating their pretty faces. Mandy continued to grind Phil into the ground as the movie continued on. Phil remained concious and in agony the entire time. When the movie ended and Mandy stood up, Phil's body, beaten from being sat on, walked on, starved and smothered, could take no more. He blacked out.

When he woke up, he could smell cake. He opened his eyes and painfully crained his head. Sitting right next to him was a massive twinkie. "We remembered that I hadn't fed you today," Mandy said from somewhere. "Eat something before you die." It hurt the joints of his arms, but Phil managed to tear some of the cake off and devour it.

"You were flat as a pancake when Mandy took you out of her shoe," Michelle said. "You look like when Daffy Duck gets run over by a steamroller. She smiled brightly as she looked down at Phil. She inhaled deeply directly over him. "Your feet really stink," she giggled at Mandy. Phil turned his head some more to see that he was in a little girl's room, although he couldn't tell if it was Mandy's or Michelle's.

Michelle looked down at their tiny victim. "He looks hurt," she observed. "Do you think Becky's going to be mad when she gets him back like this?"

Mandy thought for a moment. Then she said:
122112121121211122111111.title: Food for Thought

choices: He's trampled in her sock while she plays soccer...
Phil's mom shows up, wanting Phil...
1221121211212111221111111.content:
Mandy thought for a moment. “It's fine, he heals pretty fast. Besides, I don't think Becky'll really care how she gets him back,” she laughed. Phil was weakly clawing at the giant twinkie in front of him, the first morsel of food he had seen in nearly two days.

Michelle giggled. “Yeah, Becky's so cool like that,” she said. The twinkie was tasting so good to Phil, at least what small bites he could get of it.

“He's had enough to eat. Let's play with him some more!” Mandy laughed, and suddenly the twinkie was lifted high up in the air, out of Phil's reach. He could only lay there, on the floor, as a giant finger rolled him on his back, and he was treated to the view of his giant cousin happily shoving the entire twinkie in her gaping mouth, leaning over him and then smiling with huge bulging cheeks, as she chewed it up.

Michelle scooted forward, leaning over him too. “What are we gonna do first?” she grinned down.

Mandy swallowed the twinkie, continuing to smile down. She lifted her barefoot up above him, and lowered it down on his tired body. “Squash him flat as we can,” she casually said, as she grinned at Michelle.

“Okay,” Michelle giggled, as her foot joined Mandy's on top of Phil's weak body. As both girls stood up, he was horrified at the enthusiasm with which they stomped and mashed him into the carpet. It was as if hurting him WAS what was fun to them anymore – a flurry of foot after foot after foot after foot came down on him, mixed in with the blur of giant, cute, laughing faces, looking down.

Eventually, when they were finally satisfied, they stopped and examined him. He was so beaten and flattened that he never looked like he would move again, and that was precisely how he felt. The girls just giggled down, and Mandy sat down, resting her smelly feet on top of him.

“Mandy, do you have a soccer game today?” came Mandy's mom's voice from outside the room.

Mandy looked thoughtful for a moment, then yelled back. “Yeah Mom, I do!”

“Then you need to get ready!” Her mom replied.

“Okay, I will!” Mandy replied, and they could hear her mom walking away. Mandy spied her muddy soccer cleats over at the edge of the room, and the unwashed green socks bunched up inside them.

Then the giant 8-year-old blonde girl looked back down at Phil, with an evil grin...
1221121211212111221111111.title: Stomped Flat Again

12211212112121112211111111.content:
'Oh no...' was all Phil had time to think before Mandy had traversed the distance between him and her soccer cleats, returned, and pulled out the bunched up green socks. They were already dangling over him, and Mandy grinned down gleefully from above. He was suddenly more horrified than ever before; the intensity of what she was proposing to do to him was greater than anything he had ever experienced. If this giant 8-year-old trampled him under her feet during an entire soccer match, he was certain he couldn't survive.

“...please... don't...” he managed to say, putting forth as much effort as he could.

“I have to, or you'll try to get away!” she laughed. Suddenly her right foot plastered his tiny body, and her toes wrapped tightly around his head. He was painfully lifted into the air as Mandy plopped down on her butt. A green sock was slowly pulled over him, as Mandy sang down at him: “Philly Philly looks so sweet, sniffing pretty princess feet!”

Soon the sock was all the way on, and Mandy commenced to put on her other sock and her cleats. Phil quickly found himself in a pitch-black, smelly, sticky, extremely confining prison. He began to cry as Mandy's toes began to painfully wrench at his head - and she hadn't even stood up yet.

“He's sure trapped now,” Michelle commented, with a giggle.

“Yeah, he's like a rock in my shoe,” Mandy laughed, continuing to squeeze and wrench her tiny older cousin's head as hard as she could.

“Hey, I've heard of people keeping things in their shoes for good luck,” Michelle said.

“But he's not really in my shoe, he's in my sock,” Mandy pointed out.

“That's still in your shoe,” Michelle argued.

“Okay then, I'll say he is my good luck charm,” Mandy proclaimed.

She suddenly stood up, putting all her weight on her left foot. She giggled, and slowly lowered her right foot down onto the ground. Her toes were maniacally grinding into his face and head, as she slowly increased the pressure on his body in her shoe. She finally lifted her left foot off the ground, putting her full weight on the tiny boy. He was in so much pain!

...there was so much pain... he could hear her giggling above him...

...Phil lost consciousness, and Mandy's torturous treatment of him, throughout the entire ordeal, was not experienced by the tiny boy:

...He wasn't conscious as Mandy stomped down the hallway and to her mom's car...

...He wasn't conscious to experience Mandy's giant toes grinding his face as hard as they could during the drive to take Michelle home, and then to the soccer match...

...He didn't hear Mandy's mocking laughter from the outside, or feel the horrible crushing weight of her foot crashing down on him countless times as she ran after the soccer ball...

...And he didn't hear who Mandy talked to after the game...
12211212112121112211111111.title: In Mandy's Sock during Soccer

choices: Phil must learn the new rules of the house...
Someone is sitting on Phil when he wakes up...
122112121121211122111111111.content:
After the game was over, Mandy was walking toward her mom's car, off to herself. Suddenly she heard footsteps running up behind her. “Hey Mandy I saw the game, you did great!” Becky said, out of breath after running to catch up.

“Thanks, I had a good luck charm,” Mandy replied.

“Hey, do you have Phil with you?” Becky asked, out of breath after running to catch up with Mandy.

“Um... yeah... he's the good luck charm,” Mandy replied.

“I need him back,” Becky continued, still gasping for air. “Mom said that she wants him to stay at home from now on, so I don't need to be letting people borrow him anymore. We're even going to start homeschooling again – me and Phil both. So where is he?”

Mandy pointed down to her right cleat and smiled in response.

Becky's jaw flew open and she laughed. “Whoa! Is he still alive?”

“I... 'think' so,” she said slowly, ending with a smile.

“You 'think'?” Becky cautiously smiled back. “I think we'd better see for sure,” she finished. This little 8-year-old was so cute, but Becky realized that her little brother's dead body may be in this girl's soccer cleats. Something about that made Becky have to admire her; so much cruelty in such a cute little package.

Mandy removed her right cleat, which for a moment left Becky confused when she didn't see her little brother inside of it. Mandy, however, went on to remove her green sock, revealing the tiny body's true whereabouts. Becky busted out in laughter and had to cover her mouth – she saw Phil's tiny body twisted and flattened into the ball of the little girl's foot. Mandy made a goofy grin and continued to forcefully squeeze his little flattened head between her toes.

Becky slowly reached in and pulled him free of the tormenting toes. “He looks dead,” she stated. Holding him in her palm, both girls peered down at him for a while. He looked mashed – his body was flattened and twisted. It looked very bad, and he looked like he could easily be dead.

“Wait,” Becky said. “It's hard to see... but he's breathing, just barely,” she finished

“Really? I don't see it...” Mandy replied, her big eyes moving closer.

“I can tell – he's my brother, I've watched him breathe since he was born,” Becky said.

“So he's alive?” Mandy asked.

“Yeah. And if he's alive, he'll heal back to normal,” Becky smiled. She opened her purse, dropped the tiny little beaten boy inside, then zipped it back up.

Mandy looked from the purse to Becky, and thought for a moment. “So... when he goes back to normal, are you, like, gonna squash him some more?” Mandy asked with a smile.

Becky smirked, and began to stand up. “Mom and I have been coming up with some some special ways of convincing Phil to do well in his homeschooling, so that he won't slack off . Let's just say that he's going to be under a lot of pressure from now on, whatever he does,” Becky finished with a wink, and began to walk away.

“But – I think Mom would let you borrow him every once in a while, if I talk to her. You need him as a good luck charm for soccer, right?”

“That'd be great!” Mandy smiled.

“Okay then, I'll ask. See ya!” Becky said.

“Bye bye!” Mandy replied. She watched as Becky, carrying the purse with tiny Phil inside, walked to the car where her mother was waiting for her. As she was putting her sock and shoe back on, she saw them drive away.
122112121121211122111111111.title: Returned to Becky

choices: Their mom lays down the law...
1221121211212111221111111111.content:
“...Phil...wake up...” Phil heard his mother say. A large object was hitting him in the stomach... It was his mother's finger, he saw, as he woke up. He was lying on the living room floor, and as he looked up toward the ceiling, he saw two things. The first, following his mother's finger to her body, was his mother's face grinning down at him, upside down. She was sitting cross legged behind him. The second was his enormous sister, standing directly in front of him grinning down.

“Hey shrimp, we've got some stuff to tell you, so wake up,” Becky laughed.

Phil woke all the way up – and he was hardly able to move. He had healed considerably from his horrible state after Mandy's soccer game, but couldn't sit up. It didn't help that Becky swung her leg forward, and suddenly hovered her giant smelly sole above him. Phil began to scream and hysterically cry – he was too weak to get up, and he was going to get squashed again!

Becky's smile grew as she looked at her mother, hearing her little brother's crying. “Can I?” she asked their mother, as she tried to balance on one foot, holding her other one threateningly over her little brother.

“No, I want to punish him for crying,” their mother smiled, leaning forward into her son's view. She slowly scooted her enormous body around, and Phil found himself looking up his mother's back, at her hair dangling down. She glanced over her shoulder at him, grinning for a moment before she began to bounce backwards toward her sobbing son.

He suddenly realized that his mother was going to SIT on him because he was crying!

He sobbed as he looked up at his big sister, who was just grinning down, enjoying the show. Suddenly his mother's butt hit the carpet right above his head, and he got one last look at her grinning face before she bounced her giant, jean-clad bottom right onto his face, crushing it underneath her incredible weight. He heard her giggling, right before the giant crushing denim lifted up, and landed again, smashing his entire body this time instead. She then wiggled her butt around, grinding him into the carpet.

“How long are you gonna do that?” Becky inquired, after a while.

“Minutes... Hours... as long as I want,” their mom replied, with a snicker. “He has to see what being punished really means, if we want this to work,” she smiled to her daughter.

“Yeah, that makes sense,” Becky added, walking around and sitting on the floor across from her mother.

Becky and her mother sat and talked for several minutes, before her mother finally lifted up off of the tiny child. “That was your punishment for crying, sweetie,” she smiled down. Phil was hardly in a state to answer – he was still dazed and disoriented, and a little flat. “Becky, give it another try,” their mother added.

“What, the foot thing?” Becky asked.

“Yes. See if he can handle that without crying.”

“No problem, Mom,” Becky laughed. She stood up and walked around her mother, to the original position where she was standing above him earlier. Their mother turned around, to watch again. This time, as Becky stuck out her foot and hovered it over the tiny boy, grinning all the while she did it, Phil tried as hard as he could to not scream or cry. He couldn't do it, and a shrill cry escaped from his lungs as he broke down and started sobbing.

“Can I?” Becky asked again to her mother, grinning from ear to ear.

“Of course!” she laughed. “Stomp him until he stops crying,” she smiled down.

“Great!” Becky called down, evilly, as her foot came down on his body painfully. She pressed it hard, and he felt like he was going to pass out as she ground him into the carpet. Then she lifted it up and stomped him again. He could hear her snickering at him from above, as stomp after stomp was delivered.

He found himself extremely disoriented after a while, but when he finally gained his senses he felt like he was plastered to his sister's foot, and was looking up at both of their pretty faces from between Becky's stinky wiggling toes.

“Is that enough, Mom?” Becky asked.

“Yes, but keep your foot on him while we explain all of this to your brother,” she smiled.

“No problem,” Becky laughed, wrapping her grimy toes around Phil's face.

“Anyway, there was stuff we needed to explain to you, before we got carried away,” his mother began with a snicker. “You're being homeschooled from now on, along with your sister. We've come up with some new rules you need to know, so listen up...”
1221121211212111221111111111.title: This is Homeschooling?

choices: He wakes up dangling around his sister's neck, like a pendant.
He wakes up between his mother's giant toes.
12211212112121112211111111111.content:
Phil was sickened by his position. His giant sister was delighted, grinning down at his crushed body under her smelly toes, wiggling right over his tiny head. He was getting used to the smell, he realized, as it was only occasionally strong enough to make him gag. At this point it was more of a musty aroma that surrounded him.

“Okay sweetie, so the first thing that you've gotta remember is that any crying will result in massive punishment. If either me or your sister catch you crying, we'll have to punish you severely for it. If we're already punishing you, we'll have to make it worse. Got it?”

Phil tried to reply or nod, but his lungs were depressed of air, and his head was little more than a limp toy being flicked to a fro by his own sister's smelly, grimy toes. He just stared up at his mother, who grinned back down.

'I think he gets it, Mom,” Becky snickered.

“Alright. The next thing is, that you're in competition with your sister from now on. I've decided to move you from 5th grade up to her level, 9th grade. You'll be tested at the beginning of every day. If your sister outscores you, you'll spend an hour under your sister's smelly feet. You'll be let free to study for the next day's test, but I'll let your sister choose where you sleep that night.” she giggled.

Phil wanted to cry... he felt the tears swelling up in his eyes, but remembered rule one. He held it in, he didn't want to be stomped again.

“And finally, you'll refer to me as 'Miss Bemine,' and you'll refer to your sister as 'Miss Becky'. For each time you fail to do this, you'll be spat on once. Also, since I'm going to be at work much of the time, your sister will be in *complete* charge of you. Whatever she says goes, no matter what it is. If I come home and hear that you've been disobeying her, I'll make you be her human lollipop for a week.” she snickered.

Looking up from between her toes, he saw Becky grinning as she stuck out her tongue, making a licking motion as she held up her hand as if holding a lollipop. Gross, he thought. He knew that Becky would somehow make that a reality, someday. He seriously wanted to cry. His life was falling apart, and he could see that he was going to be a slave to his sister for the rest of it. What could he do? Tears started running down his cheeks.

“No crying, Phil,” his mother sternly said. He couldn't stop, he tried. “Becky, go get my boots. I'm gonna teach him a lesson,” she grinned. Finally, Becky's foot lifted, but with her tower-like legs she sped down the hallway so fast that he hardly had time to fill his lungs with air. After a few gasps, she was back, dangling her mother's favorite brown boots in hand.

“Here ya go, Mom,” she grinned.

“Thanks honey,” she replied, taking the boots in hand. Soon Phil's exhausted body was lifted between his mother's dainty fingers, as she lifted him to her enormous, beautiful, perfect face.

“Mom!” he cried, being for mercy. He saw a hint of pity in her giant eyes, but her mouth began to grin, as she pursed her lips. Soon a huge ball of spit had formed... there was nothing he could do, as she lowered him to her giant mouth, and with a “Pwuh!” spat it right on his body, engulfing him in it.

“It's Miss Bemine, so don't forget,” she grinned, showing her huge, perfect white teeth. Then he felt himself falling, and the opening of his mother's right boot was right below. He landed with a plop, still covered in his mom's spit. Looking around he only saw darkness... he was laying on the insole.

“See ya when you wake up, little bro!” he heard his giant sister mock from high above.

The next thing he saw was his mothers enormous toes, wiggling at the top of the boot. “Ready or not...,” he heard his mom giggle, as her foot began to lower, cutting off all light. Soon he could smell his mother's toes, as he crawled toward the toe section of the boot. He didn't make it. His mother's smelly sole covered him, rolling him back and forth until he was face up. The pressure built up as she stood up... He was being crushed, it hurt so bad.

He heard muffled laughter on the outside of the boot, as his mother walked around. He began to black out, forgetting where he was. The laughter above was the last thing he heard, as he completely lost consciousness...
12211212112121112211111111111.title: Mom's Rules from Hell

122112121121211122111111111111.content:
Someone was watching as Phil's mother and sister turned against him. And seeing this made him absolutely sick. He existed between worlds, the physical reality of Phil's world, and the metaphysical spiritual plane unseen by mere mortals. His body was made up of a glowing blue light in the shape of a man. He glared as he listened to these two women turn on the boy like this. He saw Becky lift Phil out of her mother's boot - his body limp and unconscious.

He saw her take a necklace chain in her hands. She tied what amounted to a small noose at the end of it. She then put it around her neck before taking Phil. She slipped it around her tiny brother's throat and gave it a tug. Phil suddenly sprang to life as his hands reached for the chain. His fingers slid between it and his neck, giving his windpipe room to breathe.

The being growled clenching his fists as he watched this farce happen.
"This will NOT do!" he said.

--

A young man suddenly appeared in the living room between Becky and Phil's mother. They startled when they saw him. He seemed to be no older then seventeen. He had an unshaven beard, brown hair, hazel green eyes. He wore a black blazer over a grey t-shirt and a matching black fedora. His pants were simple jeans and he wore tennis shoes. He had a pair of box-glasses; the half-rims were deep red. He glared at Becky behind them. There was not much else to him other than he was leaning on a brown cane at his right side.

"Who the Hell are you?" the mother asked. "What do you think you're doing in my House?"

"What the Fuck do you think you're doing?" he asked them both. "Do you not realize that that is your son and brother you just stomped all over. The one that this little whore has dangling around her neck? What the Fuck is wrong with you, you Bints?! What kind of sick fuck allows this to happen to her children?!"

"Get out of my house now, or I will call the police," Phil's mother said.

"You're not going to call the Cops," the boy told her. "Otherwise you'd have done it by now. As sick and depraved you, those brats at school, and those crazy teachers, I doubt the police are as depraved as you. They wouldn't take kindly to what you've been doing to the boy."
