Phil in the meanwhile continued to watch as this guy just came out of nowhere and started scolding his mom and sister. This seemed to be the first legitimate ray of light he'd seen in days. The first time someone was being called out for what they did to him. He still struggled to get a good breath. Suddenly the cane at the boy's side was lifted and the rubber tip at the end was inches away from the right side of Becky's chin.

"You tried to turn your own brother into a slave?" he asked her. "Give me one good reason why I shouldn't kill you now."

That was all Phil's mother needed to hear. She immediately rushed for the phone on the end table near the couch. But as she picked up the phone, the young man twirled the cane away from Becky's face and pointed it toward her. Suddenly a blue energy ball shot from the stopper at the end of the cane and destroyed the receiver before she could dial 9-1-1.

"We're sorry...the number you are using has been disconnected," he said as he pointed the cane at her now. Becky in the meanwhile went for her own cellphone already dialing 9-1-1. But when she put the phone to her ear, all she heard was static. She looked at her phone; the signal bars were fluctuating between full bars to none, until they completely disappeared. "Your house just became the Area's number one dead-zone. We won't have any...rude interruptions for the rest of the night."

Becky and Ms. Bemine were shocked by what they saw. Phil couldn't help but be awed by it. He didn't know whether to be excited or terrified. Seeing what this guy just did to a phone, there's no limit to the damage that he could do to him. Although, so far he seemed to be acting in Phil's defense, Phil thought he could trust so many people lately only to have them turn on him. Who knows what this guy was up to?

"If you'd be so kind," he said referring to Becky. "Gently remove the boy from the chain, and set him down on that table." Becky slowly did as he ordered and set Phil down as gently as she could. Phil watched as the young man stared at his mother.

"What are you?" she asked him.

"...I am he who has watched this world since the first lifeforms were soup in a pond," he said. "I have observed every era of human kind. And I find an interesting anomaly...The more civilized a nation or people claim to be...the more hypocritical their practices are. I saw the Jews in Egypt, the oppression of the Persian Empire, the trading of African Slaves in the Americas. When a society deems themselves the pinnacle of civilization, all other nations and their people become inferior...But instead of sharing their collective wisdom in an attempt at world peace...the so called Civilized people barbarically enslave all others in the pursuit of land or cheap labor...or maybe just for the sake of feeling superior. And that last one...makes me sickest to my heart; should I have one. I was close to interfering; the scale of which would nearly decimate mankind on a global scale. But just when I thought human cruelty had met its height, America changed. Transformed into the country it was meant to be and slavery and the mistreatment of others began to die out. And yet you have the nerve to act so shamefully to your own son because he is smaller and weaker than you...You speak of being superior - of being civilized...and yet you act like an animal."

Suddenly he brought the cane up and pressed the length of the pole against her throat, pinning her to the wall. "I'm not the only one of my kind; my brothers and sisters thought the same way you do about Phil...Only we made all of mankind into our play things from time to time. And for our crimes...we were all punished. Imprisoned - trapped in inescapable forms; the form of those we thought were inferior. And it taught us temperance. So...How would you and your daughter like to spend the rest of your miserable days as Rats, huh? Or maybe...cockroaches; no I can be more creative. Oh I got it...how about...a beautiful Butterfly? You could fly around with your beautiful colors until you get caught in someone's net; be it a kid wanting to rip your wings off, or someone to stick a pin through you and display you behind plate glass. That should put you into some perspective about what you've done to your own goddamn Son!" He then tightened his grip on her throat. "Or should I just kill you now?"
122112121121211122111111111111.title: Someone's Not Happy

12211212112121112211111111112.content: Phil was forced to lay under his Becky's smelly foot while she explained the rules of their homeschooling. First off, you will learn each day at my feet. Second, during the lesson, if you are asked a question and answer incorrectly you will receive a punishment of my choosing. And lastly, if you cry during your punishment i will still enforce mom's rule. So what do you think bro?
12211212112121112211111111112.title: Becky's Rules

choices: The first day of home school...
122112121121211122111111111122.content:
Too weak to fight, Phil submits to the new rules. He is a broken boy physically. He has not yet lost his spirit though, and he resolves himself to fight another day.

Only time would tell if that was a wise decision...
122112121121211122111111111122.title: Submission

1221121211212111221111111111221.content: Your mom picks you up and places you on a wooden chair. "Now lets begin" she says as your sister rolls in a chalkboard on wheels. She starts writing on the board and teaching but you cant really focus on what she is saying. You are too busy thinking about how horrible your life was going to be... You pretend to pay attention but you soon zone out and stare out the window. Suddenly your world starts moving as your mom tilts the chair forward making you fall to the floor. You look up to see her huge sole coming down on you and SPLAT! She grinds your body into the floor saying "I'm not at the window Phil PAY ATTENTION!" She lifts her foot up but your squished body is stuck to it. She rolls her eyes and slams her foot onto the chair and rubs it back and fourth until you peel off her foot and are stuck to the seat. When you unflatten she says "Lets try this again." She gets through the lesson and turns around to see you paying close attention. "Good now what was the main point of the second section?" Being stomped flat left you out of it for the rest of the lesson and you werent able to focus on the lesson much after that. "Ummm.. it was...uhh" You quickly shut up as she gets an angry look on her face and walks over to the chair. She then turns around and SLAMS her ass down onto you. She lifts her butt up and SLAMS it down again saying "You were sitting right here, right infront of the board and you didnt learn anything?" She lifts her butt up again to hear your answer. Plastered on the chair you manage to say "I tried but.." SLAM! her gigantic ass crushes you again."But nothing! Theres no excuse!" she says as she grinds you into the chair with her gigantic butt. She finally gets up revealing your twisted and smashed body. "Becky sit on him" Becky cheerfully hops her butt onto you and listens to her mother. "Shouldn't it be easy to just sit there and pay attention?" Becky replies "Seems easy to me whats the problem little bro can't pay attention?" she grinds you under her ass as she says this. "What should his punishment be....?" your mom asks herself.
1221121211212111221111111111221.title: Tons of Learning

12211212112121112211111111112211.content:
"Oooh, punishment time!" Becky began, bouncing on her tiny, smashed little brother.

Mashed under the hard denim, Phil couldn't believe it. He was actually getting used to this kind of treatment. After weeks of torment at her feet, and under her butt, being smashed into her armpits and used as her human jolly rancher, he cringed upon hearing giant Becky speak in that tone of voice again.

"It's gotta be creative though, or he won't be able to tell the difference it and this!" his mother laughed. "He's toughened up a bit, just crushing him won't seem to do it."

"Oh, I've got this," Becky grinned, as she hopped up off her her tiny brother. Light and the lack of pressure suddenly hit him... but everything looked blurry. Becky left the room, but soon returned... with a plastic egg. Breaking it open, she revealed a giant lump of pink puddy, which she wrapped around her brother, only leaving his tiny head exposed.

"I see where this is going, long term punishment," their mother grinned.

"In ya go!" Becky continued, dropping the puddy, and tiny Phil, down into her favorite blue sneakers. "Now, since you were ignoring what mom said, I'm gonna wear you in these baby-blues everywhere, for two months straight!"

"Sis, no, you can't!" Phil cried, struggling to get out.

"Enjoy your stay!" she mocked down as her barefoot approached...
12211212112121112211111111112211.title: Becky's Blue Sneakers

122112121121211122111111111122112.content:
His body was compressed into the puddy as Becky's sweaty bare sole entered the sneaker, flattening to the insole. The shoes fit perfectly; they were Becky's favorite pair, and the ones she often went jogging in. They were molded to her feet.

"Mmmmfffff!" he screamed, as the smelly flesh of his sister's sole began to press down, filling the shoe, trapping him helplessly in darkness. He heard the laces being pulled tight. Soon the shoes were double-knotted. The next thing Phil felt was a feeling of sudden acceleration, followed by a crushing, flattening BOOM!

"Mmmm, squishy-squashy squishy-squashy," Becky giggled as her weight flattened the oval-shaped ball of puddy, pancaking it between the bottom of her foot and the insole of her shoe. Phil, of course, still encased, found himself flattened in a cushioning layer of puddy; he was kind of protected, but still very crushed, and completely immobile.

Phil's tiny face was buried in the smelly sole of Becky's foot, but his frail body stretched out along the inside of the newly formed puddy-pancake, holding his arms and legs firmly in place. There would be NO covering his face; his sister's giant, sweaty, stinky foot would have no problem delivering it's punishment. Breathing in of itself was humiliating, forcing him to inhale the overpowering scent of Becky's giant foot. Within seconds, the heat skyrocketed, making Becky's foot begin to sweat, and making Phil feel as though he was going to have a panic attack.

His heart started beating fast, and he struggled with all his might to pull himself free. He couldn't take this! He inhaled the powerful smell of his sister's foot as he began to hyperventilate, swallowing mouthfuls of his sister's pungent foot sweat as it began to drench him in the darkness. After struggling with all his might, he finally had to relax, and submitted to shaking, quivering under the crushing weight of his sister's body, tears streaming down his face.

"This feels so good, you wouldn't believe it mom," Becky's muffled voice could be heard high above. "It's like perfectly molded to the shape of my foot, I could get very, very used to this, you know?" she giggled.

"What about your brother, can you feel him?" their mother inquired.

"Hmm," Becky began, "Not really." BOOM! BOOM! Phil's breath was knocked out of him under two punishing, crushing stomps. "Oh brother, where art thou?" he heard his sister's mocking call. "Well, I can't really feel him, just the puddy. Don't worry mom, he's tough, I've never been able to do anything he didn't heal back from."

"I'll take your word for it," their mother continued. "I suppose it'll be nice to have an only child for a couple of months," their mom chirped. "Tutoring such a tiny boy is so stressful," she smiled, walking over and giving Becky a quick kiss on the cheek. "I'll enjoy the break," she giggled.

"I'LL enjoy having him as a nice little mini-insole for a couple of months," Becky laughed, balancing on one foot. "Unless we decide this is permanent, right mom?" she laughed.

"No sweetie, I'm not gonna let you have him for good, as much as I know you'd love that," their mother replied. "He's still your little brother."

"But he's just SO little and pathetic, he belongs under the big people's feet," Becky laughed, walking to the front door, and putting on a jacket. ""Anyway mom, I'm gonna go out and get a bite to eat, I'll be back later."

"Alright sweetie, just be careful. And at least try to remember your brother's down there..."

...

...

...

(One week later)

Phil was losing his mind. There were only two different parts of his day anymore, like day and night. Becky's giant smelly foot was sometimes in the shoe, crushing him. Other times he was alone, waiting for her to return, and honestly he didn't know which one was worse.

Sometimes she would wear socks, sometimes not, but regardless it was always the most painful, humiliating, overwhelming experience possible. His mind was breaking, he would scream up at his sister whenever she was inserting or removing her feet from her sneakers, but it was no use, she either intentionally ignored him, or just plain didn't hear him.

Occasionally throughout the day Becky would slip off her shoe and peek inside, sticking her tongue out or smirking with a feeling of pure superiority, knowing full well that had had no power whatsoever to stop her from putting her giant foot back in on top of him again.

"How's the smell, twerp?" she would occasionally mock. "You want out, you little freak?" she'd also mock, but before he could even begin to speak, her giant foot would come down into the shoe again, smashing him back down into submission, as she casually watched TV or sat at her computer desk.

She made sure to wear the sweatiest socks, and made regular trips to the school, practicing with the track and tennis team. They welcomed her back; even though she was being home-schooled, everyone knew her, and loved her. She was a very popular girl, after all. While she was good at track, she sucked at tennis, and when she missed a shot she would often stomp Phil mercilessly under her feet in anger.

The days went by so slowly, and to his horror, he found himself actually looking forward to the times when his sister would mock him, and tease him. At least he was being acknowledged, at least he was getting to see a face, even if it was his giant, rotten sister who totally ruled his world.

...

...

...

(One month later)

Becky hadn't acknowledged Phil for several days. When she put on the shoe, she simply put it on. No mocking Phil, no tongue stuck out, no wiggling her toes to make fun of him, no nothing. He had retreated deep into his mind. The smell of his sister's foot was a constant, and he never got used to it. It never seemed to go away.

He had no power to escape her, and after a month of torment, he was beginning to believe what she said about him belonging under her feet. He was a little, pathetic freak of nature. He belonged under the big people's feet. He completely deserved the humiliation, being crushed, mashed, hurt, and starved. He was worthless.

He had always depended on "big people" to take care of him, to feed him and protect him. Now he realized it. He barely qualified as a person at all. He was pathetic, barely more than a bug, weak and unable to stop his own sister from using him as an insole on a whim. This was where he really belonged, since he was small, so inferior.

Flattened into the puddy, he cried himself to sleep every night, knowing that his sister's giant foot would enter the shoe in the morning, to torment him and crush his spirit even further down into the insole of her shoe. Part of him knew what had happened, a small part of him refused to accept it.

He would never get over this. He was broken, he belonged to his sister.

...

...

...

(Two months later)

"Well, Philly Willy, time to wake up!" Becky grinned. He was finally out of the shoe, his sister was dangling him, and the puddy, in front of her giant face. "You're so pathetic, I could do this for two more months, easy." she laughed.

"Sis..." He barely managed to murmur.

"How'd my foot smell, huh, HUH?" she mocked, her giant mouth filling his vision. "You're just a pathetic little freak that only deserves to live under the bottom of my dirty, sweaty, stinky foot. You're lucky you've got such a great sister like me, or you'd probably be dead by now. Say you love me."

He had no will left. He belonged to his sister now. "Yeah, I love you, sis, you're the best," he whimpered.

"That's right," she replied, expectantly. "Now, what to do with you, what to do. Hey, MOM!" she yelled.

"Yes honey!" their mom's voice called from the other room.

"I finally took Phil out of my shoe, what should I do with him now?" Becky yelled.

"Oh, I don't know, honey, I forgot all about him, I don't have any school lessons planned. Just do whatever you want with him for now," their mother replied.

"Okay mom, no problem!" Becky grinned, evilly.

"No!" Phil cried, weakly, as he and the puddy were shoved back down into her shoe. "Sis, please..." he cried, but before he could finish his sentence, his sister was standing over him, grinning, smirking down into the shoe. Her barefoot was hovering over the mouth of the shoe, her giant bare toes wiggling.

"Isn't it just heavenly, the smell?" she grinned, and muffling her tiny brother's weak screams, her foot slid back into the smelly blue sneaker, flattening him back down into the position he'd been in for so long. He cried. There was no fighting his sister, and his mom wasn't going to do a thing to help..

Her hot, sweaty sole covered him again, just like so many times before. She laughed from high above, victorious as always. He hated her, why did she have this power over him? It wasn't fair! Her foot kneaded and pressed his tiny, crushed form into place. He was her insole, him and the puddy that still encased him.

"What the hell, I'll make it another two weeks," she snickered.

...

...

...

For two more weeks, Phil felt himself whithering away. His body had no energy, at all. He was starving, moving the muscles in his mouth or even opening his eyes seemed to hurt. His body was smashed under Becky's feet without mercy. He lost track of time. Becky was becoming as fast as anyone on the track team, and had actually improved at tennis to the point where she was winning matches.

From the many muffled conversations he heard, he could tell that everyone loved his sister. She was a funny, popular girl, and easily struck up new conversations and quickly made friends. The days were long, and he felt more like a worthless piece of nothing than ever before. He was nothing compared to his sister, her life was awesome. She was awesome. He cried himself to sleep every night, in her shoe.

"Oh PHIL!!" Becky's voice boomed from what seemed miles above. He woke with a start, still in her shoe. His giant sister was looking down at him, from high above, wiggling her stinky toes over the mouth of the shoe. "Two weeks are up, you want out?" she grinned. Of course he wanted out, He wanted nothing more than to be out!

"unahhn..." he weakly said. He was trying to say yes, but it wouldn't work.

Becky grinned evilly. "Say you want out, or I'm ASSUMING you want another three months of this!" she laughed.

"...I.... I whant...ouutt...." Phil managed to mutter.

"Didn't hear that, you'll have to SPEAK UP," Becky grinned. Her giant wiggling toes begin to enter the shoe. There was nothing he could do, as her giant toes began to flick him in the face. Three more months, no way! He'd never survive that!

"I could keep this up for years," she chuckled.
122112121121211122111111111122112.title: Under Sis' Feet!

1221121211212111221111111111221121.content:
"Three more months it is!" Becky boomed from above. "Lick my toes, you know you want to," she commanded from on high.

Phil weakly struggled to put his tongue out, still plastered inside the puddy he'd been encased in for God knows how long. He felt the salty taste of his big sister's toes, as he'd become used to the smell and the taste of her feet over the weeks he'd been trapped under her feet.

"That feels good, nice," Becky moaned from above. It churned Phil's stomach to know he was giving any sort of pleasure to his horrible sister, but he did it anyway. He'd been broken, trained to do every little thing his sister commanded. Becky gripped his tiny head between her toes, the grimy surfaces of them covering his tiny eyes and burning them. She loved the feeling of her tiny brother's little head between her toes, it was almost comforting... to have a tiny creature under your foot that would obey your every whim.

"Hey Phil, you're such a good brother," she mocked, "Licking your big sister's toes like a good little boy." With that, she stood up and pressed all her weight down onto the tiny boy, crushing him back into his place, where he'd spent the last month or so, hopelessly begging for mercy but never receiving any.

Her footsteps pounded him, as she walked on out the door, with no intention of letting him out of his horrible prison...

...

...

...

Three months passed. Becky didn't even pause her routine to acknowledge it.

A year passed. Becky graduated high school with Phil under her foot, grinding away at his tiny face. That was the day he finally saw the outside world again, as when she returned home and threw off her graduation gown, she pulled him out of her sneaker and ripped him free of his puddy prison. The next thing he saw was the bathtub, full of water. Becky didn't say a word, just dropped him in the water, and removed her clothes. The next thing he saw was her giant naked body approaching, obscured by the water he was sinking into, but he had no will to move, he just hoped she wouldn't let him drown.

Soon he was lifted out of the water, and pulled past her full, round, naked breasts to her face. Her mouth filled his vision.

"SLAAAAAVE!" she boomed, causing him to wince. Then she tossed him over her head, and he landed in the water behind her. The next thing he saw through the water was a hand approaching, as he was pushed through the water toward Becky's enormous ass cheeks, spread, waiting for him to enter. He was pressed very intentionally by a single finger, his head forced right up her asshole. He began to cry, as he heard his sister's muffled laughter all around, reverberating through her body.

"I could let you go, but that's just not me," Becky voice echoed, muffled, all around. "Dying in your own sister's asshole, that's gotta bet the worst way to go," she chuckled.

Phil was unable to fight back, too weak from being trampled endlessly under Becky's feet. He wondered where his mother was, whether she would even know that he had been suffocated by his sister in the bathtub, or just assume he was still being trampled under Becky's feet. He felt his tiny lungs burning, there was no escape. The pain was agonizing, and he began to feel himself getting dizzy.

"Let's see how far I can push you..." he heard Becky's voice around him, as he felt the asshole spread around him as she tensed up like for a bowel movement. He felt his sister's finger behind him, and he couldn't fight it as he was swallowed whole, and felt what he assumed were muscles pulling him up into Becky. "God that's good..." Becky moaned. "Hey Phil, if you can still hear me, I just want you to know that I'm gonna leave you in there as long as I can. If you black out, you're not waking up, EVER!" she boomed.

Phil knew this was the end. His mouth was wide open, inhaling water and what could only be his sister's poop into his lungs.

Everything was becoming so disorienting, he felt so confused and dizzy, and the burning in his lungs was unbearable. He blacked out.

...

...

Becky just sat in the tub, letting her tiny brother suffocate and die slowly. She didn't want there to be any chance that he'd survive, but to be sure, she'd just poop him out into the toilet and flush afterward to be sure. She was done with him, didn't want to see him again. She grinned to herself, feeling so powerful, knowing that Phil never had a chance. Being born at 3 inches tall, he was destined to die inside his own big sister's ass as she sat in a tub. She chuckled to herself. What a fitting end.
1221121211212111221111111111221121.title: Becky finishes him off.

choices: "Your mom can decide, when she gets here."
"Actually, I was going to try this sock on..."
1221121211212111221111111111221122.content:
"Becky, give your poor brother a break," a voice came from above. It was like an angel.

"Come on mom, it's not like he's gonna be able to catch up on his schoolwork now anyway," Becky replied. "He's so far behind, please mom, just let me keep him in my shoe," Becky begged. It was showing that she had become addicted to the feeling of having her tiny brother all to herself, in her shoe. It almost comforted her, the feeling of complete power over someone.

"No honey, he's had enough," their mom interjected.

Slowly, Becky's giant stinky toes retreated from the mouth of the shoe, and their mother's fingers entered, plucking him and the flattened puddy pancake free from the insole. Holding it in front of her face, their mother saw that it was nearly black, covered in dirt and grime and sweat. Phil's face was black too.

As she pulled his tiny body free, it became apparent just what abuse he'd been through. He was pale, white as a ghost. Any muscle or fat that had been on his body was gone; his ribs defined his chest, and his arm bones and leg bones were all clearly visible, composing his frame. Several ribs were visibly broken.

"You're in pretty bad shape, sweetie," his mother smiled...

* * *

Phil was immediately taken to the bathroom sink by his mother, and given a quick bath. Her hands were covered in soap, and she took the naked little boy and lathered her hands around him, with warm water running. It was the most wonderful feeling of his life.

He had no ability to move, he soon realized. He couldn't fight as his arms fell limp at his sides. It was like he had no muscle mass at all. He was severely malnourished, he knew. He closed his eyes, allowing his mother's giant, gentle hands to lather around him, cleaning him.

Later in the day their cousin Mandy came over to visit, but thankfully his mother wouldn't let her play with him. Phil found himself wrapped in a small, blue, silk cloth. He was laying on the living room coffee table, and his mother was dabbing her finger with tiny bits of chocolate pudding, and allowing him to lick it off. "There, that's mommy's good little boy," she'd giggle, as he graciously accepted each and every tiny drop.

This was heaven, very much so, compared to the two and a half months before.

"Mom, do you have Phil?" Becky's voice came from across the house. The tiny boy visibly shuddered, and couldn't keep from crying. The thought of facing his giant sister right now, of her taking away the only good thing he'd experienced in months. He began to shake all over.

"What do you want him for?" their mother replied, as she delivered another finger of pudding to him.

"Oh, gonna use him to wipe my butt, of course," Becky laughed, sarcastically.

"BECKY!" their mother yelled in disgust.

"I'm just kidding! Look, me and Mandy made him something," Becky yelled back. Soon Phil, quivering, heard his giant sister and cousin's footsteps approaching. Looking up, he saw his giant sister lower a silky, green sock in front of him. All along it, Becky and his cousin had taken beads and decorative glue, putting hearts and the name "Philly Willy" all over it.

"Look Auntie Bemine, he can sleep in this now!" Mandy grinned.

"It sure beats that stupid matchbox he used to sleep in," Becky smiled.

Their mother, admiring the sock, lifted it between her own fingers. "So soft," she cooed, "This is so sweet, you two," she smiled. "Phil, tell them thank you," she said.

Phil was shaking, but he managed to look up at Becky and Mandy's smiling faces. "Thanks," he quickly said, before reverted back to looking at his tiny feet, wrapping himself tightly in the blue, silky rag his mother had given him. In a sudden moment of disorientation, he felt the silk being ripped from him, as Becky reached down and took it between her fingers.

He was left, covering himself, naked on the table, looking up at his giant family. "We gotta try it out," Mandy grinned, enthusiastically.

Phil was scared of both Mandy and Becky. He was especially scared of his sister, but it was strange. Seeing this giant goddess who had ignored him and treated him like dirt for months actually taking interest in him, and smiling... It actually made him feel good, warm inside.

The next thing he knew, he had been plucked up, and dropped into the long tunnel of the green sock, held by his mother. He quickly rolled to the toe section, but it was clean. He doubted this sock had ever been worn. "Okay, now here's the best part," Becky smiled.

The sock began to compress and grow darker. He was being rolled up into a ball.

"He should be warm in there," Mandy snickered. It was true, he was very warm, and the material of this particular sock was so soft and smooth, it was truly heavenly. He suddenly felt a rush, a strange rush... but he didn't fight it. His sister, his family, they loved him again. This wonderful, comfortable place was given to him by his giant sister and cousin. They loved him.

He heard footsteps walking away, then his sister's distant voice. "Here, I'll catch," Becky laughed. The next thing he knew his world was hit with a sudden acceleration, and for a moment his body felt as though he was in free fall, on the worst roller coaster in the world. Then "THUMP" he came to a sudden stop. It took him a moment to realize what had happened, but hearing his sister's close giggles made him realize that his new home had just been thrown across the room like a ball.

"Catch, mom!" he heard his sister say. Then the process repeated, ending with a "THUMP" as his journey ended in his mother's hand, on the couch. "Got em'," his mother laughed. "Mandy, here," his mother called before he was flung back across the room again, and again, and again.

By the time they were through, he was so disoriented, that he didn't know who had him. He hadn't been hurt, but the movements of the sock had made him sick, and very dizzy. He couldn't make out the muffled voices on the outside well enough to know was talking, or what they were saying.

As the sock unraveled and he fell down into the toe section again, he looked up. His mother's beautiful, smirking face was peering down into the sock.

"Can I take him home with me, Auntie Bemine?" Mandy asked, in her most sickeningly sweet tone possible. "Mommy's gonna be here to pick me up soon," she whined.

"Well..." his mother begins...
1221121211212111221111111111221122.title: A New Sock Home

1221121211212111221111111111222.content:
***Five Years Later***

Through the five years that have passed since Phil and Becky began their homeschooling, Phil has been compressed, stomped, and squashed so many times and so many different ways that he almost spends more time recovering than he does sleeping.

His sister, now 21, has been in college the past few years. She decided to attend the local state university on a track scholarship in order to be able to stay closer to home and to Phil. You know, to assist in his education. Occasionally, she wears him in her track shoe during practice, never during meets though as she wants to focus on her event. She also never takes him on road trips.

The 13 year old Mandy though is a different story. Mandy has continued to use Phil as her "lucky charm" during soccer matches. He's proven to be quite lucky as Mandy has become quite the successful player, starring at forward for (ironically) Heather Valley High School for Girls.

Every woman in his life has a favorite method of torture. Phil's mom likes to strap him in her shoe, sandle, or slipper as she walks around the house or goes to work. Mandy, as we've said, likes to have the security of a sock blocking Phil, and Becky has always been a huge wild card. There are stretches when Phil never sees the outside of her sock, times when he makes the middle of her butt cheeks his home, and she even has enjoyed trapping him within her armpits and other embarassing areas. Never anything *too* personal though.

Phil has tried resisting his punishment from time to time, but he's learned that it is usually a better idea to go along with his commands. Punishment for resisting is often longer lasting and more painful than the original issue he was resisting. Even when he "behaves" though, he still often finds himself squashed or smashed on a whim.

This morning though, Phil's mom wakes him up with a smile. She tells Phil that this would be the last day of his homeschooling, that he would be graduating the next evening!

Phil has never been so relieved in his life. He has learned to be somewhat wary of any promises over the last five years, but he can't help but be a little bit hopefull. Even as he is being forced into his mother's high heel work shoe.
1221121211212111221111111111222.title: Five Year Recap

choices: Its somebody else from Phil's past (Ms. Prittey, Sandra, somebody else?)
12211212112121112211111111112221.content:
The next day, Phil found that he was completely free of any kind of punishment or pain for the first time since his first day at Heather Valley. His mom made him his favorite meals, for breakfast and lunch and everybody was extra nice to him. He felt like a whole new man.

"Congratulations Phil!" Becky grinned over the grilled cheese sandwhiches their mother had made for lunch. "Are you looking forward to tonight?"

"What is tonight???" Phil enquires.

"Oh....mom hasn't told you yet?"

"Told me what?"

"What you're graduating *to*," Mrs. Bermine says as she waltzes through the kitchen door. She sits down at the table across from Phil.

"Phil, I know these past five years have been rough on you, but it was all to prepare you for the real world. Its not easy out there. And I want you to know that as hard as it was for you, it was even harder for all of us to do consistently."

Yeah, right, Phil thought. Becky stared into her sandwhich trying to hide a smirk.

"Anyway", his mom continued, "That part of your life is over. We've prepared you as good as we can and its time for you to enter the real world."

Phil is kind of suprised at this. "You're kicking me out??? But....what am I supposed to do???"

"Not exactly," Mrs. Bermine began, "You see Phil, we have arranged a marriage for you. Someone who can see to it that you are properly taken care of all the time. Becky is far too busy with school, I'm sure you want nothing to do with Mandy anymore, and we've come to a point where you probably dont want to live wiht your parents any longer."

"An arranged marriage?!?!" Phil shouts.

"Yes. Now that you're of legal age, your father and I (who oddly doesnt appear in this story at all.....) have selected a very fine woman for you. She will grow with you and nurture you and we expect you to give her the respect she deserves."

Phil starts to get nervous again. "Who is it? Do I know her?"

"Of course you know her Phil. Do you think we would trust a stranger with you?" At that point, the doorbell rings. "Oh. That should be her right now!"
12211212112121112211111111112221.title: Graduation and.....marriage?

They start talking about a wedding and other stuff as you stare up in shock at your future bride... "Oh look at the dress" Kendra exclaimed as she opened her bag. However the worst part was when mandy forgets to wear socks sometimes and you ride in her shoes barefoot, even worse was when mandy forgot you were in her shoe last year and kept you under feet for a whole week with nothing but the hope of the warmth of her long foot coming in her shoe to warm up your tiny frozen body during that cold winter. after that week ended mandy found you and said to your mom "whoops i guess i forgot he was in there" and mandy wasnt even punished in fact you were punished for not letting mandy know you were in her shoe and had to kiss your moms feet all night and spend the entire next day in the back of Beckys underwear during her aerobics.

As mandy slips on her soccer cleats and fits you in your usual comfortable position your reintroduced to her insole and try to get used to the funky smell but its no use. your mom says "Hey Honey why dont i give you a ride to your soccer game this way we can all watch phil be your lucky charm." mandy agrees and Kendra says "this is gonna be fun and while Mandy and Phil are out on the field we can talk business about mine and my fiances wedding plans." they get in the car and arrive at the soccer field "Luckily" just in time to make the start of the game so shes not late and Becky, , and Kendra sit down in the stands to discuss your future.

1221121211212111221111111111222112.content:
Kendra thought for a moment, feeling an instant connection to Mandy. But she had precious little time with Phil back in school and had literally just been reintroduced.

"I'm sorry kiddo. We have a few years of catching up to do. Maybe next time though, kay?" Kendra says with a smile.

Mandy dejectedly peels Phil's thoroughly flattened body from her foot and puts him on the table before turning to leave.

"Hey Mandy," Kendra calls to her, the young soccer player turns. "I promise if you win and score a goal, you can have a little post match celebration to make up for this. Fair?" she asks with a smile.

Mandy lights up and hugs the older Kendra before sprinting out of the house.

"I like that kid," Kendra says with a smile. "What do you think...hun?" she asks Phil, savoring the final word and letting it hang over his head.

From proper homeschooling, Phil knew much better than to argue or protest. He simply nodded in agreement with a fake smile plastered on his face. His mother and sister beamed proudly.

"Now, you couldn't see the dress, but I do have one more surprise for you Philly," Kendra exclaimed reaching into her bag once more.

This time, she pulled out a pair of clean, but clearly well worn, white cotton socks with very frayed pink pom poms at the end of each. Phil's face went pale as his mind flashed back to the first time he met Kendra in class.

"You do remember!" she squealed in excitement. I saved them all these years just in case we had a chance to reconnect. I can't wait to share them with you again..."
1221121211212111221111111111222112.title: Blast From the Past

12211212112121112211111112.content:
There was a knock at the door and Mrs. Bemine poked her head in. "Is Phil in here, girls?" she asked. Mandy and Michelle looked nervous as Mandy meekly pointed down to the floor. Mrs. Bemine came over to Phil and stood over him.

"Have you two been squishing him?" she asked.

"All day for two days," Mandy answered nervously.

"Well, it's good to know he can take a licking and keep on ticking," Mrs. Bemine said. She slid her shoe off and put her socked foot over him and stood on him. Phil realized how much heavier than his cousin his mom was. "Ms. Priety isn't happy about you skipping school for two days," Mrs. Bemine said sternly. "She says she has something really special planned for you."

"I was...I was...kidnapped," Phil struggled to say with his face between his mother's toes.

"You could have gotten to school if you really wanted to," Mrs. Bemine snapped. "I'm sure you'll learn a lesson about skipping come tomorrow morning." With that, she bent down and flung Phil's frail body into the air and caught him in the palm of her hand. He groaned in agony as she carried him back to the car clenched tightly in her fist. When she opened the door, the flung Phil down in the seat face up so that he could watch her giant butt descend on him.

"No!" Phil managed to scream before the crushing weight of his mother's bottom set on top of him. Mrs. Bemine was begining to get used to the feeling of her son flatten under her as she sat down. Pretty soon, she would have to think of something different to do with him.

Phil blacked out and woke up in a forest of sweet-smelling bottles. "Hey squirt," Bekcy said, looming over him with a mischevious smile. He was on her dresser, surrounded by her personal hygene products.

"Becky, please don't..." Phil whimpered, still barely able to move from the past two days of abuse he took.

"Don't worry runt," Becky said. "Mom wants you to be able to move when you get to school tomorrow. You at least won't be squashed flat until then." She put a piece of toast with butter and spagetti sauce on it beside him. "Eat up," she said. "You're going to be living at school for the next week. I don't know what your feeding schedule is going to be." Phil groaned as she left him. What could Ms. Priety do to make his life any worse?
12211212112121112211111112.title: Back Home

choices: Sandy lets Phil out before lunch
Sandy keeps Phil where he is until her lunch goes through
122112121121211122111111121.content:
Phil felt sick to his stomach as he rode in his sister's shirt pocket on the way to school. He could move, but painfully. Although Becky's breast felt good to him, he could feel her heart beating hard in anticipation of what was to come for him.

When Becky got to school, she went to Ms. Priety's room and handed him to the teacher. "I'll see him in a week," she said as she left him in the palm of her hand. She winked at Phil as Ms. Priety stared down evily.

She put him in her shirt pocket and buttoned it up as the class filed in. Phil could feel her heart ready to jump out of her chest. He could barely stop himself from throwing up more than once.

"Now class," Ms. Priety began. "As you know, Phil decided to skip class for two days. This can't be tolerated. Are you all ready to help him learn his lesson?"

"Yes!" the class replied with glee.

"Put the chairs in a circle, please," Ms. Priety instructed.

Phil was taken out of Ms. Priety's pocket and slamed down on one of the hard plastic chairs. Before he could think, his chest, arms and legs were secured down with tape. "Now you all know how to play musical chairs," Ms. Priety said. The one who is sitting on Phil at the end of the game wins. Okay, go!" Music started playing that was deafening to Phil. He wanted to cover his ears but couldn't. All he could do was watch the girls shuffle by with evil looks on their faces. Suddenly, the music stopped and a flannel-clad bottom landed right on top of him. "Is he mine now?" Phil heard a muffled voice say as he began to flatten.

"Of course not," Ms. Priety said. "This is only round one." Phil endured round after round of booming music and being squashed until only two students remained: Sandy and Kendra. Both circled him like vultures until the music stopped and Sandy's plump bottom landed right on top of him. Phil felt the weight lift up and then the tape taken off of him. Before he knew what was happening, he was covered in vasoline. "Now that you've been under some girls' butts, it's time that you went IN a girl's butt," Ms. Priety smiled. Phil craned his neck to see Sandy bending over and pulling down her panties.

"No!" Phil screamed. "Don't put me in there! I'll do anything!"

"We have a whole week," Ms. Priety said as her fist tightened. "You'll be doing anything anyway." Phil entered Sandy's puckering anus head first. Ms. Priety shoved him until she couldn't push him in any farther. Sandy cooed and moaned in pleasure. The muscular walls that surrounded Phil squeezed and then contracted. All he could smell and taste was the foul stench of gasses coming from deeper inside of her. Phil fought desperately to get out, but could not budge.

Sandy pulled up her panties and rubbed her lower belly. "I can feel him up there," she giggled. "He's thrashing around. It's weird. I've never felt anything like it."

"Sandy, just be good enough to let Phil out before lunch," Ms. Priety instructed. "Now take your seats. We have a lot of material to cover. I hope Phil can take notes in there. He will be responsible for the material on the test." All of the girls laughed, but Phil couldn't hear the joke. The terrifying churnings and guglings of Sandy's digestive system were all he could hear in the hot darkness.
122112121121211122111111121.title: Musical Chairs

choices: Phil can survive, but must come out the other end
1221121211212111221111112.content:
"Why should we give him back to Becky?" Mandy asked. "We've wanted him for a toy and now we have him. Let's get Lex, Molly, Jill and Billi over tonight and have a sleepover! They will want to play with him, too."

"But let's put Phil away for now," Michelle said, as if she were referring to a toy. "We want him to be able to move when the others get here." Phil was placed on a soft feather pillow and covered with a clean sock. As he slept, the blinding pain in his body subsided and he awoke able to fully move. He got up, stretched, and then looked up in horror at the six young faces staring down at him.

-------------------------------------------------------
"You LOST him?" Mrs. Bemine screamed at Becky.

"I didn't loose him, I loaned him to Mandy," Becky retorted, somewhat fearfully. "She said that she would take him to school today and bring him back."

"Well, has she brought him back?" Mrs. Bemine demanded.

"N...no," Becky stammered.

"Then he's with Mandy, unless those little nitwits lost him or killed him at school." Mrs. Bemine stormed into the kitchen. She came back with a vial of liquid. "Watch," she ordered her daughter. She put one drop of the liquid in the aquarium and the fish shrank until they were barely visible. "You had better make sure Phil goes to school tomorrow. I think you'll make just as cute a toy as he makes."
Becky swallowed hard. She knew that she had no choice other than to go to Mandy's house and get Phil back.
------------------------------------------------------
Phil, meanwhile was sitting in eight-year-old Jill's mouth, picking peices of food out of her braces. It didn't help that Jill would pull Phil under her slimy tongue every so often and put some more chips or cookies in her mouth, squashing him under the flexing muscle and then making him start over. Suddenly, the door to the room burst open and Becky stormed in.

"Alright, you little shrimps, where's Phil?"

"What are you talking about?" Mandy asked.

Becky's response was to grab the little girl by the collar and slam her against the wall. "You know damn well what I'm talking about," she fumed. "I leant him to you. I want him back. Now!"

"We can't give him back to you," Michelle said from behind Becky. "You flushed him down the toilet when he wouldn't lick your feet, remember?"

"What?" Becky said between her teeth, her eye twitching.

"That's the way I remember it," Mandy said. "Phil hasn't been here all day. You can ask my mom. And you can ask my teacher. He wasn't at my school either."

"You told us that you would kill us too if we told anybody," Michelle continued. "I don't think your mom would be too happy if we told her that." Becky gappled all the girls, one by one and checked their pockets. She checked the chips, cookies, sleeping bags, piles of stuffed animals, Mandy's clothes drawer, and closet before giving up. Then she looked at the girls. She noticed one had been strangely silent while being "inspected".

"You," Becky said to Jill. "Open your mouth and lift up your tongue." Jill obeyed, revealing her empty mouth. Becky turned white as a ghost. She knew that when she came home empty handed, she would be Phil's size or smaller and end up as a foot toy for her mother. She cried as she ran outside and all the girls giggled as she drove away.
1221121211212111221111112.title: Becky's plan backfires

12211212112121112211111121.content:
Jill knelt down and began to cough roughly. Her whole chest and belly heaved and it looked like she was going to be sick. Then Phil popped out and landed on a sleeping bag, slimy, but unharmed. "That is so awsome," Michelle said. "You have to teach me to do that sometime." Phil didn't know what to think. He got the gist of the encounter from inside Jill's belly, and as much as he didn't want to be a doll to these girls, he didn't want to be a foot slave to his mother, sister and God only knows how many other girls in that school. He looked up at the girls and began to weep as he said "thank you."

Phil's statement surprised even him, and some of the girls cooed, ooed and awed at him. "I think Phil's been punished enough," Mandy decided. "Let's just play with him."

"I know," Molly said. "We can play...
12211212112121112211111121.title: Six saviors?

choices: Lex finds them and Phil hides with a new girl.
122112121121211122111111211.content:
All the girls agreed and they picked Lex to be "it." When Lex started counting, Mandy picked up her cousin, "Come on, Phil, I know the best hiding spot." She then proceded to take him under the bed with her and hide behind a pile of pillows and stuffed animals. "Sorry if you wanted to hide somewhere else, this is just to keep you safe."

Phil was in disbelief. Was this the same girl who made the past 3 days a living Hell for him. The same girl who enjoyed teasing and torturing him for almost his whole life? Mandy noticed his confused expression and started to pet him like a small hamster. "I never thought that I'd ever pity you. I always saw you as a doll or a bug." Phil got nervous when she said this, but Mandy continued talking, "But when I saw you thank us for keeping us from your mom and sister even if we were going to torture you without mercy, I ..... I." There was a long silence as she tried to find the right words to use. "I just felt really sorry for you, I saw you more like a person I guess." Phil was still silent but he calmed down a little when she said this. "Since you're not living with Becky anymore, maybe I can be your new sister and you can be my 'little' brother." She giggled a little when she said this. Phil gave out a quiet laugh too. He used to hate that joke when Becky used it every day but now it made him happy.
122112121121211122111111211.title: Hiding with Mandy

choices: Find someone to look after Phil
122112121121211122111112.content:
Mandy handed Phil over to Michelle who gladly recieved him and hugged him. But a shadowy figure appeared in front of them.

"I've warned you girls enough, now hand that doll over. You should be paying attention to the film not playing with a toy!"

With a groan Michelle hesitated a bit, before Mrs. Joy snapped her slender fingers. Sighing, the teacher put him into her shirt pocket and walked back to her seat near the back. After a short while she felt a movement in her pocket and took the tiny boy out to have a look - as if she could find out why the girls were so obsessed with him.
"Hmm thats odd he feels very soft." Phil then moved a little and the teacher gasped.
"My god you are real!"
"Yes, thanks for saving me from those horrid girls. They kept torturing me!"
"Awww you poor thing. You better stay with me." With that she kissed him and held him close.

Does Mrs. Joy.......
122112121121211122111112.title: Confiscated

choices: He makes it to the exhibit as the musem is closing. Now what?
12211212112121112211112.content:
Phil stealthily made his way over about four seats to the feet of another girl. His small size and negligible weight made it easy to go undetected as he sat on her shoe and braced himself. The movie was wrapping up and the students were getting ready to go. As the giant third-grader stood up, Phil put his arms into her shoelaces. The girl walked out of the theatre, towards the exit. It was too perfect. She was walking right up against the wall, where Phil could hide easily. When her foot came down, Phil jumped off, rolled, and ducked into a lean-to made from a discarded brochure. It felt like Mission Impossible as he watched the huge feet of the elementary schoolers go by. The entry way quieted down and Phil made his way out of the brochure.

He was free. Free! There was no Kendra, no Becky, no Mom, no Mandy, no Michelle, no Ms. Prittey, no Ms. Joy, no nobody. He was finally free! The oversanitized floor smelled sweet to Phil as he walked along the wall to the exhibit on human evolution.
12211212112121112211112.title: Freedom?

122112121121211122112.content:
...Becky's voice:
“...Yeah,” she giggled, “I accidentally landed on him when I hopped outta the chair. I didn't see him down there – I thought he had run into the kitchen...”

Phil began to wake up, and realized that his huge sister was already telling someone a lie about what she had just done. He was furious; he wanted to say, “No you didn't you liar, you stomped me on purpose!” He wanted to start thrashing his arms and legs around, and make sure everyone knew she was lying.

But he couldn't - he only felt like he had two eyes and a nose. He felt like he had no body, his torso and limbs hung limply from his head. They were insensitive to any touch or sensation, and were attached at his mouth, which would not move at all. Why couldn't he feel his body! He began to weep bitterly... he couldn't move!

He was paralyzed, she must have broke his neck!

He opened his eyes and first saw his sister's enormous face, smiling mischievously down at him. She had her giant, smelly soles already hovering above him, very near on each side of him, and her knees were high in the air from her sitting position on the couch. As her toes wiggled in his vision, the smell of her feet overpowered him again... and all he could do was inhale through his nose and look around. He noticed that he was still in that stupid flattened fairy outfit, but he didn't even care at this point.

“Is he okay, Becky?” Mandy asked, as her cute blonde head leaned into view. Phil was screaming on the inside. His life was over – his sister had broken his neck for fun, and now she was grinning down at him, forcing him to smell her huge feet.

“I think I might've hurt his neck,” Becky snickered down, as she lowered a foot to his face for a moment, wiggling her toes, and the smell got even worse. He looked up right into her eyes – how could she be this cruel, she was his big sister, for crying out loud! “Mom always told me this could happen someday, as small as he is.”

“Why are you still doing that to him then?” Mandy continued.

“Why not?” Becky interjected, with a wide-eyed smile toward the smaller girl.

“Cuz he's your little brother, and he might really be hurt,” Michelle answered from a distant chair. “You should be nice to him now.” Phil was still horrified at what he was experiencing, but he heard Michelle's concern. It was hardly consoling in the face of what had just happened, but he still noticed it.

“Hey.. it's not that big of a deal...“ Becky replied. The looks on both the girls faces were still worried. Becky thought for a moment. “Anyway... He might be trying to get out of his punishment by faking. And that's just what he wants you two to say, 'be nice to him, he's hurt','” Becky responded, mocking Michelle's statement. The girls were both silent, as though they were pondering this concept.

“Well... How can we figure out if he's faking, then?” Mandy asked.

With this, Becky shoved her grimy soles flat onto the tiny boy. “Phil's a really really good pretender, so we might not ever know...” Becky sighed. “We'll just have to keep punishing him, for the rest of the night, and I'll tell Mom when she gets back tomorrow morning.”

The girls had to stop and think about his for a moment, but the more they thought, the more they remembered that Phil had often resorted to “playing dead” to keep them from sitting on him before. Eventually they had figured it out, and just sat on him anyway.

“Yeah, he's a good faker,” Michelle obnoxiously spat. “I'm pretty sure he's faking now, too.”

“Yeah I bet he is,” Mandy added, bouncing down on the couch next to Becky, and extending her feet toward the tortured boy. Becky lifted her own feet, making room for the younger girl's, allowing Mandy to rub her smelly soles all over her little brother's helpless face. “I know you're faking, Phil, so you have to smell my feet too!” she mocked. Becky started to slip her feet back into the line-up, and the two girls began rubbing all their feet all over the tiny boy.

“Smell good, little twerp?” Becky taunted.

“I'm gonna do it too!” Michelle whined, jogging across the carpet.

She hopped up on the couch, taking a seat on the other side of Becky, and did the same as Mandy, extending her smelly little feet in with the rest, and the three girls took delight as the tiny boy had to endure all their feet, nonstop, while barely getting a breath from one to the next.

“Phil, Phil, you're really dumb, smell my feet you little bum,” Mandy sang.

“Phil, Phil, it's time to smother, stinky feet for little brother,” Becky added, laughing.

“Phil, Phil, his little nose, smells all of our pretty toes!” Michelle laughed, in conclusion.

After a while, however, they got bored of this, and Becky instructed the two girls to go change into their pajamas. Their girls ran off into the other room, making a lot of racket, but it would take them a few minutes to change. Meanwhile, Becky was again alone, lying her side on the couch with her little brother, who she slid up closer to her face.

She grinned down at him. “I cracked your neck or something, that must be why you can't move,” she said, caressing his little face with her giant index finger. “I don't know how long you'll survive like that, but this'll be pretty fun for me,” she grinned. She shifted herself so that her huge face was right beside the tiny boy on the couch, taking up all his vision, as her hand tilted him toward her.

“I'm gonna ask Mom if I can wear you in my shoes from now on, since I'll be getting a replacement brother now anyway,” she grinned.

Phil didn't understand. Replacement brother?

“You didn't know that you were just part of an experiment, did you? You weren't supposed to know. They were testing how a miniature person would survive in a normal, household environment – and you're a failure now, I guess. They'll be sending another tiny boy about your age to be my new brother,” she grinned.

“You were getting boring anyway,” she snickered, and continued to stroke his face with her huge index finger for a few minutes, without saying a word.

The girls came running back into the living room, both in their pajamas – fairy pajamas, with wings and everything. “We're fairies! We're fairies like Phil!” they sang, as they hopped around the living room, waving their arms. Becky began to laugh, and she rolled over, with her face right in Phil's face. For a moment, all he could see was his sister's perked lips, before she engulfed his face with a gross, wet kiss. There was nothing he could do but let her, being paralyzed as he was.

She finally sat up, releasing his face from her spit and lips, and looked at the two little girls in front of her, still bounding around the room. “Hey! Girls, it's time to...
122112121121211122112.title: A Horrible Life Awaits

choices: ...my socks and shoes - he's gonna suffer!"
...Twister, it's in my closet upstairs.  Right-foot-Phil!"
1221121211212111221121.content:
It was truly mortifying for the tiny child. He was dressed in a fairy costume, facing upwards, being invaded by toothpaste smelling giant kiss after giant kiss, as the two giant girls in their giant fairy pajamas with giant wings pretended to fly around the the coffee table, stopping to engulf his face in their saliva covered puckered lips every time they reached him, and leaving him with a loud “SMACK!” whenever they left.

His giant sister just sat beside him on the couch, smiling down delightedly, watching the fun.

All this was happening to him, and he knew at the same time that, whatever good life he could have lived out, Becky had ruined it. He had nothing left now, he couldn't move, he couldn't speak – and his sister grinned down, obviously thinking of keeping his broken body, in which he was now trapped, in her shoe, of all places, under the smelly soles of her feet, trampling what was left of his spirit, while she happily lived out her own eventful life.

And Mandy made another pass... her cute little blonde face suited the fairy costume well, as it became larger and closer, and her lips, puckered, passed around his face. There was a strong pressure, and he smelled the toothpaste on her breath... then there was a “SMACK!” and loud giggles in his ears, before she happily hopped on around the table – and then came Michelle, making her next pass.

Her darker hair dangled lower than Mandy's but her face was equally as cute, as her face became larger, and she forced her grinning lips to pucker, and they passed around his face just as Mandy's had. He felt the spit on her lips, and smelled the toothpaste on her breath – the same as Mandy's... and then came a similar “SMACK!” but different loud giggles, as she hopped away in her fairy pajamas, around the table – and he saw Mandy coming again, lips puckered.

And this is how it went for a long time, longer than Phil could keep track of. Finally the routine was interrupted, because instead of kissing him on her pass, Mandy laughed and just sat down on the tiny, paralyzed boy. She remained sitting there, but Phil didn't feel the normal crushing pain that he normally did when she sat on him. She started wiggling around on him, but he couldn't feel anything but pressure on his face, and the cotton fabric rubbing across his nose. He would have a rug-burn, but being paralyzed kept him from feeling all the pressure being put on his chest and torso.

She turned to Becky and grinned, “I'm a big fairy squishing a tiny fairy,” she giggled. Becky laughed.

“No fair!” Michelle called, as she hopped on the couch by her friend on the tiny boy. “I wanna turn too!” she demanded, “Lemme' sit on him too!” The wings on the back of her pajamas were hitting Becky in the face as she bounced up and down.

“Quit it!” Becky yelled, pushing the little girl to the side. “Let Mandy finish with him, and then you can have a turn,” she ordered. Michelle's feelings were hurt, but she didn't cry. Instead she crossed her arms and sat at the far side of the couch, with her bottom lip stuck out.

Mandy looked at her friend and grinned, victoriously, as she ground tiny Phil's body underneath her cloth butt. Tears had filled tiny Phil's eyes, a this point. He was traumatized, and his life was ruined. He was nothing but a plaything for these girls, and his life was over. After several minutes, Mandy got tired of crushing the tiny boy under her butt, so she said it was Michelle's turn. They had to slide the tiny boy over to the upset little girl, who looked down at him with her bottom lip pooched out. She has no reason to be upset, compared to me, he thought. She pushed him back to the middle of the couch, and turned away from everybody.

Mandy looked concerned, but Becky was just annoyed. “Oh get over it, you big baby,” She said, as she picked Phil up in her hand, and brought his little limp body up to her face. “You too, squirt,” she added with a grin, as she saw that he was crying.

“Yeah, little faakeer!” Mandy obnoxiously added. She didn't realize that he was really hurt, she just believed Becky, the true source of evil, he thought, as he looked into his sister's eyes. There was nothing he could do... There would be nothing he could do for he rest of his life, but just take it...

“Well,” Becky started, “If she's not gonna take her turn, I guess I'll just have to put you through a little more punishment of my own, little bro'” she grinned. “Hey Mandy, go get...
1221121211212111221121.title: Giant Fairy Kisses

choices: No luck, Back in Sis's Shoes and Back home to Await his fate
Becky surprisingly decides to go ahead and end his life right there
12211212112121112211211.content:
The girls quickly ran and retrieved Becky's socks and white tennis shoes. In the meantime, Becky place her tiny morsel of a little brother on the ground at her giant barefeet. Phil looked up at his titaness of a sister and cried for mercy. Becky smiled evily down at him, and spoke to him.

"I know what I just told you must really bother you, little one, but it's true!" With that she slowly raised her unfathomably large foot and ever so slowly lowered it down to just about a foot above tiny Phil.

"I want you to look very closely and carefully at this foot, little bro, because it's what is going to eventually end your pathetic, insignificant life." Becky very slowly and deliberately scrunched and cracked her deadly toes over her helpless brother.

"Look at how beautiful your big sis's smelly foot is; just think of what a privilege it is that our Mother has decided to give her little boy up as a sacrifice to his big sister's smelly feet! What a tasty little treat you'll make for them when this foot eventually smushes you into a tiny, red stain on the smelly undersides of my toes!"

Becky still had wanted to demonstrate her goddesshood to Phil before the other girls returned. She yelled up to them to wait until she was through having a heart to heart talk with her flesh and blood brother before bringing her socks and shoes.

Noticing the Phil abject look of horror and helplessness at his predicament made Beck smile down at him. She playfully rubbed her big toe seductively over his body, focusing on his head and face. "Poor little boy, is his big sister's feet just too much for him, him? I wish you could still talk, so that you could tell me exactly what my feet smell like!"

Becky then had an idea, one that was sure to drive home point. She had noticed a tiny action figure, similar to but smaller than a GI Joe action figure lying near the couch. One of the neighbor boys must have left it her by accident. As she walked away to retrieve the figure,she smirked to herself over the kind of impression what she was about to do would make on her foot-toy-of-a-brother. She grabbed the toy and placed in right next to Phil, which was just about his size.

"I want to you see how exactly I plan to finally do away with you, bro. Watch carefully and think about how slowly I'll do this to you, and the unbelievable pain it will cause you."

With that, she slowly picked up the toy figure with her pretty, unwashed toes, carefully positioning it under her third and fourth toes. She then slowly began to scrunch her toes over the figure, making sure her brother could see all of this clearly transpire. After only a few scrunches, Phil heard a sickening crack as his sister's deadly toes mushed to the toy into nothing. Becky opened her toes; all that was left was plastic dust, which fell to the ground next to Phil's head. Noticing her brother's shock, Becky spoke with a playful pout over her mouth and face, "don't worry little grape, I'm going to focus on making you smell these sisterly feet before I do that to you, but make not mistake, Phil, I will eventually end your existence on this earth in exactly this manner!"

Meanwhile, throughout Becky's triumphal pronouncements of his ultimate fate at her feet, and her awesome display of sibling superiority, Phil could only cry and smell his sister's strong-smelling foot that she had again place over his body. He thought back to his life and how it would end, end at the hands, or more accurately, feet of his big sister. She had been his greatest tormentor throughout his short life, and in a sick sort of way, it even seemed somewhat fitting to Phil that it was to be her that would snuff his life out. He gazed up at the soft, feminine sole above him. He had to admit a harsh truth: His sister's feet were very pretty. But they smelled so strong, like dried sweat mixed with a twinge of dried fruit. He wished that she's just get it over with, without further torturing him.
12211212112121112211211.title: A Brother's demise

choices: He's going crazy, she's just scrunching her toes.
122112121121211122112111.content:
"Hahaha, If only you could see the look on your face Phil!" Becky boomed from above "Don't worry I'm not gonna kill ya any time soon. Hell if you keep up this 'good behaviour' I might even spare your miserable life!" Phil wasn't sure what was worse, the thought of being crushed by her feet or getting to live on underneath them. Unfortunately his sister didn't give him much time to think about it as she rubbed his body back and forth underneath her stinky foot before reaching down and picking him up.

"Ugh, you stink!" She said as she pulled Phil close to her face. Obviously being drenched in his sister's foot sweat hasn't done any wonders for his BO. Becky grinned before continuing "It must be that stupid fairy outfit. Let's get that off of ya." She said as she ever so ungently ripped the fabric from your body leaving you with the same feeling someone who's just been waxed must be feeling.

Suddenly the girls came back downstairs with Becky's socks and shoes like she'd asked "Ah, just in time." she said with a smirk. As Phil looked over at the girls he could tell they were upset, though probably because Becky was taking their favorite toy away. He didn't have to do much to remind himself how little they really cared. "Alright girls it's been fun but I gotta run!" She said as she dropped Phil into her sock and followed suit with her foot.

"Alright bro let's get going." Becky boomed as she slid her shoes on and headed out the door. All Phil could do was breathe in her stink as his face was buried in the stinky folds of Becky's toes. As he still couldn't feel his arms or legs he could do nothing to protect his face from the awful stench as it poured into his nostrils and made him gag.

After what seemed like hours of this torment Becky finally reached her destination and kicked off her shoes at the door. Unfortunately for Phil his punishment was just beginning and as soon as Becky reached her room and locked the door behind her they were all alone.

"Alright Bro." She said as she sat on her bed and pulled her leg closer so you could hear the rest "I'm gonna give you two options. You can either A. Spend the night in there with my feet, or B. Come with me tomorrow to school." There was utter silence from your end since she knew very well you couldn't respond "Alright Alright you can do both, I know how much you love my feet lil' bro~"

Becky giggled as she crawled under the covers and began to drift off to sleep, dreaming of all the horrible things she could put you through tomorrow.

Phil meanwhile could do nothing but lie there as her foot began to sweat or so he thought... when a hole began to rip in her sock just above his head, had disabling him somehow enabled him to do that with his mind? or was he just going crazy...
122112121121211122112111.title: Nose to the Grind

choices: Now, let's see how Becky will react, facing her new fate.
A better destiny awaits for Phil. A new life, somewhere else, with other people
122112121121211122112112.content:
He couldn't take more. All that cruelty, all that pain. He was just a kid, just a child. And slowly, the child closed his eyes.
Becky wasn't happy to see him doing that. Whe wanted him to face his death. She wanted to see his fear in his eyes. But after all, there's no big deal. She was going to end his pathetic life quickly. So she stood in front of him, lifting her foot slowly, grinning more evily than ever.
"She realy going to do that" he thought. "Why? Why ... even mum ... every one. What did I do? I've always been nice, I know I didn't deserve that ... "

-Bye bye little shit.

The foot came closer, and is pain went though his mind one last time. The smell, his heart beat, the warth ... everything flowed into his mind.
Becky felt so excited. She moved her hand to her panty, and caress herself slowly. This was such a turn on!
He didn't pray god. If god could helped him, he should have done it earlier. He was all alone, all alone and so tired.
Then, suddenly, there was no sound anymore, no smell, no pain. All stoped in a second. Thinking he was already dead, the child opened his eyes. He saw the foot right above him. But it wasn't moving at all. It was motionless, as for everything. He moved his fist, and felt like he could stood up. Not understanding what was happening, he sat and heard something. Footsteps, but ... it was like his. Turning his head to his left, he saw a teenage, maybe sixteen or seventeen years old, black haired, wearing a dark blue open shirt and a black pair of jeans. His green eyes and his smile were friendly.

-"Hi, Phil." Said the boy, stopping just in front of him.

He began to sob and push his head down, closing his eyes. Tears were rolling on his cheeks, and falling on his lap.

Johan hug the child firmly in his strong arms. Phil kept crying.

Then a blinding light inveded the room. Seeing the flash, the little girls entenred in the room, only to find a tiny Becky awaking on the floor. She was a bit taller than Phil was, and the boy have disapear, as for Johan.

It's not hopeless, he has some strenghth left in him...
12211212112121112211212.content:
Mandy bounded back down the stairs, the wings of her fairy pajama's jiggling as she enthusiastically made her way down the stairs. “Found it!” she proclaimed, raising the 'Twister' box over her head. Looking out onto the couch, she only saw Michelle sitting there in her fairy pajamas, Becky and Phil were no where to be seen. “Where'd they go?” Mandy asked, sitting the box on the coffee table.

“Becky went to change into her pajamas,” Michelle answered.

“Where's Phil though, did she take him too?” Mandy inquired. Michelle just giggled and shook her head. “Where is he then!” Mandy continued.

Michelle then lifted up off her butt, and up also came Phil's tiny form, wedged between her cotton-buttcheeks. Tears were streaming down his tiny cheeks; in his paralyzed condition he could only breathe through his nose. Michelle's giant butt wasn't the most pleasant odor on the planet, and there was only a single layer of thin cotton separating him from it. It was truly humiliating, he pressed into it in every direction.

Mandy busted out in laughter. “Give up Phil, you can't trick us!” she laughed. “You're just faking being hurt so we'll stop, but we're already ON TO YOU!” she proclaimed. Michelle sat back down, squishing him around happily.

“Yeah! You're not fooling anybody, Phil!” Michelle proclaimed from above. It was horrible.

Soon Becky was back, wearing flowery blue pajamas. The twister mat was thrown out onto the floor, and Phil was removed from his prison and thrown out on the mat. He bounced and landed on a green circle, face down, and it was all he could see. The plastic was a strong smell.

Soon Becky was standing over him, he realized, although he couldn't move a muscle to turn and see. She was standing with her giant bare feet on each side of him, close enough that he could recognize their smell.

“Right foot GREEN!” she laughed...

...It's enough to mention that the game was very unpleasant for tiny, paralyzed Phil, but very fun for the three enormous giants stomping the life out of him. He didn't stay face down long, as Becky wanted him to “see” what was coming, and to be able to look him in the eyes as she slammed her stinky bare soles down on him.

Before the end, Becky challenged the girls to a competition, with the prize being that the winner got to keep Phil for the night. Becky easily beat the two girls, and claimed her little brother as her prize. The girls finally went to bed, and tiny paralyzed Phil looked up at his giant sister's happy face as she held her prize in her palms, and walked upstairs to her room.

“This is awesome,” she snickered. “You're gonna have to live between my giant stinky toes, little bro', and there's not a THING you can do about it!” she beamed. “You can't move, you can't talk, you can't even fight back! You're gonna be my toejam for the rest of your life!” she grinned.

“Stop it!” he screamed back at her. They were both surprised. Becky's eyes grew wider, and Phil started weakly moving his arms around, just a little. His legs started to move as well. He looked up at his giant sister, her eyes still wide from surprise, and started sobbing uncontrollably...

“Whoa...” was all Becky could say, at first. She looked her little brother over, and couldn't understand what had happened, exactly. He healed back pretty fast, but how could he heal back from complete paralysis? It wasn't impossible, she guessed. Well obviously not, he was moving again, right in front of her. “How did you...” she started, but couldn't finish her sentence.

“You almost killed me!” Phil finally screamed up at her. It seemed to snap her out of her trance.

“...Yeah, so?” she replied, casually. “You say a word to Mom, and I really will,” she threatened. Before today, he wouldn't have actually believed her if she'd made that threat. Now he wasn't sure what she was capable of. “Anyway Phil, I'm sorta glad you're back to normal, cause I've been thinking about all the games I could've played with you before doing that,” she smiled. “Actually, I have one in mind right now,” she grinned evilly.

“No more Becky, I've had it!” Phil cried.

“Shut up,” she simply said back, and wrapped her fist around him. Soon she was walking over to her dresser, and pulled out a pair of black nylon stockings. “Alright, I call this game 'Inchworm',” Becky proclaimed. “You're gonna go inside one of these, and I'M gonna wear these tonight while I sleep,” she grinned. “If you can make it out of them by morning I'll let you have a nice, normal week as a normal tiny boy, and I won't bother you at all,” she grinned. “But if you CAN'T get out of them you'll be my little toy all week, and you'll have to do every – single – thing I want...” she smirked.

She dropped him down into one of the stocking before he could argue, and her giant foot was slid down behind him. He was so weak he couldn't even move as her toes overtook him, squashing him, smothering him, as she giggled from above. This totally, totally sucks, he thought.

Soon she was underneath her covers, in the darkness of her room, and he was being painfully flicked around by five enormous, smelly, smothering toes. Everything was pitch black. “Love ya, little bro'...” she snickered from across the darkness, as the smell of her giant toes entered his nostrils for the hundrenth time.

Maybe, maybe he'd have a chance to squirm up her leg after she fell asleep...
