122112121121211122112121.content:
“Mmmmph-mmmph!” came tiny Phil's muffled voice, but even in the quiet darkness of his sister's bedroom, she could barely make out his tiny, smothered pleading. She was squeezing his head tightly between her smelly toes, feeling how nicely the stretchy, black pantyhose held him in place. There was no movement he could make, no form of twisting or flailing that could pull his body away from her damp, hot, sweaty toes; she could feel his arms and legs, futilely grasping for the world beyond her disgusting toes.

This is perfect, Becky thought, as she flexed and wiggled her toes, enjoying the feeling of her exhausted little brother pressed into them, helplessly enduring the ride. As soon as his head came dislodged from her grimy toes, she began to hear her little brother's tiny sobs, and his little voice begging, crying for her to stop. In response to this, she slammed him in the face a couple of times by flicking her big toe. It seemed to put an end to the begging, but not the crying or sobbing.

“Shut up, twerp!” she demanded.

He didn't. He probably couldn't, but it didn't stop her from grabbing at his tiny head with her toes again, and squeezing it for all he was worth. His weak little arms flailed wildly against her toes, so she simply grabbed at him again, with all her toes, and he was suddenly completely constricted. He couldn't move, at all, and was soon being put through a new form of torment:

As his giant sister squeezed, he would exhale until his lungs were fully compressed and he couldn't breathe at all. She held him this way for longer than he could count, until she finally let up just enough for him to barely breathe in some of the stinky air around him. This went on for several minutes on end, until she finally got tired of it and relaxed her giant stinky toes.

“Had enough, little bro'?” she laughed. “Don't mess with me!”

Becky was obviously becoming quite masterful at using her stinky toes to control her tiny little brother. She thought back to earlier that day, when she had first covered him up with her stinky, sweaty socks on the car ride home. It was so cool how their Mom was just as into it as she was... she couldn't wait for her to get home in the morning, they could spend the day “punishing” him together! She laid her head all the way down, her tired toes only gently wiggling at her little brother's limp body.

Soon she was asleep.

Phil decided it was no use. He couldn't move, he couldn't squirm out from between her toes. His right arm was pinched between what he thought were her second and third toes, and he couldn't even pull it loose. Not to mention, he was exhausted, and Becky seemed to wriggle her toes around a lot in her sleep. It took several hours, but he managed to drift off to sleep...

He awoke with a start. He looked around, and the horrible prison he had spent the night in was actually lit up, probably from light coming in the bedroom window. His sister's enormous smelly toes were softly wrapped around him, surrounded by the black nylon stockings that prevented him from escaping. Beyond that were the covers, which were translucent enough to let some light in. His stomach was growling, he hadn't eaten for a whole day. And he'd had enough of this place.

“Becky!” he called, hoping to wake his giant sister up. It wasn't that he wanted more torment, but he needed something to eat, he at least expected her to not starve him to death. “Becky wake up!” he cried again, but with no result. He began to wiggle around, and perhaps as a reflex he felt her stinky toes tightening around him... but she wasn't awake. As he wiggled more, her foot began moving a lot, and he heard a yawn from across the bed. Soon the covers had been lifted, and as the world seemed to swing around, he was greeted by his enormous sister's sleepy face.

“Oh Phil...!” she sang with a sleepy grin. “You're still there... so now you're my toy!” she giggled. Her toes started to cruelly scrunch at him, painfully squashing his tired body, as the sleepy grin on her face became triumphant and evil. He couldn't take it anymore. He couldn't take it.

“Sissy!” escaped from his lips. He hadn't called her that for five years, but he felt so helpless and vulnerable... he started to cry. “I love you Sissy, and I'll be your toy!” he cried between sobs. He was losing it, and he didn't know where all this was coming from. “I'll do anything you want...!” he heard himself add, between sobs... “But I'm hungry, Sissy, I'm really hungry...” he couldn't keep talking.

Her head cocked a bit to the side, seeing his breakdown between her toes. He didn't see the compassion in her face he found himself hoping for, instead there was an almost... delighted look on her face. Her eyes narrowed as her evil grin spread. “So... you'll do anything Sissy says now?” she inquired to her sobbing little brother, obviously having something humiliating in mind.

He couldn't help it, she had broken him or something. He weakly nodded.

“Alright!” she said excitedly. “I'm not gonna starve ya little bro',” she grinned, “...as long as you stick to your word, that is,” she added, her evil grin returning...

Phil awoke slightly dizzy, laying on a cold, hard surface. He got to his feet and rubbed his tiny fists into his eyes. After blinking a few times he realized he was standing on the kitchen table at his house. Whew! At least his sister and mother were finished with.....
BOOM BOOM!
His heart sank. He heard the tell tale signs of one of his family members approaching. He looked around to see Becky come towards him.
"Heya, squirt! Have a nice nap?" she sneered.
"Becky, come on," Phil pleaded. "I'm still you're brother. They're crazy at that school, and they're making you and mom crazy too!"
"Well, that's a shame, because you've always gotten the attention from mom and dad, being that you're so 'special,' so I'm finally accepting it and giving you the attention too! How much more do you want?" Becky then swung her sneakered feet up onto the kitchen table next to Phil and commanded "untie my keds, little brother!"
Phil sighed and knew there was little he could do. As he walked over to the trailer-sized sneakers, he tugged as hard as he could on the laces, making little progress. "Where's Mom?" he grunted as he finally pulled one lace free. "Silence!" Becky boomed, causing Phil to cover his ears. "She's visiting her friend Valerie, and she left you here with me! Now don't ask anymore questions if you know what's good for you!"
After Phil was done with untying the sneakers, Becky kicked them off right onto the table. The smell immediately hit Phil and he backed away. Becky giggled and moved one socked foot behind him to impede his retreat. Her other foot came towards him from the front, trapping him. He felt his back touch the hot, moist fabric of her sock and turned to see a white sole in front of him. Her other foot hit him from the back and he was pressed between her socked feet. Becky giggled again and pressed harder, blocking all air to Phil. Every inch of his body and face were covered with the sweaty and smelly fabric of her socks, intensified by her bare feet underneath. After a few moments she released him, and he fell to the table coughing and gagging. "I have a feeling that I'm giving you a break because of all the sock treatment you're getting. You need to experience the real thing." Becky told Phil as she begin peeling off her socks. Phil got up and sighed in defeat. He saw her enormous hand come towards him and envelope his body. Then she placed one bare foot on her lap as she brought Phil closer to it. She placed her index finger on the back of his head and pressed forward slightly. Phil realized what was happening and struggled wildly, trying to wriggle from her grasp. Becky ignored him and brought him ever closer to the bottom of her barefoot. She pushed his tiny head into the crevice of her toes and dragged him across them, back and forth, scrunching and wriggling her toes all over his face in the process. The smell was unbearable. "Here, take a good, long whiff," Becky boomed from above and pushed his head deep into the soft, stinky embraces of her toes. She then scrunched her toes around his head as tight as she could, blocking off all air save the stench from her sweaty toes. She wriggled and scrunched for what seemed like hours before finally placing Phil back on the table, where he collapsed on his back, panting heavily.
*RING* "Don't worry Phil, I'll get it," Becky giggled as she reached for the portable phone. "Hello? Hey Rachael, it's me. Yes, it's true, the teacher said so, and my mom agrees. Sure! I've got him all day long! Ok I'll see you then!" Becky hung up the phone and fixed Phil with a hungry stare. "That was my friend Rachael who goes to your new school, and she wanted to see you (a.k.a. play with you), so she's...."

Phil just laid there, gasping for air on the table, on his back. Becky's horrible giant sneakers were still behind the little 3-inch boy, and he though he could smell them, even from that distance.

“Hey, I told you to get in one of my shoes, so hurry up and do it!” Becky commanded.

Phil just continued to lay there – he couldn't get up, she was crazy. He just kept looking straight up, to the ceiling of his kitchen, so high that to a normal person it would have seemed like miles. Suddenly his view of the ceiling high above him was eclipsed by the much closer, giant heel of his sister's foot. “If you don't move, you're gonna wish you did, twerp – and I'll eventually just stick you in my sneaker myself,” Becky giggled.

Phil tried to sit up, but couldn't. He was already beat. “Becky! I can't get up!”

Her huge heel then descended onto his tiny body, pressing hard down on him. His face was covered by the hard, smelly foot flesh, and he was forced to inhale the horrible smell several times. He tried to scream back at her, but nothing came out, as nearly all the air was depressed from his lungs.

She kept him like that for over five minutes, and he began to see stars. All the while he could hear her humming happily - it was nothing for her to put him through this.

Suddenly her foot lifted. Phil gasped for air, several times, as his sister looked him over. After a few seconds, she spoke...

“You have to the count of ten to get in my shoe, otherwise I'm gonna do it for you, MY WAY!” she declared. "MY WAY is a LOT more painful, so I'd be trying to get up NOW!" She was seriously frightening him, but she seemed to be enjoying his torment more than he thought she should.

Phil tried to sit up, and it took everything he had, but he managed to pull himself up to a sitting position. It was her fault that he was this beat to start with! He could see her grinning face looking straight at him.

“TWO!” she continued, still grinning at him.

He tried to get to his feet, but it was an utter failure – all he managed to do was to fall forward, flat on his face.

“Aw...” she giggled. “THREE...!” she laughed.

He tried to lift himself again, but it was useless, his limbs and muscles wouldn't respond as normal. It was a horrible feeling, to find that he couldn't move the way he normally could, when he disparately needed to.

“FOUR!” she continued.

Phil couldn't move, he could only listen as her countdown concluded.

“FIVE...

SIX...

SEVEN...

EIGHT...

NINE...

TEN!!” she finally laughed. Phil looked up at his huge sister – she was grinning very evilly.

“What're you gonna do to me?” he timidly asked her.

In response, Becky began humming happily, and the giant sock ball was pushed down into the opening of the sneaker, blocking out all light. With little effort, she shoved the sock further, closer and closer to the tiny little three-inch boy inside. Soon she lifted the shoe up, off the floorboard, and into her lap.

“Hey shrimp,” Becky called into the shoe, “Wanna make a bet?”

Phil didn’t respond - he was coughing and sputtering, gasping for air and clinging to the sock, which Becky’s hand was now actually trying to push overtop of him.

Becky waited a moment, but then continued anyway. “If you can get out of my sneaker by the time I get back - we’ll just drop today’s punishment, and Saturday’s too.”

Phil’s ears perked up at what his sister just offered - the sock didn’t feel that heavy without a heavy foot inside it, and as soon a Becky’s hand left, he figured he’d be able to crawl out around it or something. Maybe he was just tricking himself, though.... The sock continued to push him further back, toward the toe end of the shoe.

“If you’re still in the shoe when I come back... You’ll be like, a slave to my feet, for a whole week, with NO rules,” Becky chirped.

Phil began to imagine what that would be like - to look up at his grinning big sister, knowing that she had days and days to rub her huge grimy feet all over his little body...

“You really enjoy doing this, don’t you?” their mom commented.

“Well, it sounds fair enough to me - if Phil’s willing to take that risk, I’ll let you two make that bet,” their mother laughed.

Becky grinned, bringing the shoe up to her ear., “So, twerp, what’ll it be?”

1221121211212221.content:
Phil was really in no state of mind to make a wise decision, with his entire body now pinned at the end of his giant sister's sneaker, packed in by her smelly, sweaty sock. From all the pressure coming from the sock, he assumed that her hand was still in the shoe, pressing the sock into him. When she released it, he figured he could just crawl out, and this would be over, once and for all.

“Okay!” he called, but it was muffled by the stupid sock.

“What?” he heard Becky's voice reverberate around him, muffled as well, but much louder than his own.

It was hard to talk... Why wouldn't she take her hand out of the shoe already, so he could push the sock aside and get a little air? He gasped in what he could, and yelled, “OKAY!”

In response, he heard the muffled giggles of his giant older sister, outside of the shoe.

“He said yes!” she laughed, leaning forward, and putting the shoe back in the floorboard in front of her.

To Phil's dismay, he felt no relief from the pressure put on him by the sock... even as he felt the shoe lower, and felt the impact of the shoe touching the floor, there was no let up of pressure coming from the horribly sweaty sock, holding him tightly in the darkness. Her hand couldn't still be in the shoe... the sock was just packed in that tight!

Worse than that, Phil realized that the shoe wasn't sitting upright – his cruel giant sister on the outside had positioned it so that it leaned up against the inner side of the floorboard, vertically, with him at the bottom.

“You're so dumb, Phil,” she continued. “Good luck ever getting out of there – and I'm not gonna have any mercy on you if you're still in there when we get back,” she snickered. “Mom, do you promise you'll actually make him be a slave to my feet for a whole week, if he can't get out?”

“Well...” he heard their mother reply, “Only if you'll share him with me and your sister,” she smiled. “I was looking forward to trying out this new punishment myself, and if he loses the bet we'll have plenty of time to take turns.” she laughed.

Becky looked a little disappointed. “I wanted to have him for a whole week though. If I have to share him, I'll only have him a third of the time,” she pointed out.

“Yes, that's true...” their mother agreed. “Then we can make him a slave to ALL of our feet, for three weeks, so that you, me, and your sister Joanna can all share him - and you won't lose any time.”

Phil couldn't believe what he was hearing, his mother had just extended his possible sentence at their feet by two weeks! He began to struggle, but couldn't yet make any progress.

Becky laughed. “That's great Mom, let's go, so we can get back sooner.”

“Good idea,” their mother agreed cheerfully, and they got out of the car, and Phil heard both doors slam shut.

He was left in the darkness, alone, smelling his sister's super sweaty sock, hopelessly pushing against it with all his tiny little might. Several minutes passed, and he soon found that his struggles were useless. Every push, every shove, everything he tried was just absorbed by the sock's soft mushy mass which was crammed in on him to start with, and he was struggling to breathe; fighting was just making him gasp for more air that wasn't there.

He imagined himself somehow pushing the sock out of the way, and somehow climbing up the nearly vertical slope of his sister's shoe to the outside – winning the bet, and not having to deal with anymore of this. It was however, not going to happen.

He was doomed to face his three weeks under the entire female family's giant feet, and they all seemed bent on it. Becky and his mother had already shown that they loved the idea – and Joanna would be no different - if she didn't enjoy it more, being closer to his age, only older than him by a year.

This was going to stink. Actually it already stunk. He couldn't move, all he could do was wait...

But he didn’t get one answer done before she began to wiggle her toes causing the whole desk to shake violently and Phil couldn’t make anything but unintelligible scribbles. Finally the heat, motion, and moisture from Kendra’s feet smudged the little bit he had gotten done so it couldn’t possibly be read. Then came the voice of the teacher, muffled through Kendra’s feet.

“Time! Pencils down everyone.” Ms. Prittey came walking down the row of desks picking up papers. Then she stopped and bent down over Phil’s desk. Phil was still under Kendra’s feet.

“Well Philip may I have your test?” The humongous teacher demanded. Phil squeezed his head up between Kendra’s feet “Um Ms. Prittey I..I… c..couldn’t do the test.” Phil sputtered while gasping for air as Kendra pushed him back under her soles. “I don’t want to hear your excuses little man,” Prittey smiled, “I want your test.”

Phil struggled out of his seat and tried to pry his paper out from under Kendra’s feet, he looked accusingly up at her but Kendra only shrugged and smirked offering him no help. So Phil braced his shoulders against her foot and pushed with all his might and finally produced the tattered and smeared document.

“Tisk. Tisk.” Ms. Prittey clucked as she looked over the tiny scrap of paper, “This will not do. And what’s this? Why you’re out of your seat. Come with me!” Ms. Prittey stated mater-of-factly as she scooped up the tiny boy and finished collecting papers.

“Ah excellent work Kendra you even got the extra-credit.”

122211.content:
Looking at him the whole time, the teacher brings him to her desk, sits on her chair and puts him on the ground. There was a big silence in the class, but some whispers could be heard. Then Ms. Prittey starts removing her left shoe. Phil stares at her, clearly frightened, it makes her smiled evilly. "It's a unique chance,” she thinks. "Since I’ve known about him, I’ve gotten so excited, and now ... I was planning to be nice, to pet him, but now I have to do this. I don’t know why I’ve said that, why I’m so mean. I knew Kendra was lying, but I was to excited to act like a teacher. All of that is so cruel. I act like a monster. Look at him, poor little guy, he's scarred to death, knowing what is coming for him, but I can't ... I said I'd it, so I’ll do it. Sorry tiny boy."
But those were only thoughts, nobody could hear it. There was a deathly silence again. She gently takes him between thumb and forefinger, and places him in her shoe, just where she said she wanted him, and puts her foot back into. That was so cool to her, so sweet, so good. All the girls are looking at her, imagining what it must be to have the little man in their shoes. Somewhere getting wet seeing the picture in their mind. The teacher stood up, and continues the class seriously, pressing her toes in purpose.
Phil had imagined what hell must be like sometimes. Now, he knew. Hot, smelly, and horribly sweaty. He can just breath stinky air, and his getting dizzy. But then, he somewhat sensed that Ms. Prittey was loving the whole thing. Or maybe that was just his imagination. Then he remembered his mother's words "You have no idea how cruel boys are. You'll be safer with girls." Yeah ... sure ...

choices: Ms. Prittey Keeps Phil Inside Her Nylons
Ms. Prittey Lets Phil Loose in the Lounge
1222112.content:
Ms. Prittey continued her lecture and the girls went back to what they were doing. Within about 20 minutes, everyone had forgotten about Phil, everyone except Ms. Prittey. She felt him squirming underneath her toes, desperately trying to push them off. Ms. Prittey allowed Phil to think he was making some headway by lifting her toes up slightly. Then, just when he thought he might have a chance, Ms. Prittey lowered her toes back down on top of Phil, crushing him further into her shoe. She pressed him firmly under her big toe, and for the rest of class she would not let up at all. She kept her toe pressed down on top of Phil, not allowing the tiny boy any room to move.

When class ended, Ms. Prittey let everyone go and walked out of the room. She strolled through the hallway, each step crushing her prisoner. Phil could feel her toes pressing through her nylons and smashing down on top of him. The sweat from her feet seeped through and drenched Phil, causing him incredible discomfort. He had long ago given up hope of escaping, now he was only hoping to finish the day with some dignity.

Ms. Prittey arrived at the teacher's lounge and stepped inside. As she walked over to a couch, one of the teachers called out "Veronica." Ms. Prittey stopped and turned around. "Oh," she said, "hello Tonya, how is it going?" Tonya smiled and said, "it's going okay, but it won't be for you if you keep those shoes on." Ms. Prittey looked at her curiously. Tonya continued "we just got new carpet in here, remember? No walking around with shoes." Ms. Prittey then noticed that everyone else was walking around bare foot. Ms. Prittey smiled and said "oh, that's right, how silly of me." She went to the couch and took off her shoes.

As she removed the shoe keeping Phil in place, Ms. Prittey wrapped her toes around the boy and kept him trapped. She held him up and decided..........
1222112.title: Foot Class

12221121.content:
As Ms. Prittey contemplated what she wanted to do, Phil looked around in hopes that another teacher would see and help him, but as he looked around, he saw that no one was looking either because they hadn't noticed or they didn't care. He would have yelled out, but there was no telling what Ms. Prittey would do to him if he tried. Then Ms. Prittey smiled as she made up her mind and brought him up her skirt and placed in inside her nylons and whispered to him to climb down her leg and under the crevices of her toes. Phil knew he had no option and as he got close to his destination, he could smell the horrible stench that awaited him and the thought of his teacher leaving him there for god knows how long, it all made him cry. Finally, he reached the crevices of her toes. Just as he got into place, 'SCRUNCH' Ms. Prittey scrunched her toes, pressing him deep into the crevices. Once she managed to press him deep enough, she place her foot on the ground and crossed the other over top to add more pressure to Phil, then she grabbed a magazine off the end-table next to her and went on with her day without a care about how much Phil was suffering. Her friend Veronica then came over with coffee and they chatted till they needed to return to their respective classrooms. Ms. Prittey placed her feet back into her shoes and left for her class, not once thinking of her little prisoner and once more began teaching. When the end of the day comes...

1.She keeps him in her nylons and heads home.

2.She calls his mom to come get him and tell her to continue his punishment at home the same way.
12221121.title: Ms. Prittey Keeps Phil Inside Her Nylons

122211211.content: Did Ms. Prittey remember that Phil was underneath her foot when she goes home or has she completely forgotten about him altogether.
122211211.title: Does She Remember?

1222112111.content:
Ms. Prittey walks into her apartment and sits down in front of her dining room table, sighing after a long day of work. She instinctively stretches her legs her arms and legs to relax a little and feels Phil trapped inside of her stockings. She smiles it's time for some fun.

She kicks off her shoes and slowly eases off her stockings. Phil is stuck onto her foot, her sweat forming a rather effective adhesive. She grabs him by the legs and rips him off her foot. She drops an exasperated and wheezing Phil onto her table who was revealed that his torture was over, or so he thought.

"What should I do with you?" she asks suggestively.

"Can you take me home to my mother?" Phil requests, thinking he had a choice in the matter.

"I don't think that's an option Phil, not after your performance in class today."

"But..." Phil stammers.

Ms. Prittey lowered her face close to Phil's, causing his body to fall backward at her exhales.

"Don't you talk back to me! Do you understand?!" As she said this, Phil was hit with a wall or air and spit. He flew a couple inches backwards by the force alone.

“Now I don’t think you’ve learned your lesson.” She thumped her foot loudly against the ground as a reminder.

“Sorry,” Phil is forced to say: he doesn’t want to go back in there again.

“Sorry?”

“Sorry Ma’am.”

She breathes in hard, sucking Phil’s helpless body up to her big lips. Phil gasps as he comes within inches her lips. Ms. Prittey couldn’t help but grin.

“That’s better.” The force of this statement coupled with Phil being a few inches away caused Phil to fly over and knock his head against the hard table surface. Phil tries to back away as she inhales for the next statement, drawing her back to her lips.

“Now, I’ll keep you, but you have to do some things for me okay. Me keeping you is a privilege, so you’ll have to earn it. If you continue to be disobedient or back talk, it’ll be taken away from you. “

Some privilege that is, Phil thinks, I don’t want to stay here and now I have to work for it. But he doesn’t dare say that.

“I’m going to grab dinner from the kitchen. Don’t go anywhere or you’ll regret it.”

Ms. Prittey leaves with Phil lying there on the table. Phil can in theory try to leave, but it may not be the safest thing since it both involves a risky jump and angering Ms. Prittey. He however is probably not safe staying put with Ms. Prittey. So what does he do?
1222112111.title: She remembers.

12221121111.content:
Phil can’t really go anywhere even if he wants to. He’s stuck on the table with no way down. He must face what Ms. Prittey has in store for her.

Ms. Prittey comes back in carrying a bowl of macaroni and cheese and places it on the table.

“Well, dinner is served. I’m assuming you want some,” she says as she takes a piece of macaroni and drops it on top of Phil, laughing as it knocks him over.

Phil starts to eat it awkwardly. It weighs about the same as him.

“You look like a little hamster. You’re so cute!” Ms. Prittey giggles.

He tries to swing the macaroni into his mouth, but it’s too much for him and he topples over like an egg.

“Here let me help you,” she coos as she brings her spoon over to Phil’s back to support him as he tries a second bite. Right before Phil takes his bite, she lowers the spoon below Phil’s legs, tripping in. Phil falls into the spoons as Ms. Prittey lifts him up and drops in him into the bowl of macaroni. Phil looks up in horror as he sees the spoon coming down on top of him and sees Ms. Prittey pretending not to notice he’s in there. She spoon pushes Phil deeper into the bowl until he is completely covered by macaroni and cheese and then starts to stir. Phil is knocked around, completely disoriented inside the bowl. He tries to move around in the bowl, but the weight is too much for him. Cheese starts to ooze all over his face and body. Every once in a while, Phil feels sudden pressure and relief as Ms. Prittey dips her spoon into the bowl and takes a bite size of macaroni.

After a minute or so, Phil feels the ground beneath him shake as he realizes that the spoon is picking him up. Now being relieved from the pressure, he races to the top of the pile and is about to jump off until he sees that he has a far jump. It is too late the spoon had already left the bowl. He gasps as he sees the incoming face. It’s not even looking at him. Ms. Prittey must have turned on the TV while he was stuck in the bowl without him noticing, but her eyes are staring at the last sitcom, not even aware of the predicament she is putting him in. He tries to shout but to no avail. He steadily approaches the cavern of doom.

Phil rushes to the back of the spoon, hoping it’ll buy him time as the front of the spoon becomes engulfed into her lips. She oozes her lips forward, sucking in everything as she goes and tilting the spoon. Due to the steepness and slippery cheese lining of the spoon, Phil is eventually forced to slide done where he smacks into her lips face first. He instantly turns around and tries to climb up the handlebar of the spoon like a pole.

He believes he is free until he feels a tugging at his foot: her lips had sucked part of his foot. Desperately, he tried to wiggle his foot free but these monstrous lips held it tightly. They were twice his size and strength. His attempts to wiggle only weakened his holding allowing her to suck more of him. These lips starts sucking in more and more of his leg. When it got up to the knee, his other leg gets caught as well. Pretty soon his entire is trapped with Phil frantically clasping the spoon with his arms as his only hope. Ms. Prittey, however, starts to take the spoon away. Phil tries to hold and go away with it, but her lips have such a strong hold on his legs that he’s forced to let go. Now Phil is left with nothing to hold on to as he is being sucked more and more into Ms. Prittey’s mouth. He tries to push off against the lips, but as he does this, she sucks in with more force, easily outweighing his pressure and sucking in up to his naval. Now Phil in a fit of desperation just punches the lips with his fists, which only leads to his fists being stuck against her lipstick. He manages to wince his hands free of that, learning his lesson to not try that again. He now gives up struggling as the lips suck him in more and more. Pretty soon only his head is left out. Then Phil feels everything going red then black as his head is sucked into her mouth.

Before Phil figures out what is going on, he is flung into his mouth. Disoriented and not equipped for the dark yet, Phil stammers around in Ms. Prittey’s mouth. Soon is able to get to his feet, notices that her teeth are open slightly and begins to run for the escape. Her teeth, however, come closing down, sealing his fate. Before he can respond, a red thing comes out from behind and tackles Phil, pushing him into the side of her mouth. Phil pushes against in an attempt to overpower it, but her tongue suddenly relaxes and pulls back, leaving Phil who had just been putting all his weight leaning forward to push against it unbalanced. He stumbles on top of her tongue and instantly, it raises Phil pressing him against the roof of her mouth. Slowly it eases the pressure, creating a slide for Phil to fall down the back of her throat. Once Phil realizes this, he frantically tries to grab onto something. He latches unto Ms. Prittey’s taste buds on her tongue. This however only leads to her salivating making it slippery. Eventually, Phil loses his holds on her tongue and starts to slip down. Phil turns around and gasps as he sees the dark, bottomless hole of her throat. He screams but either she doesn’t hear him or pretends she doesn’t. He starts to kick desperately but keeps on sliding closer and closer to her throat. Seeing it as his only hope, he jumps onto her uvula, causing her to choke and cough. Suddenly, Phil is flown out of her mouth and flying in the air.

Where does he land?
12221121111.title: Dinner

122211211112.content:
Phil finds himself flying through the air. Ms. Prittey’s coughing launched him out at record high speeds. Phil sees himself escape from his captor, lucky not to have become her dinner, but then turns around and notices himself flying straight into the leg of a couch across the room. He closes his eyes and braces for the impact unable to avoid it.

WHAAAMM!

Phil crashes against the leg. Luckily it was somewhat padded. Otherwise he wouldn’t have survived. He bounces off of it and lands unto the rug below with a loud thump.

“Phil, where did you go?” shouts Ms. Prittey, noticing that Phil was no longer in her mouth but not sure exactly where he went.

The couch is about an inch above the ground (a couple feet from Phil’s perspective), leaving just enough space for him to sneak under but too low for Ms. Prittey to be able to see him very easily. Phil is tempted to sneak under and hide. He might be able to get away later when she is not looking. However, if he is caught hiding, Ms. Prittey would probably punish him relentlessly.

Does he risk it and try to hide from his captoress or does he answer Ms. Prittey’s call, forever sealing his fate as the teacher’s pet?

Phil sees her feet, which had imprisoned him all day, stop right in front of him. He couldn't see much of anything else but tried to decipher what she was doing based off of the noise he heard above. He hears the pillows and cushions move as she investigates the under the seat.

"All right, you are really starting to try my patience," exclaims an agitated Ms. Prittey. Phil grimaces as her feet stomp up and down in frustration. Soon, however, they depart from his view and are replaced with her thigh as Ms. Prittey kneels over to examine under the couch. Phil is immobilized with fear. Soon her face clouds his view as she looks, her face inches away from his. She squints as she tries to look into the darkness, the only thing preventing her from noticing Phil. Slowly, the couch above him is raised so that she might get a better look. Phil holds his breath and hopes for the best, too afraid that she'll notice quick movements to run. The room was fixed in a shroud of silence, heightening the tension and suspense.

But to Phil's horror, a loud noise breaks into the room. It's...
12221121111212.title: The Search

choices: She resumes her search for Phil.
She forgot what she was doing before the call and just watches television.
122211211112122.content:
Suddenly, the telephone rings.

Much to Phil's relief, Ms. Prittey drops the couch and heads over to answer the phone. Phil is safe! For now at least...

"Hello," Ms. Prittey answers, annoyed. "Oh hey Amanda. I'm doing well what about you? I haven't spoken with you for a while..."

Ms. Prittey's demeanor instantly changed from annoyance to niceness as she conversed with her friend.

Phil took this as an opportunity to reevaluate his position. He was too afraid of leaving the safety of the couch and risk being seen but knew that he needed to hide him better if he was to remain undiscovered much longer. Above him, the couch was lined with a thin fabric that must have protected it from dust or something. He ripped a little hole into it and climbed up. It formed a little space about the same size as where he was before under the couch between this fabric and the couch frame above him, and more importantly he now was safely hidden inside the couch to prevent easy spotting from the outside.

He sat down in his new-found spot and decided to wait things out. He listened as Ms. Prittey chatted for an incredibly long time about their days, shoes, random cute guys, etc. Eventually, Ms. Prittey wished her a goodbye and hung up.

"Now what was I doing?" Ms. Prittey asks herself in a cheery mood. Phil hears her walk over to the couch and gulps.
122211211112122.title: Saved by the Ring

1222112111121222.content:
Phil suddenly feels a monstrous force pushing down on. What the hell is she doing to me this time, Phil thinks. He slides over to where the pressure is a little less intense and contemplates what she might be doing. He hears the television turn on and then realizes that she is just sitting on her couch, watching TV. She must have forgotten about him in her conversation with Amanda. This relieves Phil as she probably won’t be torturing him anymore, but then he also realizes how insignificant he was to her that she just forgot about him after a few minutes on the phone.

Phil sits there as the droning from the television rages on. After a while, it gets pretty boring just sitting there in the dark, and he drifts off into sleep. The fabric he is lying on kinda forms a hammock for him that is rather comfortable. He is started out of sleep however as she moves and her weight no longer compresses on him, causing him to slide around. He hears the television turn off and Ms. Prittey leave. Presumably, she’s going to bed herself.

This could be the perfect time for Phil to leave, but it could be a trap to get him out of his protection to catch him. Does he risk it?
1222112111121222.title: Short attention span

choices: No. He's safe here. Why change that?
12221121111212222.content:
It's too risky. Phil stays put. Soon he drifts back to sleep. He is awoken to hear Ms. Prittey fretting around. He could hear her walk around, take a shower, make breakfast, loudly slurp it up, among other things. Soon he hears the door open and close as she leaves for work, another day of teaching.

Phil sits there for about 30 minutes, not sure what to do. He hasn't eaten in a while and is rather hungry. The tightness of his hiding spot is also starting to hurt his neck. He hasn't heard any noise in the house for several minutes, so the area is probably safe. She won't be back for another few hours after school ends. Now might be the best time to leave the spot and escape from Ms. Prittey's home. Does he risk it now?
12221121111212222.title: Couched for the night.

choices: Oh no! Before he gets to it, the door opens. Ms. Prittey left school early!
122211211112122221.content: He heads out. All the lights are out, and the place is currently uninhabited. He grabs some breakfast droppings he found near the dining room table. He walks around the house looking for a way out. He walks toward at the front door and notices a little crack just big enough for him to crawl through. A perfect escape from this teacher of hell.
122211211112122221.title: Escape

1222112111121222211.content:
Phil dunks down and crawls into the opening. His head went through just fine, but his shoulder's are getting stuck. He pushes and pushes, and eventually his shoulders and the rest of his chest get through. From there, his waist and legs are a cinch, being far skinnier than his shoulders. He is immersed in the light as it is late morning. Fresh air feels great for a boy who was just stuck in a nylon sock, almost eaten, and then spent the night under a dusty couch.

He walks over the edge of the porch. The ground shakes as a car drives by on the road about twenty feet (more like a mile from his perspective) in front of him. The wind alone almost knocks him over. He decides not to walk along the road: too dangerous. He climbs down the steps of Ms. Prittey's front porch. After everything that's happened to him in the past two days, he wants to go home and see his mother above all else. He has a choice though on how he wants to do that:

1) He could walk along the sidewalk, but there are two problems with that. Fight it might be dangerous. He could get walked on by pedestrians or annoyed by wide creatures, and he is awfully close to the road, never a good place for him to be near: He's had too many bad experiences with roads. Second, he has no idea where he is or how to get home from here.

2) He could go to a neighbor's help and ask for help. From there, he might be able to call his mother and have her pick him up. The danger with this is that he might not be able to trust other people at his size.

Which does he choose?
1222112111121222211.title: Free At Last!

12221121111212222112.content:
The sidewalk is too risky, so Phil chooses to chance it with neighbors. People tend to be nice and willing to help, right? Phil doesn't really know because until his first day of school, his mother sheltered him and never allowed him to go off on his own to meet people out of her sight. Phil never understood his mother's rationale that people couldn't resist the temptation to have fun with him.

He goes over to the house next door. He sees through the window that the living room light is on and that a woman is watching television. He slips under into her house and heads down the hallway into the living room. There is a woman, looking in her late twenties, lying on the couch absorbed into some soap opera. She's blonde, skinny, with average cleavage. She has a long pretty face and hair down to her shoulders. She is wearing a cheap T-Shirt and pajama bottoms, very clearly the clothes she slept in. She looks half-interested and half-bored as if she had nothing better to do. She is leaned back into the one side of the couch with her legs stretched across it. Her right foot is propped up on the couch; while her left foot kind of dangles off the side on the ground.

Phil is trying to figure out the best way to get the attention. Should he go for this left foot on the ground or try to climb the couch and contact her higher up in her body?
12221121111212222112.title: Neighborly love, hopefully at least...

choices: She wants Phil to Massage her!
122211211112122221121.content:
Phil decides to climb up her left leg, from her foot up to the couch. That way, he'd be able to get her attention after you made it up from the coach over to her face. It takes him longer than he though, but Phil eventually makes it to the woman's leg. He then jumps up onto her foot and head over to her pajama bottoms to climb them. However, him jumping onto her foot did not go unnoticed.

The woman looks down and lifts up her foot to see what it was that was on her foot. She is surprised by what she sees. A little man was on her foot! She quickly reaches out her hand and snatches him up, still reclining on the couch.

Just before Phil could reach the bottom of her pajamas, he felt himself being grabbed and lifted into the air, however, he can't see anything, as her hand closed around him. When it opens back up, he is up next to her face and she is looking at him intently."Well now, little man, what are you doing here in my house? And why were you on my foot?" She asks him, smiling. This my be the best chance to get her help. Phil thinks to himself. Carla can't believe Ms. Pretty's cruel words and decide that Phil deserves a safe place. Carla's toes contiune to massage Phil, so that he notices nothing that happens around him. As the lesson is finally over Carla goes still with Phil between her toes ...
1222211.title: Phil remains with Carla

choices: Amanda gets to keep Phil longer.
1222212.content:
Sadly, Phil's gentle love affair inbetween Carla's sweet toes didn't last forever, as Ms. Prittey motioned to Carla that it was time to pass the tiny boy on. The grip of Carla's sweet right toes tightened a bit more around little Phil as she lifted him off the ground, at the same time reaching down to take him in her left hand. Soon little Phil found himself lying in the palm of Carla's hand, gazing into her enormous beautiful eyes. She was reluctantly pondering who she would give him to next.

Then, suddenly, she really didn't have a choice. Amanda, the pretty, blonde, blue-eyed girl beside her, non-chalantly held out her left palm for the tiny boy to be delivered into, without even looking away from the teacher. Carla spied the grimy, sweaty appearance of the sole of Amanda's white-socked right foot, propped up over her left knee.

Carla thought about looking for another, more pleasant alternative for the little boy in her hand, but nobody would expect her to give the helpless little blonde boy to someone else if the more popular Amanda wanted him next.

Carla sadly looked back into the eyes of the tiny blonde boy, who sadly looked back. "Bye Bye..." she mouthed, as Phil's world shifted violently foward, and he was held over top of the giant, awaiting hand of Amanda, and Carla's hand moved out from under him, leaving him to fall.

He landed on his face - the salty scent of the enormous girl's hand was strong to his tiny nose, and before he could stand up, her hand enclosed around him, leaving him in darkness, being violently pulled in some direction he couldn't determine. Before he knew what was going on, he was spilled out on the desk of the giant girl, Amanda, and he rolled over on his back to see her giant face.

See wasn't looking at him - she was still looking toward the front of the room, where Ms. Prittey was lecturing. He waited a few seconds, until Amanda's enormous eyes finally glanced down at him. "Hey bug," she grinned. She was exceedingly pretty - which was why she was the most popular girl in the class.

"I have a little step brother even smaller than you, so I'm not so surprised by your size," she whispered.

"Really?" Phil asked back. He couldn't believe that there was another boy out there, even smaller than him! Maybe he could even have a friend his own size!

"Yeah," she said, but looked up to the teacher for a few more seconds. After a moment she returned her attention, and her giant right hand grabbed the tiny blonde boy. "I'm getting my extra credit now," she grinned.

After a moment in darkness and the world again shifting around him violently, he found himself being repostioned between two fingers with his back to her giant thumb... and what he saw before him was frightening: She was holding him level with the heel of the foot that was propped up on her left knee. She was using the thumb of her left hand to pull her grimy sock down below her ankle and over her heel, showing him a long, dim cavern, one side of which was made up of the sock, the other was made of the smelly sole of her foot.

He managed to twist around and get a glance of the girl's face - she was looking down with a happy, evil smirk, and upon seeing him look at her, she forced an evil grin. Phil got one last look, as he shifted around again - Carla was watching, with large eyes, but there was nothing she could do as she saw him pleading for help.

Then he was shoved forward by her, into the space between her smelly sock and the grimy sole of her foot . Her thumb behind his back released him, and he was held between her two fingers, with his face pressed into the gritty flesh of her foot, and dispite his struggles, he was slid across her grimy sole as far as possible into the sock. Soon his face was at her toes, and he felt the two fingers around him release - and slide back the way they came.

The thumb holding the rim of the sock released, and he felt the sock tighten around him as she pulled it back up, higher around her ankle. Then the whole world shifted, as she lowered her foot from being propped up on her knee, and rested it on the floor.

The pressure on Phil's body was enormous, as the sweaty, smelly flesh of the girl's giant foot was suddenly being pressed down under the weight of her enormous leg as well. He had to struggle to breathe, and after a minute, he aleady felt like his bones were cracking.

Then Amanda started bouncing her foot.

Suddenly the new pressure on his tiny ribcage became unbearable, which was caught under the ball of her foot - and his legs and arms were flailing around - at first struggling, then after giving out, simply from the terrible bouncing of Amanda's foot. His face was squeezed between her smelly toes, barely able to get any air at all - and what he could get smelled so strong. He didn't think he would last much longer.

It was putting such a strain on his chest and upper back that he began to pass out... but then it stopped. Her foot came flat against the ground again - flattening him under a lot of weight - but it was evenly disributed again, and it wasn't so bad on any one part of him. So he began to stuggle to get some air - all of which smelled horribly strong like Amanda's giant grimy foot and sock.

Then he heard something.

"She's so mean..." a weak, tiny voice wimpered, from the left. It was the voice of a boy, even younger than Phil. Phil turned his head to the left, and saw something that he'd never forget. There was a boy - about 5 times smaller than Phil, stuck to the other side of Amanda's fourth toe.

Phil was in disbelief. "You're her little step brother?!" he cried.

"Yeah..." he weakly replied. "She keeps me like this most of the time, too. I hate her." he continued.

Then Amanda's enormous toes began to wiggle - forcing them to both struggle to find more air, in the smelly prison. Phil suddenly found his face covered by some new portion of sweaty foot flesh that he couldn't seem to wedge his face out from under. It took all his struggles just to get any air, at this point, and his body was now too broken to stand up, if he was in the position to.
1222212.title: Amanda's Turn

12222121.content:
Phil couldn't believe that people could be so cruel, as he felt Amanda's toes wiggle all over him. Amanda was treating him no less than she would a pebble inside her shoe.

The difference was that Phil made the snotty Amanda feel more powerful than any old pebble would.

He heard a very loud bell ring.
He heard Ms. Pritty say, "Too bad, we didn't have time for everyone to give Phil his punishment. Amanda, since you seem to really enjoy this, how about 2 more extra credit points for taking him home tonight?" Amanda said, "I will do so, thank you so much!" Amanda purposefully scrunched her toes.

Phil heard the stepbrother say, "At least, you don't have to go through this practically your whole life... my step-parents think I'm dead... they weren't very nice though, so I don't care that much. The step-dad made me be in a circus, I still miss my real family though."

Even though Phil's voice was largely muffled by Amanda's toes, he managed to let out, "That's terrible. This girl sure is cruel, I guess I'm lucky in that respect."

The stepbrother said, "Nice family, that's good..." Amanda then wiggled her 4th and 5th toes pushing the stepbrother down farther than he was before.
Phil saw this and asked, "Are you okay?"

The stepbrother said in a monotone voice, "I'm used to it, there's a point where you just stop complaining, where you give up & face life as it is."

Phil asked, "What's your name?"
The stepbrother said, "I was once known as John, or Widdle Wonny, or some dumb name like that. I was here since I was 10, I'm now about 16."

Phil was shocked to learn that John was a lot older than he was, he then asked, "Does she keep you near her foot all the time?".

John responded, "She keeps me in here most of the time, the only time she lets me out is when she takes a shower, and even then I'm tied onto whatever shoe she plans to wear. She occasionally lets me out whenever she has trouble with her homework, and thankfully the dumb shit she is, is a lot." John laughed bitterly.

Amanda had done something terribly evil... Phil no longer cared about what happened to him. Phil mostly felt anger over what this bitch did to this guy. Phil felt a powerful rage. He jumped up with a powerful force. He was free from her powerful grip.

He heard a loud, "OW! THAT HURT MY WIDDLE TOE! You deserve to be crushed!!" He then heard a familiar voice say, "You don't deserve to keep him, Amanda. Your actions won't make him learn his "lesson" for something he didn't even do."

Phil jumped with delight. The voice was Carla.

John said, "Ah yes, Carla, a very nice girl indeed. We were friends before Amanda hid me from the world forever."

Amanda said, "You are just jealous that you don't have a tiny man at your feet right now. You seemed to have been enjoying yourself when he was."
Carla said, "At least I wasn't attacked in the process, and at least Phil was happy when he was with me.", pointing out that Amanda was hurt from Phil's moment of rage & the fact Phil was enraged in the first place.

Phil knew he couldn't scream out to Carla at this moment. Amanda then moved her foot up, blast! Caught by her grip again. This time, he was pushed deeper, so that he could feel a rough callous on her sole.

Amanda laughed. She said, "Got the little bug again. You can't do anything about it, girl. So go away!" Carla said, "Don't talk to me like that!" Amanada said, "Little and feisty. You are small, you know that..." Carla then started to cry. Amanda said, "Go ahead, cry and cry, that's all you are good for."

John said in an angry tone, "I'm sick and tired of that bitch being mean to me and my friends!" Phil was suprised, since he was convinced that John was apathetic towards everything.

Phil said, "John, maybe we can get out... There could be a.." John interruped, "Hole, rip, take off her socks. I tried all of these things, she's definitely vigilant when it comes to me." Phil said, "What about if I go to where you are? Being that I'm 5 times bigger than you, hold on to my back when Amanda takes me out, then you are free. If we were bigger, I'm sure we could teach that girl a lesson for making Carla cry." John said, "That's what truly gets me, Amanda is cruel to those who are nice or have brains. Carla is one of the few which fits into that category in the whole school."

Phil said, "Right now, I'm sick of having her grimy flesh all over my face..." John said, "When you are in my position, been in here as long as I had, you get sick of many things much MORE."

Then the moment came...

Amanda took off her socks. It was too late for Phil to initate John's escape plan.

Amanda smiled at the two boys lodged between her toes & said, "It's comfy down there, isn't it? I heard voices inside the shoe. You two met each other, haven't you?" John said sarcastically, "Yes Mistress, we have." Amanda said, "Phil, wasn't that so sweet of me to protect you like that?" Phil wanted to say no,

But Amanda gave Phil an awfully pretty gaze. Her gigantic blue eyes twinkled & she smiled, revealing her pearl whites. Even the feet which she imprisoned him with were beautiful, her toes were well-pedicured & it was like a goddess to him.

Phil avoided temptation however, and said while closing his eyes, "No, it wasn't! You took me away from my family, you treated me worse than any one ever has before, you made Carla cry, and you kept your own stepbrother merciless to your monstrous feet for years!"

Phil saw John give a slight smile.

Amanda said, "In all my years, I have never heard anyone say such mean things to me. You need to learn to go into submission like the other bug has! But sadly, I have to return you tomorrow, or you family would miss you so much..." Phil thought, Becky & his mom must be worried sick right now.

Amanda said, "John knows how to do this very well... both of you will now take out any sock lint I have." John said, "It's all I can do." John was acting awfully polite to Amanda, but he said it so bitterly, that it almost sounded as full of spite as the things Phil had said, if not more, actually it was much more.

Phil & John were forced to look around her toes to see if there was lint. Amanda played dirty though, while Phil was looking between her second & third toe, all of a sudden, she squished the two toes together.

Amanda said, "Not so tiny, huh! John can avoid that very well, we will probably be playing very different games." Phil spat at her toes.

Amanda squealed, "How nice of you to give my tootsies a bath, thank you, sweetie!"

John shrugged and looked horribly solemn. Phil couldn't help but to cry. John & Phil were both working on Amanda's 4th toe.

John whispered, "Don't worry, Phil, you will probably only have one night here. Amanda knows that she'll get into serious trouble, either with Ms. Prittey, your family, or with the police. If she keeps you longer.." John was sure smart, this brought a slight reassurance to Phil.

All of a sudden, the doorbell rang... Who was there?
12222121.title: Hope or More Despair?

122221211.content:
Phil had just gotten a small spark of hope from John, but he still felt pity for the tiny teen. As he and John worked their way towards Amanda's 5th toe, they heard the buzzer sounding on her doorbell.

"I'll get it!" yelled Amanda.

John looked at Phil apathetically as Amanda groped both boys between her toes and marched off to the door. Slipping on her socks where a grimy smell met the boys, she opened the portal to see a very suprising sight.

"What the... what are you doing here, you fuc-" was the most she got out before the boys heard a thud.

"God damn you! I want my boy back, and I want him now!" screamed the heavenly voice of Carla.

"You bitch! How dare you punch me in my own house!" screamed back the voice of Amanda.

Another thud was heard by the boys as the girls got into what must have looked like a fight of Godesses to the boys.

Somewhere in the middle of the scuffle, Amanda's sock slipped off and the boys bounded out. They landed hard on the floor, and looked up to see the proud smiling face of...
122221211.title: Catfight

choices: Phil's mom, telling her that Phil was staying the night there.
Amanda's mom, informing her on where her son is.
1222212111.content:
Hope reappeared in Phil's mind, as Carla's face appeared to him, as if a goddess of hope was looking him straight in the face. "Don't worry," Carla told them. "I'll take care of you now." Suddenly, the sock closed around them.

On the outside, Carla ran outside of Amanda's house, with Amanda behind her. Carla's house wasn't too far away, but would she make it? After all, Amanda was a faster runner than her. Up ahead was her house. The door was unlocked. She burst in, slamming the door behind her and locking it. Amanda was pounding on the door outside.

Before Carla headed upstairs, her mother called her. "Carla, who's that at the door?" she asked, heading for the door. Before she unlocks the door, Carla interrupts, "Don't! That's....some maniac who followed me home." "That's not too far from the truth," John told Phil. They both laughed.

Carla headed to her bedroom and dumped Phil and John onto the bed. Finally, Phil felt at peace. Carla sat down next to them, a joyous grin on her face, followed by face of worry. Carla got up and headed for her phone. Who does she call first?
1222212111.title: Sanctuary

12222121111.content:
Carla walked over to the phone and dialed in a number. John and Phil however were celebrating their new found freedom.

"I can't believe it's over! I'm so happy to be free now!" John 'bellowed'

"I know! I thought we'd be crushed when they started fighting, but I was wrong, thankfully!"

"...Yes, he'll be staying the night here tonight, if that's okay? ...Great! Thanks a lot!" Carla finished her conversation on the phone and returned to the bed, sitting closer this time, and causing the two boys to roll towards her enormous end.

"Sorry!" She giggled at them, "Looks like you can stay over the night, Phil. What should we all do now?"
12222121111.title: Free at last, free at last

122221211111.content:
"I know! Why don't John and I explore the bouncy world," Phil said as he hopped up and down on the springy bed. "It will be a great adventure."

Carla giggled as an idea popped in her head. She reached deep into her pockets and pulled out several dimes. "And you have to find the buried silver that was left by the pirates." She then placed the dimes under her pillow on the opposite side of the bed.

"Oh, and beware, for a horrible monster guards the precious treasure." Carla then smiled and reached for a black pen and a green marker on her desk. She then sat down on the floor, hidden from Phil and John's view.

"I wonder what she meant by a 'horrible monster'?" Phil said as he lifted John and put him on his shoulder.

"Who cares? Let's nab that treasure!" John was very excited. He had not led a very happy childhood. Especially not under his sister's rancid toes. At the moment he was happy to be playing a game with good friends.

Phil and John navigated their way across the bed, which had a fluffy, pink comforter with big heart symbols. "This sure is a strange world," Phil said as he noted that their surroundings smelled of Carla's perfume. When they reached the pillow, the two small boys felt a rumbling on the bed. They were suddenly greeted by a five-headed monster! Actually, it was just Carla's right foot bouncing on the bed. She had painted her toes green and drawn scary faces on them with the black pen.

"Who dares?!" Carla said in a spooky voice as her foot approached the explorers.

Phil ran at the monster and attacked with a flying, jump kick. He connected but slid off Carla's smooth skin and fell to the ground. John tumbled off Phil's shoulders and laughed as he landed on the pink fuzz.

"Ow! You beat me!" Carla growled and then made a choking sound as her foot dropped to the side, landing right on Phil.

Phil tried to pry himself off of the defeated "monster", but could not. "Hey, get off," Phil said as he laughed. "Sorry, but my foot can't move. It's dead!" Carla teased as she smiled brightly. John moved toward Carla's foot and began to tickle it lightly. "Choochi choochi coo!"

Carla burst out laughing and quickly shifted her foot off of Phil. "How did you know I was so ticklish?"

John shrugged as he went to inspect his fallen comrade. "Well, you seem to take really good care of your feet. They're so smooth and sensitive." Phil sat up and nodded in agreement. "Yeah, and they smell good, too. Nothing like Amanda's sweaty, stinky toes."

"Well, I do make sure that my feet are in good shape. I want to be a dancer when I grow up." Carla then stood up and moved to the other side of the room. "Do you guys want to see my dance?"
122221211111.title: Exploring the Mystic Land of Bed

choices: Waker her up. That snoring is killing me!
1222212111111.content:
Phil and John eagerly nodded. "Let's see it!"

Carla popped a tape into her stereo and pressed the play button. She then stood still and waited for the music to begin.

A spicy, samba tune played from the tape. Phil and John watched as Carla moved to the tropical melody. Her dancing was beautiful and her movements were elegant. It was enough to get Phil and John to start shaking to the beat.

"Ole!" Phil shouted as the samba beat went faster and faster. Carla laughed, happy to see that her friends enjoyed the music. After nearly twenty minutes of non-stop dance, Carla switched off the stereo and plopped down on the bed, which sent Phil and John bouncing in opposite directions.

"Sorry, again," Carla smiled. She then shifted around until she was lying flat on her back. "Gee, I'm just sooo tired. It has really been an exciting day," Carla was breathing hard and some sweat dripped from her forehead. "I really need to take a rest right now," Carla said as she reached for a remote and turned on the tv.

"Here, you guys watch what you want," She then placed the remote control by her feet. Phil and John moved forward and took a seat between her toes. They watched some cartoons until it was interupted by a commercial. "Let me pick something, please," John pleaded as he hopped on the remote. "Amanda never let me watch what I wanted."

Using all his weight, John managed to click one of the buttons after about three minutes of trying. "Need some help down there?" Phil asked as he watched John struggle.

Suddenly, a loud noise shook the room. Phil and John turned to see that Carla, tired from the dancing, had fallen asleep and was snoring.

"We better wake her before we go deaf," John suggested.

Phil smiled. "Or we can explore the rest of Carla's house."
1222212111111.title: Carla's Dance

12222121111111.content:
"Wake her up! That snoring is killing me!"

"Okay, okay," Phil said as he grabbed John and placed him on his shoulder. They travled across the bed one more time, staying close to one side of Carla's body. The snoring became louder and louder as they drew near. Phil saw Carla's chest move up and down with each breath. The girl was very tired. Hopefully she wouldn't be too angry with them for waking her up.

As they got closer, Phil tried shouting at Carla but it was useless. She was too sleepy and her snoring was too loud. Suddenly the two boys caught wind of a terrible stench. It smelled like a mixture sweat and flowery deodorant. Phil turned about toward Carla's outstretched arms, which were tucked under her head.

"What's that smell?" John complained.

"It's... the pits," Phil said, stifling a giggle. He came closer to Carla's underarm, with a plan in mind.

"If her feet are so ticklish, you can only assume that she's ticklish here, too."
12222121111111.title: It's the Pits

122221211111111.content:
"I don't want to go anywhere near thhat pit! It smells worse than Amanda's sneaker!"

Phil set John aside and moved in closer, holding his breath. Looking about, the sight before Phil was worse that the stench. Carla's armpit was moist with sweat and several clumps of dedorant were stuck on some of the larger, underarm hairs. "We have to tell Carla to switch to a clear gliding brand of deodorant," he said as he tickled her.

Carla giggled a little but didn't wake up and brushed Phil off to the side, thinking he was a fly. Phil tried again, but Carla shifted her arm again, folding it to the side and trapping Phil underneath it.

Phil struggle to free himself from Carla's armpit, but couldn't. Each movement made him sink deeper and deeper until he has covered in the smelly sweat.

"Phil!!!" John shouted. He then moved about, trying to think of what to do next. "She'll never feel my. I have to make her hear me!" John ran toward Clara's hair and climbed it until he reached her ear.

"CARLA!!!!"

She still didn't hear him over the snoring. John jumped into the ear and navigated the dark, wax filled tunnel until he got close to the ear drum.

"Wake up CARLA!"
122221211111111.title: Ear's the way

choices: Have the Sleep Over at Phil's house
The Boys can sleep in her Mom's room
1222212111111111.content:
Carla awoke suddenly as her ear rang from the shouting that pounded at her ear drum. "What-what's going on?" It was at this moment that she felt something under her right armpit. Carla lifted her arm and saw Phil stuck to some of the deodorant. She carefully peeled him from her underarm and checked to make sure he was alright.

"Phil? Are you okay? Please speak to me!" She extended her pinky finger and carefully poke the little boy's belly, hoping for a response.

Phil coughed a little and stood up on the palm of Carla's hand. He was still a little dizzy from the ordeal, but he gave a thumb's up anyway. "Sorry about disturbing you, m'lady. But your snoring was driving John crazy."

"Say, where is--" but before Carla could finish her sentence, she heard John call from inside her head.

"Carla, I'm in here! I went in your ear to wake you up! But now I think I'm stuck in your ear wax!!!"

Carla ran into the bathroom and found a Q-tip. Slowly, she put it in her ear and gentle scooped some of the wax. She then brought the used Q-tip over to Phil. "I really should have cleaned there sooner. Please tell me you can find John in all that gunk."

Phil gagged a little and began pulling away chunks of the orange wax until he found John. "He looks alright, but I don't think he'll be going near any ears for awhile."

A sad look came over Carla's face. "I'm so sorry guys. First I bother you with my snoring. Then I almost suffocate Phil with my armpit. And now John's all orange and gross."

"Ah, it's not so bad," John said as he hops on Phil's shoulder. "At least you cared enough to help rescue me quickly. Once Amanda stuck me up her nose and wouldn't let me out until I scraped off all her boogers!"

Carla felt a little better. "Well, I guess you guys can't sleep here. My snoring will keep you awake all night."
1222212111111111.title: Q-Tip to the Rescue!

choices: Meet once again with Evil Amanda.
12222121111111111.content:
"Well, we can move the sleep over to my house," Phil suggested. "Sounds like a plan to me. I'll call your mom and tell her about the change of plans," Carla then sniffed the boys and groaned.

"But first you stinky boys better take a bath! You smell like sweaty pits and wax!" Carla teased them and then took them to the bathroom to get them cleaned. She filled a paper cup with warm water and handed Phil and John slivers of soap. The boys frowned, perferring to run about dirty rather than taking an early bath. "STINKY, STINKY, STINKY!" Carla continued to tease them as she stepped out of the bath room.

A while later she returned with a sleeping bag under her arm. "I'm ready? Are you?" As she asked, Phil was helping John dry off with a piece of tissue. "Yep, just about ready."

"Okay, let's go."
12222121111111111.title: TO PHIL'S... but first...

122221211111111111.content:
Carla carried Phil and John in her hand and walked to her new friend's home. It was hard to believe that there was a tiny boy sitting in between her fingers, but there he was. For some reason, Phil made Carla feel very strange and very happy. Her palm began to sweat with excitement, so she swithced the boys to the other hand.

"Heh. Um, you guys were starting to feel heavy," Carla said with a nervous laugh.

Finally they arrived at Phil's house. Carla rang the door bell and was quickly greeted by Phil's older sister. "Hey lil' Phil!" Becky said, looking down at her little brother. She then shook Carla's free hand and smiled politely "I'm glad to see that Phil made a new friend."

"Hey, what about me?!" John waved his arms from Phil's shoulder to get Becky's attention. He didn't want to be ignored and Becky seemed to be really nice.

"Oh, TWO new friends. Gee, I really didn't think that there would be anyone smaller than you, my wittle brother." Becky moved closer to get a better look at Phil's tiny, tiny friend.

"Oh, you're sooooo cute... and itsy bitsy..." Becky's eye was nearly touching John, who was blushing because of the special treatment. He also liked feeling of the warm air coming from Becky's mouth and nostrils.

"Hey, Beckster. You mind moving back a bit? Your breath stinks!" Phil exclaimed as he sat back and rested on Carla's thumb.

"Oh, yeah?" Becky moved closer. "I bet you can't guess what I just ate!" She then opened her mouth wide. Looking into the cave-like maw, Phil and John noticed that there were mushy, yellow blobs stuck between Becky's teeth. Suddenly, she burped into Phil's face, sending saliva flying at his direction.

"Opps," Becky giggled. "Didn't mean to do that." A strong scent filled Phil's nose. It was something cheesy and lemony.

"Hmmm. Smells like lemonade and nachos!" Phil said, and the four of them joined in the laughter.
122221211111111111.title: "What's that Smell?"

choices: Play "Mini-Man Vs. The Amazing Giant Girl"
1222212111111111112.content:
"Sorry, Becky. We don't have time for your smelling games. Me and Carla and John have something else planned," Phil then pointed Carla toward his room.

"Aw, too bad," Becky said with a mischievious smile. "I was getting ready to fart just now and-"

"RUN!!!"

Carla sprinted toward Phil's room and closed the door behind them. She set the boys on the ground next to her feet and sat down in front of the door. "I think we just dodged a bullet, there."

Phil nodded and then pointed to a small, toy box that was next to his little makeshift bed. "Hey, Carla. Can you grab that for me?" Carla reached for the toy box and set it down by Phil.

"What's in there?" John asked.

"Just a few cosumes that fit me," Phil answered as he shuffled through the box. There was a tiny cape, a lab outfit, a trench coat, and a doctor's mask inside.

"This should help us with our next game..."
1222212111111111112.title: Playing a New Game

12222121111111111121.content:
As Carla handed Phil the cape, a familar voice rang out. "Whatcha doin' squirt?" It was Becky, who had just come into the room. She eyed the cape, "So it looks like you're playing Amazing Giant Girl without me huh?"

Carla and John were surprised. "You play this game frequently with her?" John asked. "All the time, it's a great way for me to get exercise" replied Phil. "Mind if I ask how to play?" asked Carla.

Becky smiled. "Of Course! See, the giant girl has to destroy Mini-Man, while Mini-Man's gotta destory Giant Girl. Giant Girl does this by trying to make Mini-Man submit".

"How do you make him submit?" asked Carla. "Simple", replied Becky, "You just get him into a position where he 'd easily tap out. This one time, I was wearing this really badly smelling sock, and I placed Phil in there to attempt to submit. He didn't last long". Phil felt really embarassed about this.

"How does Mini-Man win?" asked John. "Again, simple. What Mini-Man has to do is attack Giant Girl's weak spot". She eyed Carla's confused look. "Basically, this weak spot can be anywhere on your body, anywhere that you can feel Phil hitting you".

"Anywhere?" Carla asked, "Wouldn't that make the game more dangerous?" Becky paused for a moment. "Yeah, it does. That same time where I stuffed Phil into my sock I nearly suffocated him. Plus, there have been times where I've nearly crushed, eaten, or dropped Phil from a high spot".

She thought about it for a moment. "How about...my butt?" she asked, placing a hand on it. Becky looked surprised, Phil looked kinda awkward. "There's not a problem with that, except I think Phil here's a little uncomfortable with that".
