This wasn't too much trouble for Mrs. Pritty though, seeing as how her room was directly across from Phil's last period classroom. Mrs. Pritty scooped Phil up in her hand and took him away without saying a word.

Phil was taken into Mrs. Pritty's room where he was greeted by a view of the beautiful, but angry-looking Kendra. Phil was set down at his assigned seat directly infront of Kendra. This worried Phil, but he reassured himself that Mrs. Pritty would be watching them the entire time.

"If you'll excuse me, I have some things to do. I'll be back when it is time for you two to leave. You two had better not cause any trouble", Mrs. Pritty ruined Phil's comfort zone.

Kendra's face lit up as she responded, "Oh, don't worry Mrs. Pritty, everything will be all peachy keen in here".

Mrs. Pritty left the room and closed the door behind her. Before Phil could even think of something to fear, he was already surrounded by Kendra's cave-like fist. Phil could feel himself being raised into the sky. Kendra then opened her palm, revealing her tiny prize to her house-sized face. Kendra had a funny smirk on her face.
123.title: Detention sucks.

choices: Kendra's Single Mother Takes Phil For Herself
1231.content:
"You know," Kendra said to Phil, "it's all your fault that I'm here." Phil looked up at her in shock and said "you're here because you attacked me with your foot!" Kendra shook her head and said "you know you deserved it. I shouldn't be punished for doing what I have every right to do."

Before Phil could respond, Kendra removed her sock and dropped Phil inside. They were long socks, so she was able to tie off the top of it, making sure Phil couldn't escape. Inside, Phil was overwhelmed by the lingering smell of Kendra's feet. He started pushing against the walls, doing whatever he could to get out, but there was no way.

Kendra dropped the sock into her knapsack, and then went back to doing some work on her desk. When the two hours were up, Ms. Prittey came back in and said "okay you two, you may go home now." She then looked around and said "Kendra, where did Phil go?" Kendra looked up at her teacher and said, "well, I don't want to be a snitch, but about a minute after you left he got up and said that he was done with detention. I told him that it was wrong, that we shouldn't leave, but he just ignored me."

Ms. Prittey went over to Kendra and patted the girl on the head. "Thank you for telling me," she said, "it's important that I know this." The teacher then thought and said "tell you what. We can forget this whole detention thing for you. Phil can take your punishment by having an extra week. That's what he gets for skipping out." Kendra smiled and thanked her teacher, then slung her knapsack over her shoulder and ran out, bouncing Phil around inside the bag.

When Kendra got home, she went to her room and finally released Phil from his prison. "Guess what," she said, "Ms. Prittey thinks you skipped detention, and she's giving you my week." Phil screamed "that's not fair! You push me around, lie, and I get punished? Twice?" Kendra laughed and said "guess it's no fun being you. But it is fun being me, and you're going to help me have that fun."

"So," she said, "now it's time for your personal detention. We have to decide on some activities. Here are the choices............
1231.title: Personal Detention

12311.content:
"Now the first rule is that you will never refuse my feet, and you will always admit the truth that you enjoy it. So didn't you want me feet to grab you in class?" She smiled threateningly as if to say what will happen if he said no.

"Uh uh uh, yeah, I um enjoyed it." Phil staggered. He wasn't sure if he wanted to tell the truth and risk his own safety.

"Exactly," she replied perkily, sounding innocent and friendly as if she hadn't just been so cruel and threatening a moment before. "Well that's why you deserve to be punished, both with your punishment after school and your personal detention. You wanted to be almost my feet, and that's why you were grabbed by my toes in class. That got both of us in trouble, but I wasn't at fault. See you were of course for wanting it, but I was just granting you what you wanted. It's not my fault, and I shouldn't have been punished. Now you will be getting the punishment that was given to me. You wasted a two hours of my life with this detention. Now I'll give you two hours of agony to compensate."

Well that wasn't how Phil remembered it at all, but it seems like there was no arguing with this giantess. He had to accept these 2 hours of punishment despite the rather perverted sense of justice.

"Will you let me go home after these two hours?" Phil asked hopefully.

"We'll see. Now I like having you around, and I'm sure you like having me around. Right?"

Phil was again forced to say yes to not get hurt.

"Well then maybe we shouldn't leave each other after the two hours of punishment after all. But let's cross that bridge when we get there. Right now I have to go running and then to soccer practice. Oh and your coming with me."

Kendra then grabbed Phil and dumped him back into the sock she had him in before.

"Kendra please! No! Don't put me in there again!" Phil cried desperately.

"Don't worry. It won't be as bad as it was last time. I'll keep you company in there."

With that Kendra lowered the sock and put her foot in. Phil was forced deep inside by her foot and trapped underneath her toes.

"I hope you enjoy the next two hours."

Kendra than got her shoes on and started running. She ran for about a fifteen minutes even though for Phil it seemed like forever. After every step, her toes would crush down on him. He tried to wiggle his way out at first, but that only made him uncomfortable and Kendra laugh. They both knew he wasn't going anywhere fast.

After that Kendra went to her hour and 45 minute long soccer practice. Between the running and the kicking, Kendra shook Phil around quite a bit down there. At the end of the ordeal, Phil was tired and could barely breath. The sweat had absorbed into the fabric of his clothes, making him drenched. After the practice the two hours of punishment was up, and Kendra decides to:

After the ordeal was over, he lays there on the floor grasping for breath, unable to move.

You might think you deserved positive treatment or something ludicrous like that! No, I just took you out as I changed shoes. I can't walk around in my soccer cleats."

She then picks him up and drops him into her sock. At this is a new sock and not an old, smelly one, thinks Phil. A moment later her foot joins him in there, and then she puts on her clogs.

"Time for dinner," her mother calls from the floor below.

"Coming," Kendra answers.

How long does Kendra keep Phil in there for?

She...

1231121.content:
"Yeah, I guess your right. You only deserved 2 hours for what you did. I'll give you a break..." Kendra assures Phil, "for today at least."

She then put Phil into her purse as she picked up her gear. Her mother comes and picks her up for practice.

"Mom, can you take me to..." and then proceeds to give Phil's address. "I have to return something to Becky."

Phil is worried when he hears that Kendra knew where she lived. Becky was Phil's sister, so maybe she knew the address from doing stuff with her. That wouldn't be terribly unreasonable. Anyways, it freaked Phil out a little.

Pretty soon Phil feels himself hoisted into the air as Kendra picks up her purse and heads to the door of his house. Kendra takes him out and grips him in her huge hand.

"Now don't tell anybody about me kidnapping you during detention or you will regret it," she scolds as she squeezes Phil a little to demonstrate what would happen if he did.

She then places him on the ground in the doorway, rings the doorbell, and leaves. Phil's mother opens the door and sees Phil down there and lets him in.

"Hey my little kumquat, how was your first day of school?" she asks.

"You know I don't like being called that," Phil responds.

"I know I know. You're a big boy now or at least an older boy maybe not big," she teases.

"Anyways, you are coming home way late. Where have you been?"

Phil must decide will he tell the truth or will he heed Kendra's warning?

12311212.content:
"Well I was hanging out with my new friend Kendra," Phil lies.

"Oh, that's great! I'll arrange to have you hang out with her more often," responds his mother.

Oh great, Phil thinks, it looks like this lie will come back to haunt him. He'll now have to spend more time with that crazy evil girl.

He spends the rest of the night as usual. The next day he walks into school and sits down at his desk. He looks behind him to see Kendra's smiling face tower above him. He then looks forward and finds Mrs. Prittey staring at him expectantly.

"Where were did you go during detention?" she interrogates.

"Well, I uhh," Phil stammers. He hears screeching as Kendra rubs her feet behind him to warn him to make the right answer. What does Phil do?

Mrs. Prittey looks back and forth not sure which one to believe. Finally she makes up her mind and agrees with

"You have detention remember. I'm going to sit here with you during detention to ensure that you don't go."

What does she decide to do?

Ms, Prittey takes him out at the end of detention.
12311212211.content:
Phil was still at his tiny desk on the ground.

He was working on homework and was into it, unaware of Ms. Prittey.

ms. prittey thought this was detention, not a study hall where Phil could do homework. Phil must be punished! Or at least make her happy.

She knew what to do. She stood up, and gracefully walked toward Phil's desk, the clicks of her heels surprising Phil.

Phil looks up to see a large high heel above him. He screams and puts his hands over his head, then hears nothing. He looks up and sees the shoe hovering above him.

Phil gets out of his desk and backs away trying to get Ms. Prittey's attention to tell her why she is doing this.

He sees his teacher smile down upon him. She lets her high heel slip from her slender, pantyhose covered foot and brings it once again toward Phil.

Now Phil is worried. He runs and immediately falls as he felt a push on his back. "She must have used her toe to push me down" Phil thinks.

Ms. Prittey brings her foor over Phil and gently presses down. He cannot escape.

Then she moves her foot to the side and brings her other foot on the other side of Phil.

Phil sees both feet around him, but he doesnt want to move becuase her feet were moving to fast and he did not want to be crushed.

Ms. Prittey scoots the feet closer to Phil and then stands on the sides of her feet raising the left side of her left foot and the right side of her left foot. She brings them closer as they sourround Phil, trapping him in darkness.

Phil, couldnt stand the smell and pushes a foot.

Ms. prittey releases Phil but then she bends over. She takes Phil and brings him to her desk.

She takes a piece of tape and tapes his arms and legs around so he looked like a mummy but with his head exposed. Phil tried to struggle, but all he could move was his head.

She dips him in a cup of orange juice and sucks on his head, using him like a lollipop.

She then takes the mummified Phil and lowers him to her panties. She slides him inside her vagina with little resistance since his limbs were taped down. Phil enters Ms. Prittey's vagina completey watching the vagina walls close in around him and the light went off.

Phil struggles inside as he cannot swim, move and his fate lies by the power of Ms. Prittey's vagina.
12311212211.title: To kill time by playing with Phil

12312.content:
"I have some friends coming over to play with you. We're going to have a great time, well maybe not you."

Phil doesn't like where this is going.

In a few minutes, the bell rings, and Kendra goes down to answer the door, leaving him there on the floor. This could be a perfect chance for Phil to escape. He could try to hide and then leave when they are not looking. It's extremely risky though because if he's caught he has no idea what they would do to him, over and above what they're already doing to him. Then again, the situation might not be able to get that much worse, and trying to escape might be the only way to make it better. What does he do?
12312.title: Answering the Door

choices: Kendra already thought of this and is waiting for him there.
123121.content:
He assesses the situation and runs over to the bed. He climbs and hides in between the mattress and the box spring. There is just enough space for him to squirm in. About the second he gets himself hidden, he hears and feels an earthquake as the four girls walk into the room.

"Where is Phil? I want to play with him," one of the girls squeals in excitement.

"He's right..." Kendra begins to answer. "Okay, so he was right here on the floor."

"Did you leave unintended Kendra?! You could have put easily put him somewhere for like the 10 seconds it took to get us at the door."

"I just got excited and wasn't thinking straight," Kendra rebuts. "Oh my gosh, we need to find him."

They search the room, checking under the bed, within the sheets, in the dresser, in the dirty laundry pile, and everywhere else they could think of. They don't think to look in between the mattresses though, presuming Phil couldn't fit there.

"I don't think he's in the room. Do you think he left your room."

"Let's check. He couldn't be far if he did that. He's small, and we only gave him a few seconds."

They leave the room to search the hallway and surrounding rooms. Phil takes this as a moment to come out of his hiding spot and assess the situation. He needs to find a way out quickly without getting caught. The door to the room is not an option since the girls are right out there looking for him. He'd almost surely get found. He sees a bedroom window, but the room is on the second floor, a dangerous climb for him. He notices that Kendra has a laundry shoot. That's perfect, he thinks. It'll take him to the basement where they aren't expecting him, and he can climb up the stairs and sneak out the front door to his freedom.

He goes over and climbs onto the laundry shoot. A very high climb, but given his small body weight and almost constant practice out of necessity in living in a society built for people much taller than him, he's always been a good climber. He looks in the shoot, an black bottomless abyss, closes his eyes, and jumps. He lands in a pile of dirty laundry.
123121.title: The Hiding Spot

123122.content:
In a few seconds, Kendra arrives with her friends. Phil could hear them from the stairs and was too paralyzed by fear to go anywhere.

"Well here he is girls," Kendra beckons. The rest of the girls look dumbfounded.

"Is he real?" one of the girls ask.

"Yes Cynthia," Kendra replies. "He's very real. I've been playing with him all day."

"Let's play a game," Kendra suggests after a long pause. "It's called catch. The first one to catch Phil wins and gets to play with him first. The catch is to catch him we can only use our...
123122.title: Life of the Party

1231222.content: Kendra grabs phil, and before he can react, Kendra tosses him up in the air. He looks down just in time to see a large pink tongue a few inches below him. He lands with a loud *Smack!* on the girls tongue and the impact of him falling makes it ripple. The girls tongue starts pushing him around her mouth like a snake. A snake he really didnt want anything to do with. She seems to enjoy his taste and pins him down to the bottom of her mouth, and pushes on him with her tongue. Then, she sneezes. Did the sudden intake of air before the sneeze suck him into the throat, or did the sneeze push him out?
1231222.title: NOM NOM TIME....or is it...

12313.content:
“I know what to do with you!” she suddenly exclaimed. “I’ll let my mother deal with you.”

That doesn’t sound like a bad idea. Maybe she could save me from this crazy girl, Phil thought, but then Kendra quelled that hope when she said, “She hates men ever since my father left her after she was pregnant with me.”

Before he had time to react, Phil is scooped up by Kendra’s fleshy hand and engulfed in a wall of blackness. He felt like he was on a roller coaster ride as she carried him downstairs to the living room where her mother was.

“Mother, I have found a boyfriend.”

“Kendra, what did I tell you about dating?” her mother responded.

“I know. I know. I’m not to trust any boy, but he’s different.”

“They’re never different. They are all a bunch of gut-wrenching, lying animals who only care about themselves and will just leave you in the end. I thought I sent you to an all girls schools precisely so that you wouldn’t see a boy you had a crush on. How did you meet him?”

“Well. He kinda came on to me and rubbed me the right way, and I think he’s really cute and fun to be around.” With that she gave a playful tug on Phil with her hand. It was playful for her at least, but for Phil, it almost crushed his lungs. Phil didn’t like the way she had just joked about her feet rubbing him in class.

“You know the rule. No men!”

“Can you make an exception? Please! Pretty pretty pleeeeease!”

“I don’t want you to get hurt Kendra, and that’s all that men do.”

“That’s so unfair. At least give him a chance. Meet him first.”

“I already said no.”

“Pleeeeeeeeeassssssse!”

“All right, let’s meet this boy, but he better be good,” she sighed.

With that Phil felt his pink prison being opened as Kendra opened up her hand and lifted Phil up to her mother’s face. “His name’s Phil. I met him today, but I know that we’ll get along really well.”

“Is this your boyfriend? Honey, that’s a doll.”

“No he’s a little boy. See.” She then pinched Phil in the shoulder with her open thumb and forefinger causing him to instinctively cry, “Ouch,” and grab his shoulder. That was going to leave a mark.

“So this is a little boy.” She said perplexed as she grabbed Phil by the head and dangled him in front of her face.

Phil for the first time looked up to see the giant face that was beaming down at him. Kendra’s mother had black hair and green eyes. She looked like she was in her mid-thirties. She was tall (especially from Phil’s perspective) and slender. She was kind of cute for a thirty-year old, looking like an older version of Kendra. She wouldn’t have had a hard time finding a boyfriend if she was interested (which she wasn’t.) Phil was got rather scared as a gigantic grim arose from this woman’s enormous face.

“Well at least we can tame is this male animal and teach him how to respect women,” she said. Phil didn’t like where this was going. Phil was almost blown away because this woman’s voice was so strong. “Young man, I will teach you how to be a good boyfriend to Kendra. Then I’ll allow you to date her.”

“But I don’t want to date Ke…” Phil stammered.

“Silence! Don’t try to make excuses for not undergoing this lesson. It’s for your own good.”

“Hey sweetie,” her voice suddenly brightened as she addressed Kendra. “Why don’t you go along and play for the afternoon as I teach him. If he passes the tests, then he can be your boyfriend tonight.”

“Okay. Thanks mom. I knew you’d understand.” With that Kendra went upstairs. Phil saw her smirk back at him, giggle a little, and then go over to her room.

“All men are the same. They go to bed with you and leave before the morning. Her father dumped me and moved to another state once he found out that I was pregnant. I never heard from him again.”

“I’m sorry for that lady, but you don’t understand…”

“I understand perfectly! Now you are about to tell me that you wouldn’t have done the same if you were him, and you expect me to believe that. Well, you won’t be able to do the same to Kendra. I won’t let you leave her until she dumps you, and given your size,” Phil felt a slight tug from her fingers that almost made him faint as she said this sentence, “I can force you to stay with her.”

Phil figured there was no sense arguing with this woman. He was also afraid now. It seems he’s stuck being Kendra’s “boyfriend,” probably more like toy, until she gets bored with him, which he’s not sure would ever happen.

The woman walked over to her couch in her living room and sat down.

“As for calling me lady, shame on you!” she shouted as she shook Phil violently to prove her point. “You shall address me as ‘Lady Clement’ from now on.”

“Yes Lady Clement.”

“Good. Now you’re starting to understand who’s in charge. The first lesson I’m going to teach you is to serve your girlfriend. You must put her wants and needs first before yours.”

She dropped Phil onto the carpet right in front of her. Phil looked up and saw her feet, legs, and the rest of her body towering above him like a goddess standing on a throne.

“What I need right now is a foot rub.”

Now after being in Kendra’s shoe most of the day, Phil really didn’t want to touch or smell another foot again.

“But please I have bad experiences with feet,” Phil tried to plead.

Within seconds Clement’s right foot rose up like a pouncing tiger and smashed on top of Phil.

“I said rub my feet, you little, insignificant twerp!! I’ll grind you into a bloody pulp for all I care!” With that she pushed down on Phil until Phil couldn’t breathe and felt like is guts were about to explode. After holding him like that for a minute, she finally relented her foot. Phil laid there motionless gasping for breath.

“We can do this the easy way or the hard way you little brat. Now are you going to rub my feet or not?”
12313.title: The Dating Lesson

123131.content:
Phil realized he had no real choice. Either rub these crazy lady’s feet or die, and as bad as it was, rubbing her feet was not as bad as death.

Phil got up and headed over to her right foot. He gasped at the size of the thing. It was at least three times bigger than him. He had dealt with Kendra’s girl-sized feet before (which despite being small by normal people’s standards, still towered over Phil), but this full grown foot was massive compared to that.

“I want you to start with the sole because that is where men belong: under the sole of a woman!”

With that she lifted up her massive foot above him, and Phil began to rub. As he did, her foot would frequently shake from being tickled. From Lady Clement’s perspective, these tiny hands rubbing her well-pedicured foot was the most tickling sensation she had ever felt. Every time she shook her foot, she would knock Phil over with her force. “I didn’t say to stop!” she would shout every time. “Don’t make me punish you!” Then Phil would quickly get up and continue to rub her foot, scared of this punishment. What he was doing was torturous enough, so he didn’t want to find out how bad her punishment was. He would continue only to be knocked over a couple seconds later and yelled at some more. Much to the delight of Clement and to the dismay of Phil, this process repeated itself for about a half hour. Phil could hear her giggle at him from up top, which often made her foot shake even more.

The two things Phil never got used to was the horrible smell and the sticky sweat that got all over him. He got so sweaty and sticky that he was starting to have difficulty peeling his hands off of her sole.

To make things worse, she would frequently slide the toes of her other foot across his legs causing him trip and fall on his butt. Then she’d shout at him for stopping, and he’d have to get quickly and resume rubbing to avoid her wrath.

“All right my nuisance, now rub my toes,” she eventually said. She dropped her sole down on the ground with no concern for Phil who barely ducked out of the way avoiding his death. “Now I want you to make sure you rub each toe and between each toe. Do you understand?”

“Yes Lady Clement.”

Rubbing the toes was worse than rubbing the sole. She was far more ticklish here, and her toes moved three times as much when she was tickled then her sole did. It was the worst when he cleaned between her toes because his arms would get stuck when she moved her toes up and down, and he would shake violently along with them as well.

After he finished the right foot, Phil was commanded to do the left foot, and the process was repeated over again. By the time it was over, Phil was tired, sore, and barely able to move. He was also covered in her sweat.

“We’re done with that now,” Clement said to a relieved Phil. “Now the second lesson.” Phil’s heart dropped into his stomach. It wasn’t over! As a matter of fact, it had barely begun.

Phil was then picked up and carried outside of the living room. Phil looked up to see Kendra watching them from on top of the stairs. Her mother and Phil hadn’t noticed, but she had been watching the whole time, both enjoying Phil suffer and noting ideas for what she could do with him later.

Lady Clement carried Phil into the kitchen.

“I was getting hungry as you were rubbing my feet,” she explained. She put Phil down on the counter and got some turkey, mustard, and mayo out of the fridge and bread from a cabinet.

“Now don’t even think about running,” she stated as she dropped the loaf of bread and turkey on both sides of Phil preventing him from escape. The wind from the drop knocked him over. “I’ll be watching you. Don’t worry. You’re not going anywhere.”

Oh that’s a relief, Phil sarcastically thought.

“Many men force their girlfriends or wives into the kitchen to cook them things and take no part in cooking,” she explained as she took out a piece of bread and began put some turkey on it. “But don’t do that. Become a part of what she cooks.”

Before Phil could respond, he was swept up and dropped into the turkey. He tried to run off the sandwich, but she poured mustard around him. The puddle of mustard made him slip and fall face first into in the mustard puddle. His face and the entire front side of his body was covered in mustard. He felt mayo being poured on top of him, and desperately he began to get up. But before he could stand up though, Clement put the second piece of bread on top of him and pushed him back down. He was now stuck in the sandwich, lying down and covered in mustard and mayo.

“Don’t even bother trying to resist. I got you pinned.”

She carried the sandwich into the dining room, sat down, and began to eat. Every time Phil heard the crunch of a bite, he was scared stiff, not knowing whether he’d be next one or not. She carefully ate around the sandwich leaving the last bite as Phil’s trembling body. After she dropped Phil into her mouth, she sloshed him around with her tongue as she ate the meat and bread around him. Now in addition to being covered in mustard and mayo, Phil was soaked with her saliva. Pretty soon everything was eaten except Phil, at which point Clement’s tongue started sucking all the mustard and mayo off of his body. The mustard and mayo on his body was replaced with more saliva as Phil felt like he might drown or be swallowed.

“Please don’t eat me! Please!” Phil pleaded.

“Why not? You and the rest of mankind are no good to me. You guys only hurt me. Why should I bother with you?”

“Please! I’m sorry for whatever we’ve done to you. Be merciful. I beg you!” Phil knew that he didn’t have many more options left than to beg.

“What a truly insignificant person you are! You don’t know how long I have waited for a moment like this. To avenge men for what they’ve done for me,” if Phil was not in her mouth, he’d notice her begin to smirk. “No I won’t kill you necessarily. Here’s a test to make sure you’re learning your lesson on how to treat women. If you don’t pass, you won’t be able to be Kendra’s boyfriend nor alive to hurt any other girl. I will open my mouth. If you can pass out of my mouth, I’ll let you live, but if my tongue is able to pin you down and swallow you, then you’ll have a fun time dying in my stomach.”

Phil saw her mouth open and began to run for it, but he had forgotten that he was standing on her tongue. She quickly and easily lifted her and shifted it slightly causing him to lose his balance and fall deeper into her mouth. Then her tongue flipped around and pinned him to the ground. Phil struggled desperately to push off this slimy red creature, but it was too strong for him.

“I got you now. It was nice getting to know you Phil.”

“Galileo made many observations with the telescope which helped the heliocentric revolution, much to the dismay... of the... church.” Ms. Prittey stops the lecture upon seeing not one of the girls paying attention to her. She holds it above her desk so that the metal ball hangs just over the surface. Ms. Prittey looks at the rest of her students whom are, to her delight, starting to pay attention. “One of the things Galileo had an interest in was one of these, does anyone know what this is?” A few girls raise their hand but also a few of them blurt out the answer. “It’s a pendulum,” Phil hears them say.

“That’s right. Galileo thought these things were really neat. Let’s have Phil show you why. Phil, would you kindly sit on top of the metal ball?” “Okay.” Phil grabs on to the string and hoists himself up. Sitting on the ball and holding the string makes him feel like he’s at home on his lamp swing. Ms. Prittey reaches into the drawer again and pulls a stopwatch this time. “I need another volunteer, would any of you-” All of the girls are raising their hands. “Okay... How about you, Rachael.”

A rest of the class lets out a collective sigh as the redheaded girl gets out of her chair. “Hold this, please”, Ms. Prittey hands her the stopwatch. Ms. Prittey then grabs Phil and the metal ball between her fingers and pulls him back until the string stretches diagonally relative to the desktop. “Now Kendra, when I let go of Phil, I want you to hit the timer. Then when he returns to where he started, hit it again, okay?” “Okay!”

When Prittey lets go, Phil goes swinging down on the ball. He forgets himself in the swing, and lets out a “woohoo!” which stirs many of the girls to a laugh. Phil returns to Prittey’s hand and she grabs him. Rachael presses down on the timer. “2.43 seconds,” she declares while looking at Phil. Ms. Prittey marks the number down on the board. “Now, suppose he starts out-“ Prittey stretches her hands apart until the string is parallel to the ground “-like this.”

“Raise your hands if think that the time for a full swing will be shorter than before.” None of the girls raise their hands. “How many think that the times will be about the same?” Phil sees a couple hands go up. “Alright, now how many of you think that the time will take longer?” Most of the girls raise their hands, Phil decides to raise his hand with them.

Ms. Prittey shrugs, “I guess we’ll have to see, won’t we. Rachael?” “Ready.” Ms. Prittey releases again her grip again. Phil goes swinging down, he’s moving much faster than last time. The air rushes past his face as he holds himself tightly against the string. After a full swing he returns back into Ms. Prittey’s waiting hand and Rachael snaps the timer button again. “2.45 seconds...” she says, confused. Ms. Prittey writes the second figure below the first one on the board. “How about that! They are about the same! It turns out... You can go ahead and get down, thank you Phil.” She lowers the string down onto the desktop and lets Phil hop off. “It turns out that the time for a full swing, called the period, is the same regardless of the angle at which you let go of the ball. Another interesting thing-”

A loud screeching sound interrupts her lecture. Phil jumps out of his desk in alarm as it goes off and sees many of the girls squinting and cupping their hands to their ears. Some of them screaming. Ms. Prittey looks confused for a moment, then shouts over the alarm. “Everyone stay calm, it’s just a fire drill. Remember what I told you, stay in a group and follow me.” She opens the door for everyone to leave. Phil thinks that she is going to come back for him until he sees her exit the doorway. She forgot about him...

There are still students exiting the class. Notably, Phil sees Rachael walking past the desk now.
